src_text: we know what causes the virus and what we can do to protect ourselves from becoming infected.
tgt_text: siyayazi ukuba kufanele sigcine umgama wokuqelelana, ukuzigcina singamakheswa ukuba besidibene nabo bosulelekileyo nokuthi sizise esibhedlele ukuba sineempawu.

src_text: we know we have to maintain social distancing, to selfisolate if we have come into contact with those infected and to present to a hospital if we have symptoms.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubeke sikhokelwa yinyaniso hayi amarhe.

src_text: we must continue to be guided by facts and not rumours.
tgt_text: ixesha lokuba umntu athi aka zi mntu owosulelweyo okanye ochatshazelweyo yintsholongwane icorona ledlula kudala.

src_text: the time when anyone could say they do not know anyone who is infected or affected by coronavirus has long passed.
tgt_text: ngoku, ngaphezulu kunakuqala, abahlobo bethu, iintsapho, oogxa nabamelwane bethu badinga uvelwano nenkxaso.

src_text: now, more than ever, our friends, families, colleagues and neighbours need our empathy and support.
tgt_text: kwiintsuku, iiveki nezi nyanga ziphambi kwethu, ngamanye amaxesha siza kuzifumana siphelelwa lithemba kwaye sibe noloyiko xa sibona inani labantu abosulelekayo nababhubhayo liqhubeka ukonyuka.

src_text: in the days, weeks and months that lie ahead, we will at times find ourselves despondent and fearful as we see the numbers of people infected and dying continue to rise.
tgt_text: kusenokuba izinto zibe mbi ngakumbi, kodwa siqinisekile ukuba ziza kuba ngcono.

src_text: it may be that things have gotten worse, but we are certain that they will get better.
tgt_text: oosonzululwazi bethu nabacebisi bezonyango basixelele ukuba izinga losule leko liza kunyuka njengoko sifikelela encotsheni yethu.

src_text: our scientists and medical advisers told us that the rate of infections will go up as we move towards our peak.
tgt_text: kodwa ngokuqinisekileyo liza kuhla.

src_text: but it will certainly come down.
tgt_text: sinika imbeko abasebenzi benkathalelo yezempilo abathe baphulukana nobomi babo benikezela ngenkathalelo kwabagulayo.

src_text: we pay tribute to the healthcare workers who lost their lives caring for the sick.
tgt_text: ukubakhumbula, masizigcine sikhuselekile kunye nabanye abemi bakuthi ngokudlala eyethu indima.

src_text: in their memory, let us keep ourselves and our fellow citizens safe by playing our part.
tgt_text: siza kuyoyisa le ntsholongwane size silakhe ngokutsha uluntu lwethu.

src_text: we shall overcome this virus and rebuild our society.
tgt_text: siwabonile amaxesha awayengawonaanzima kodwa soyisa.

src_text: we have seen darker times and we have prevailed.
tgt_text: imbeko ekhethekileyo kubasebenzi bethu benkathalelo yezempilo vukuzenzele unnamed inani lokusweleka okubangelwa yintsho longwane icorona kutsha nje lide ledlula kuphawu lwama2 000. phakathi kwabo bathe baphulukana nobomi babo ngabasebenzi bezempilo, abasebenzi abafezekileyo abebekhathalela abagulayo, kwaye bebeyinkxaso nentuthuzelo kwabo bebesesibhedlele besenziwa amakheswa kwiintsapho zabo.

src_text: young farmer receives covid19 support vukuzenzele unnamed nomagcinandile suduka (27) is growing her family’s legacy and wealth by investing in agriculture.
tgt_text: umlimi osemtsha ufumana inkxaso yecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi osahlumayo wasempuma koloni ngomnye wabantu abaxhamle kwingxowamali karhuluumente yesiqabu kwintsholongwane yecorona .

src_text: the o wner of 4 u and 4 me primary cooperative in mooiplaas village received support from the department of agriculture, land reform and rural development’s coronavirus (covid19) relief fund for her egg, livestock and vegetable farm.
tgt_text: unomagcinandile suduka (one minyaka enga ma27) ukhulisa igama nobutyebi bosapho lwakhe ngokutyala imali kwezolimo.

src_text: the department has awarded r1.2 billion worth of vouchers to farmers in need.
tgt_text: umnini we4 u and 4 me primary cooperative elalini yasemooiplaas ufumene inkxaso kwingxowamali yesiqabu yentsholongwane yecorona (icovid19) yesebe lezolimo, iinguqu kwezemihlala nophuhliso lwamaphandle ukwenzela ifama yakhe yamaqanda, imfuyo nemifuno.

src_text: suduka says her vouchers will help her grow the egg producing side of her business.
tgt_text: isebe linikele ngeevawutsha ezixabisa imali eyibhiliyoni eyi1.2 yeerandi kubalimi abafuna uncedo.

src_text: "i received three vouchers totalling r19 000. a voucher for r12 000 to buy layer egg chickens, a voucher for r6 500 to buy feed and a r500 voucher to buy medicines.
tgt_text: usuduka uthi iivawutsha zakhe ziza kumnceda ngokwandisa icala leshishini lakhe lemveliso yamaqanda.

src_text: "she started her egg production farm by feeding her family’s traditional chickens with layer grower feed, which enables them to produce eggs without mating.
tgt_text: "ndifumene iivawutsha ezintathu ezixabisa imali enga ma19 000 eerandi.

src_text: her chickens now produce 50 eggs a day, which she sells weekly.
tgt_text: ivawutsha yemali engama12 000 eerandi yokuthenga iinkukhu zamaqa nda ezili100, ivawutsha yama6 500 eerandi yokuthenga ukutya kweenkukhu kunye nevawutsha yama500 eerandi yokuthenga amayeza.

src_text: suduka, who also farms with 73 goats, 25 sheep and 25 cows, started farming in 2015 after obtaining a public management n6 certificate from ikhala training and vocational education and training college.
tgt_text: "uqalise ifama yakhe yemveliso yamaqanda ngokondla iinkukhu zesixhosa zosapho lwakhe ngokutya kokuzenza zibe zinkukhu zamaqanda, nesenza ukuba zikwazi ukuzala amaqanda zingahlangenanga nenkunzi.

src_text: after realising that there were not a lot of job opportunities out there, she decided to take over the family’s then subsistence farm and turn it into a profitable business.
tgt_text: iinkukhu zakhe ezingama50 ngoku zizala amaqanda angama50 ngosuku, aze awathengise qho ngeveki.

src_text: suduka says: "we grew up practising farming, so after graduating i decided to farm rather than look for a job."
tgt_text: usuduka, ophinda afuye neebhokhwe ezingama73, iigusha ezingama25 neenko mo ezingama25, waqalisa ukufama ngowama2015 emva kokufumana isatifikethi sepublic management kun6 eikhala training and voca tional education and training college.

src_text: this proved to be an inspired decision, as she has grown the number of goats and cows.
tgt_text: emva kokufumanisa ukuba amathuba emisebenzi anqongophele, wenza isigqibo sokuthathela kuye umsebenzi wefama yosapho eyayilinyelwa ukuziphilisa ngoko ukuze ayiguqule ibe lishishini elifaka inzuzo.

src_text: suduka’s sixhectare vegetable farm produces maize, potatoes, peas and beans.
tgt_text: usuduka uthi: "sikhule sifama, ngoko ke emva kokuphumelela kwizifundo zam ndenze isigqibo sokufama endaweni yokufuna umsebenzi."

src_text: the maize is planted on four hectares, the potatoes on one hectare and the peas and beans share the last hectare.
tgt_text: esi sigqibo sizibonakalise njengesenkuthazo, kuba selekhulise iqela leebhokhwe neenkomo.

src_text: suduka has learnt a lot from covid19, especially that her best assets are her hands and hard work.
tgt_text: ifama yemifuno kasuduka ezihektare ezintandathu ubukhulu ivelisa umbona, iitapile, iierityisi neembotyi.

src_text: tips on how to start a garden: make sure you know which plants your soil will support.
tgt_text: umbona ulinywa kwiihektare ezine, iitapile kwihektare enye ukuze iierityisi neembotyi nazo zibe nehektare enye.

src_text: ready your garden by first ploughing the land more than once without planting.
tgt_text: usuduka ufunde okuninzi kwicovid19 , ngakumbi ngenxa yokuba eyona nto ibalulekileyo kweli shishini lakhe zizandla zakhe kunye nokusebenza nzima.

src_text: add fertiliser.
tgt_text: umlimi osemtsha ufumana inkxaso yecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi osahlumayo wasempuma koloni ngomnye wabantu abaxhamle kwingxowamali karhuluumente yesiqabu kwintsholongwane yecorona .

src_text: south africa acts to address ventilator shortage silusapho nyanda a locally developed ventilator will help patients with mild covid19 symptoms to breathe easier.
tgt_text: umzantsi afrika uthatha amanyathelo okulungisa ukudingeka kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa silusapho nyanda isixhobo sokuphefumlisa esenziwe apha ekhaya siza kunceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula umlo wokulwa nesifo sentsholongwane icorona (covid19) emzantsi afrika womelezwe kukuveliswa kwesixhobo sokuphefumlisa sokuqala apha kweli lizweisixhobo sokuphefumlisa soxinzelelo oluluncedo kwimibhobho yomoya oluqhubekayo (icp ap) sinceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula ngokubonelela ngoxinzelelo lomoya onomongomoya okwinqanaba elingephi ukugcina imibhobho yazo yomoya ivulekile.

src_text: the fight against the coronavirus disease (covid19) in south africa has been boosted with the production of the first ventilator made in the country.
tgt_text: esi sixhobo sokuphefumlisa sayilwa libhunga lophandonzulu kwezobunzululwazi nezoshishino (icsir) ngentsebenziswano neqela labehlulelani balapha ekhaya kwaye siza kufezekiswa kweli lizwe jikelele kwizigulane ezibonakalisa iingxaki zokuphefumla kwizigaba zokuqala zosuleleko lwecovid19.

src_text: the continuous positive airway pressure (cpap) ventilator helps patients with mild symptoms of covid19 to breathe easier by providing a mild level of oxygenated air pressure to keep their airways open.
tgt_text: "umoya umntu awuphefumlayo ngokwesiqhelo unomongomoya ohlanganisiweyo oziipesenti ezingama23.

src_text: the ventilator was designed by the council for scientific and industrial research (csir) in collaboration with a number of local partners and will be rolled out nationwide to patients showing respiratory distress in the early phase of covid19 infection.
tgt_text: umatshini wecp ap ungampompa umthamo ophezulu womongomoya, ukuncedisa umntu ukuba aphefumle.

src_text: "the air a person normally breaths has a 23 percent concentration of oxygen.
tgt_text: icp ap impompa umongomoya ohlanganisiweyo ngokuqhubekayo.

src_text: the cpap ventilator can pump a higher amount of oxygen, helping a person breathe.
tgt_text: ungawandisa okanye uwunciphise umthamo womongomoya umntu awuphefumlela ngaphakathi," utsho umlawuli wesigqeba wecsir future production: manufacturing umartin sanne.

src_text: the cpap pumps continuous concentrated oxygen.
tgt_text: izigulane ezisebenzisa isixhobo sokuphefumlisa zinxulumanyiswa ngokuthi zinxityiswe isigqubuthelobuso.

src_text: you can increase or decrease the amount of oxygen one is breathing in," says executive manager of csir future production: manufacturing martin sanne.
tgt_text: umongomoya utsalwa kwitanki yegesi yomongomoya uze udityaniswe nomoya wendalo kwisixhobo sokuphefumlisa, ukusuka kulo ndawo ukuya kugqithiselwa kwisigqubuthelobuso uze uphefumlelwe ngaphakathi sisigulane.

src_text: patients using the ventilator are connected via a face mask.
tgt_text: usanne uthi ukongeza ekumpontshweni komoya womongomoya, icp ap ikwanceda izigulane ukuba zikwazi ukuphefumlela ngaphandle.

src_text: oxygen is drawn from an oxygen gas tank and is mixed with natural air in the ventilator, from where it is transmitted to the mask and breathed in by the patient.
tgt_text: isixhobo sec pa p singasetyenziswa kwiimeko ezinobuchwepheshe obuxhome kakhulu bezonyango nakwiimeko zethutyana, ezifana nezibhedlele zethutyana nakumaziko okuvalela bucala.

src_text: sanne says that in addition to pumping oxygenated air, the cpap also helps patients exhale.
tgt_text: usanne uthi icsir kufanele ibe ivelise izixhobo zokuphefumlisa ezingama10 000 ekupheleni kweyethupha.

src_text: the cpap device can be used in both hightech clinical environments and temporary settings, such as field hospitals and quarantine facilities.
tgt_text: ngokusebenzisana nabakwasiemens, abakwasimera, abakwaakacia, abakwagabler, umoya kunye neyunivesithi yasekapa (iuct), icsir ivelise icp ap ngokwemigangatho yombutho wezempilo wehlabathi (iwho).

src_text: sanne says the csir will have produced 10 000 ventilators by the end of august.
tgt_text: iqela lokuqala lezi zixhobo zokuphefumlisa liza kunikezelwa kwizibhedlele zikarhulumente eziphantsi koxinzelelo ngenxa yokungabikho kwezixhobo zokuqubisana necovid19.

src_text: working with siemens, simera, akacia, gabler, umoya and the university of cape town, the csir produced the cpap according to world health organisation standards.
tgt_text: icsir iqalise ukusebenza ngecp ap emva kokuba ihlabathi liqalise ukufumana ukudingeka okukhulu kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa.

src_text: the first batch of ventilators will be given to state hospitals experiencing pressure due to the unavailability of equipment to deal with covid19.
tgt_text: "malunga nenyanga yokwindla nekatshazimpuzi, kwasuka ngesiquphe kwakho ukungabikho ngokwaneleyo kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa kubaboneleli bethu bezizwengezizwe.

src_text: the csir started working on the cpap after the world began experiencing an extreme shortage in ventilators.
tgt_text: apho zazifumaneka khona, zazibiza kakhulu, ngoko ke urhulumente wakhupha isinikimaxabiso sokuveliswa kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa," utsho usanne.

src_text: "around march and april, there suddenly became a short supply of ventilators from our international suppliers.
tgt_text: isinikimaxabiso ibiyinxalenye yeprojekthi yesizwe karhulumente yezixhobo zokuphefumlisa ngaphakathi kwesebe lezorhwebo, ushishino nokhuphiswano.

src_text: where you could get them, they were very expensive so government issued a tender for the production of ventilators," says sanne.
tgt_text: icsir ikwasebenza nangesixhobo sokuphefumlisa soxinzelelo oluluncedo kwimibhobho yomoya omanqanabamabini (ibilevel positive airway pressure) onjongo zawo zikukunceda izigulane ezineempawu ezibukhali kakhulu zecovid19.

src_text: the tender was part of the government’s national ventilator project within the department of trade, industry and competition.
tgt_text: umzantsi afrika uthatha amanyathelo okulungisa ukudingeka kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa silusapho nyanda isixhobo sokuphefumlisa esenziwe apha ekhaya siza kunceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula umlo wokulwa nesifo sentsholongwane icorona (covid19) emzantsi afrika womelezwe kukuveliswa kwesixhobo sokuphefumlisa sokuqala apha kweli lizweisixhobo sokuphefumlisa soxinzelelo oluluncedo kwimibhobho yomoya oluqhubekayo (icp ap) sinceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula ngokubonelela ngoxinzelelo lomoya onomongomoya okwinqanaba elingephi ukugcina imibhobho yazo yomoya ivulekile.

src_text: help stop the spread of covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed our nation is con fronted by the gravest crisis in the history of our democracy.
tgt_text: nceda unqande ukunwenwa kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed isizwe sakuthi sijamelene neyona ntlekele inzima kakhulu kwimbali yedemokhrasi yethu.

src_text: for more than 120 days, we have succeeded in delaying the spread of a virus that is causing devastation across the globe.
tgt_text: iintsuku ezingaphezulu kwezi120, siphumelele ekulibaziseni ukunwenwa kwale ntsholongwane izisa intshabalalo kwihlabathi jikelele.

src_text: but now, the surge in infections that we had been advised by our medical experts would come, has arrived.
tgt_text: kodwa ngoku, ukunyuka ngamandla kosuleleko esasicetyiswe ngako zingcali zethu zezonyango ukuba kuseza kuza, sekufikile.

src_text: more than a quarter of a million south africans have been infected with coronavirus, and we know that many more infections have gone undetected.
tgt_text: bangaphezulu kwekota yesigidi abantu basemzantsi afrika abosulelwe yintsholongwane icorona, kwaye siyayazi ukuba luseluninzi olunye usuleleko olungabonwanga.

src_text: we are now recording over 12,000 new cases every day.
tgt_text: ngoku sibhalisa ngaphezulu kwama12, 000 ezehlo zosuleleko ezintsha yonke imihla.

src_text: since the start of the outbreak in march, at least 4,079 people have died from covid19.
tgt_text: ukususela ukuqalisa kokuqhambuka kwayo kwinyanga yokwindla, ngabantu abangama4,079 ubuncinane abathe basweleka ngenxa yecovid19.

src_text: like the massive cold fronts that sweep into our country from the south atlantic at this time of year, there are few parts of the country that will remain untouched by the coronavirus.
tgt_text: njengale ngqele iqhaqhazelisa amazinyo indlongozela ukungena kwilizwe lethu ivela kwiatlantic esemazantsi ngeli xesha lonyaka, imbalwa imimandla yeli lizwe eya kusinda kule ntsholongwane icorona.

src_text: the coronavirus storm is far fiercer and more destructive than any we have known before.
tgt_text: uhlaselo lwentsholongwane icorona lukude le ngobukhali kwaye lutshabalalisa ngaphezulu kwalo naluphi na utshabalalo esakhe salwazi ngaphambili.

src_text: it is stretching our resources and our resolve to their limits.
tgt_text: lutweza imithombo yethu kunye nokuthatha kwethu izigqibo kude kufikelele ekupheleni.

src_text: the surge of infections that our experts and scientists predicted over 3 months ago has now arrived.
tgt_text: ukunyuka ngamandla kosuleleko ebeluthelekelelwe kwangaphambili zingcali noosonzululwazi bethu kwezi nyanga zi3 zidlulileyo, kude kwafika ke ngoku.

src_text: it started in the western cape and is now underway in the eastern cape and gauteng.
tgt_text: kuqale entshona koloni kwaye ngoku kuyaqhubeka empuma koloni nasegauteng.

src_text: yet, while infections rise exponentially, it is important to note that our case fatality rate of 1.5 percent is among the lowest in the world.
tgt_text: kanti, nangona usuleleko lukhula ngokucacileyo, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuba izinga lethu lokusweleka leepesenti e1.5 liphakathi kwawona mazinga aphantsi ehlabathini.

src_text: this is compared to a global average case fatality rate of 4.4 percent.
tgt_text: oku kuthelekiswa nomyinge wezinga lezehlo zokusweleka ehlabathini jikelele elikwiipesenti ezi4.4.

src_text: we owe the relatively low number of deaths in our country to the experience and dedication of our health professionals and the urgent measures we have taken to build the capacity of our health system.
tgt_text: sifanele ukubulela amava nokuzinikela kwamagcisa wethu wezonyango namanyathelo angxamisekileyo esiwathathileyo ukwakha amandla enkqubo yethu yezempilo ngala manani asezantsi okusweleka kwilizwe lethu.

src_text: even as most of our people have taken action to prevent the spread of the virus, there are others who have not.
tgt_text: nangona uninzi lwabantu bakuthi bewathathile amanyathelo okuthintela ukunwenwa kwale ntsholongwane, bakhona abanye abangayenzanga loo nto.

src_text: there are some among us who ignore the regulations that have been passed to combat the disease.
tgt_text: bakhona abanye apha phakathi kwethu abangayihoyiyo imimiselo ephunyezelwe ukulwa esi sifo.

src_text: in the midst of such a pandemic, getting into a taxi without a face mask, gathering to meet friends, attending parties or even visiting family, can too easily spread the virus and cost lives.
tgt_text: ebunzulwini bonje yena ubhubhane, ukukhwela iteksi ungasinxibanga isigqubuthelobuso, iindibano zabahlobo, ukuya kwiziyunguma okanye ukutyelela usapho, nako ngokulula kunokubangela ukusasazeka kwentsholongwane kunye nokuphulukana nobomi.

src_text: this may be a disease that is caused by a virus, but it is spread by human conduct and behaviour.
tgt_text: esi ingasisifo esibangelwe yile ntsholongwane, kodwa sisasazwa yindlela abantu abaziphethe ngayo nendlela yokuziphatha.

src_text: through our own actions – as individuals, as families, as communities – we can and we must change the course of this pandemic in our country.
tgt_text: ngenxa yamanyathelo wethu – njengomntu ngamnye, njengeentsapho, njengoluntu – sinakho kwaye kufuneka simtshintshile lo bhubhane kwilizwe lethu.

src_text: we need to wear a cloth mask that covers our nose and mouth whenever we leave home.
tgt_text: kufanele sinxibe isigqubuthelobuso esenziwe ngelaphu esigquma iimpumlo nomlomo ngalo lonke ixesha siphuma ekhaya.

src_text: we must continue to regularly wash our hands with soap and water or sanitiser.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubeke sihlamba izandla zethu rhoqo ngesepha namanzi okanye ngesibulalizintsholongwane.

src_text: we must continue to clean and sanitise all surfaces in all public spaces.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubeke nokucoca size sifake nesibulalizintsholongwane kuyo yonke imiphezulu/imiphandle kuzo zonke iindawo zikawonkewonke.

src_text: most importantly, we must keep a safe distance – of at least 2 metres – from other people.
tgt_text: okona kubaluleke nangakumbi, kufuneka sigcine umgama wokuqelelana okhuselekileyo – ozimitha ezi2 ubuncinane – ukusuka kwabanye abantu.

src_text: there is now emerging evidence that the virus may also be carried in tiny particles in the air in places that are crowded, closed or have poor air circulation.
tgt_text: ngoku kukho ubungqina obuvelayo bokuba le ntsholongwane isenokuhamba njengamasuntswana amancinci emoyeni kwiindawo ezinabantu abaninzi, ezivaliweyo okanye ezingangeni kakuhle umoya.

src_text: for this reason we must immediately improve the indoor environment of public places where the risk of infection is greatest.
tgt_text: ngenxa yeso sizathu kufuneka ngoko nangoko siphucule imo yangaphakathi kwiindawo zikawonkewonke apho umngcipheko wobungozi bosuleleko umkhulu kakhulu khona.

src_text: our decision to declare a nationwide lockdown prevented a massive early surge of infections when our health services were less prepared, which would have resulted in a far greater loss of lives.
tgt_text: isigqibo sethu sokubhengeza ukuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile kwizwelonke sathintela ukunyuka ngamandla kosuleleko ngobuninzi ngexesha apho iinkonzo zethu zezempilo zazingekasilungeli esi simo, nento eyayinokukhokelela kweyona lahleko inkulu yokuphulukana nobomi.

src_text: in the time that we had, we have taken important measures to strengthen our health response.
tgt_text: kwixesha ebesinalo, sithathe amanyathelo abalulekileyo okomeleza indlela yethu yezempilo yokusabela.

src_text: we have conducted more than two million coronavirus tests and community health workers have done more than 20 million screenings.
tgt_text: senze uvavanyo lwentsholongwane icorona olungaphezulu kwezigidi ezimbini kanti ke oonompilo benze uhlolo olungaphezulu kwezigidi ezingama20.

src_text: we have made available almost 28,000 hospital beds for covid19 patients and have constructed functional field hospitals across the country.
tgt_text: sineebhedi ezingama28,000 esibhedlele ezilungele ukusetyenziswa zizigulane zecovid19 saze sakha izibhedlele zethutyana ezisebenzayo kwizwelonke.

src_text: we now have over 37,000 quarantine beds in private and public facilities across the country, ready to isolate those who cannot do so at home.
tgt_text: ngoku sineebhedi zokuvaleleka bucala ezingama37,000 kumaziko abucala namaziko karhulumente kwiizwelonke, ezilungele ukwenza amakheswa abo bangakwaziyo ukwenza njalo emakhayeni wabo.

src_text: we have procured and delivered millions of items of personal protective equipment to hospitals, clinics and schools across the country to protect our frontline workers.
tgt_text: sithenge saza sathumela izigidi zezixhobo zokuzikhusela emsebenzini kwizibhedlele, kwiiklinikhi kunye nasezikolweni kwizwelonke ukukhusela abasebenzi bethu abangabona baphambili edabini.

src_text: we have recruited and continue to recruit additional nurses, doctors and emergency health personnel.
tgt_text: siye saqasha kwaye siyaqhubeka nokufuna abongikazi, oogqirha nabasebenzi bakaxakeka bezempilo abongezelelweyo.

src_text: we continue to make progress in our efforts to deal with covid 19, but our greatest challenge still lies ahead.
tgt_text: siyaqhubeka nokwenza inkqubela kumalinge wethu okuqubisana necovid19, kodwa owona mcelimngeni mkhulu usengaphambili.

src_text: across all provinces, we are working to further increase the number of general ward and critical beds available for covid19 patients.
tgt_text: kuwo onke amaphondo, sime ngomumo ukwandisa ngakumbi inani leewadi zesiqhelo ezibhedlele kunye neebhedi zabagula kakhulu zezigulane zecovid19.

src_text: ward capacity is being freed up in a number of hospitals by delaying nonurgent care, the conversion of some areas of hospitals into additional ward space and the erection or expansion of field hospitals.
tgt_text: umthamo weewadi zesiqhelo ezibhedlele uphunguliwe kwizibhedlele ezininzi ngokuthi kulityaziswe kwabo badinga inkathalelo engangxamisekanga, ukuguqulwa kweendawo ezithile zesibhedlele ukuba zibe ngamacandelo ongezelelweyo wabagulayo nokwakhiwa okanye ukwandiswa kwezibhedlele zethutyana.

src_text: we are working to increase supplies of oxygen, ventilators and other equipment for those who will need critical care, including by diverting the supply of oxygen from other purposes.
tgt_text: sisebenzela ukwandisa ubonelelo lomongomoya, izixhobo zokuphefumlisa kunye nezinye izixhobo zabo badinga inkathalelo yabagula kakhulu, kuquka nokutshintsha ubonelelo lomongomoya ebelusetyenziselwa ezinye iinjongo.

src_text: we are deploying digital technologies to strengthen the identification, tracing and isolation of contacts, and to provide support to those who test positive.
tgt_text: sifaka ubuchwepheshe bedijithali ukuqinisa indlela ekubonwa ngayo, ukulanda umkhondo nokwenziwa amakhweswa kwabo bebedibene nomntu osulelekileyo, kunye nokubonelela ngenkxaso kwabo uvavanyo lubafumanise bosulelekile.

src_text: as we now approach the peak of infections, we need to take extra precautions and tighten existing measures to slow down the rate of transmission.
tgt_text: njengokuba sisondela kwinkcochoyi yosuleleko, sidinga ukulumka ngakumbi size siqinise la manyathelo sele ekho ukuthomalalisa izinga lokusasazeka.

src_text: regulations on the wearing of masks will be strengthened.
tgt_text: imigaqo engokunxitywa kwezigqubuthelobuso iza kuqiniswa.

src_text: employers, shop owners and managers, public transport operators, and managers and owners of any other public building are now legally obliged to ensure that anyone entering their premises or vehicle must be wearing a mask.
tgt_text: abaqashi, abanini zivenkile kunye nabalawuli, abaqhubi bezithuthi zikawonkewonke, kunye nabalawuli kunye nabanini baso nasiphi na isakhiwo sikawonkewonke bayanyanzelwa ngumthetho ukuba baqinisekise nabani na ongena kwizakhiwo zabo okanye izithuthi kufuneka esinxibile isigqubuthelobuso.

src_text: taxis undertaking local trips will now be permitted to increase their capacity to 100 percent, while long distance taxis will not be allowed to exceed 70 percent occupancy, on condition that new risk mitigation protocols related to masks, vehicle sanitising and open windows are followed.
tgt_text: iiteksi ezihamba imigama emifutshane ngoku ziza kuvunyelwa ukuba ziwandise umthamo wazo wokukhwelisa i100 leepesenti, ngelixa ezihamba imigama emide zingavumelekanga ukuba ziwandise umthamo wama70 eepesenti, phantsi komqathango wokulandelwa kwemimiselo yokuthomalalisa umngcipheko omalunga nokunxitywa kwezigqubuthelobuso, ukucocwa kwezithuthi ngesibulalizintsholongwane kunye nokuvulwa kweefestile.

src_text: there is now clear evidence that the resumption of alcohol sales has resulted in substantial pressure being put on hospitals, including trauma and icu units, due to motor vehicle accidents, violence and related trauma.
tgt_text: ngoku kukho ubungqina obucacileyo bokuba ukuqaliswa kokuthengiswa kotywala kukhokelele ekubekweni kwezibhedlele zethu phantsi koxinzelelo olumandla, kuquka namacandelo abonzakeleyo kunye namacandelo abagula kakhulu (iicu), ngenxa yeengozi zeemoto, ubundlobongela kunye nokwenzakala okunxulumene nabo.

src_text: we have therefore decided that in order to conserve hospital capacity, the sale, dispensing and distribution of alcohol will be suspended with immediate effect.
tgt_text: ngoko ke sithathe isigqibo sokuba khona ukuze sikwazi ukugcina umthamo wezibhedlele uphantsi, ukuthengiswa, ukusasazwa kunye nokuhanjiswa kotywala kuza kurhoxiswa ngoko nangoko.

src_text: as an additional measure to reduce the pressure on hospitals, a curfew will be put in place between the hours of 9pm and 4am.
tgt_text: njengenyathelo elongezelelweyo lokunciphisa uxinzelelo ezibhedlele, kuza kumiselwa ixesha lokuvaleleka ngendlu phakathi kwentsimbi ye9 ngokuhlwa nentsimbi yesi4 ekuseni.

src_text: we are taking these measures fully aware that they impose unwelcome restrictions on people’s lives.
tgt_text: siwathatha la manyathelo sikuqonda kakuhle ukuba abeka ubomi babantu phantsi kwezithintelo ezingamkelekiyo.

src_text: they are, however, necessary to see us through the peak of the disease.
tgt_text: noxa kunjalo, ayafuneka, ayimfuneko ukusinceda siphumele kweli xesha le nkcochoyi yesi sifo.

src_text: there is no way that we can avoid the coronavirus storm.
tgt_text: ayikho indlela esinokuthi siluphephe olu qhwithelo lwentsholongwane icorona.

src_text: but we can limit the damage that it can cause to our lives.
tgt_text: kodwa singawuthothisa umonakalo le ntsholongwane enokuwenza kubomi bethu.

src_text: as a nation we have come together to support each other, to provide comfort to those who are ill and to promote acceptance of people living with the virus.
tgt_text: njengesizwe sihlangene sonke ukuba sixhasane, sinike intuthuzelo kwabo bagulayo kunye nokukhuthaza ukwamkeleka kwabo baphila nale ntsholongwane.

src_text: now, more than ever, we are responsible for the lives of those around us.
tgt_text: ngoku, ngaphezulu kunangaphambili, sinoxanduva lobomi babo basingqongileyo.

src_text: we will weather this storm.
tgt_text: siza kumelana nolu qhwithela.

src_text: we will restore our country to health and to prosperity.
tgt_text: siza kulibuyisela ilizwe lethu libe sempilweni kwaye lihlume.

src_text: we shall overcome.
tgt_text: nceda unqande ukunwenwa kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed isizwe sakuthi sijamelene neyona ntlekele inzima kakhulu kwimbali yedemokhrasi yethu.

src_text: celebrating women through economic inclusion vukuzenzele unnamed in august south africa celebrates women’s month.
tgt_text: ukubhiyozela abantu basetyhini ukubhiyozela abantu basetyhini ngokubabandakanya kuqoqoshongokubabandakanya kuqoqosho vukuzenzele unnamed ngenyanga yethupha umzantsi afrika ubhiyozela inyanga yabantu basetyhini.

src_text: this occasion marks the anniversary of the day in 1956 when 20,000 women marched to the union buildings – a great sea of womankind speaking many languages, from different places and of all races.
tgt_text: eli thuba liphawula isikhumbuzo samhla abasetyhini abangama20 000 ngowe1956 bathi benza umngcelele woqhankqalazo ukuya kwizakhiwo zomdibaniso – inyambalala yamakhosikazi athetha iilwimi ngeelwimi, ephuma kwiinkalo nakwiintlanga zonke.

src_text: they were united in their demand for an end to the dreaded pass laws and for their right to live in freedom.
tgt_text: emanyene kwisinyanzeliso sawo sokupheliswa kwemithetho emibi yamapasi kunye nelungelo lawo lokuhlala enkululekweni.

src_text: the status and position of women in south africa today is vastly different to that faced by our mothers and grandmothers in 1956. we have come a long way in realising a south africa that is nonracial, nonsexist, democratic, prosperous and free.
tgt_text: isimo nendawo abantu basetyhini ababekwa kuyo emzantsi afrika namhlanje yohluke kakhulu kunaleyo oomama noomakhulu bethu babejongene nayo ngowe1956.

src_text: there has been real progress in improving the lives of south african women in the economy, in the political sphere and in public life.
tgt_text: sihambe indlela ende ekuphumezeni umzantsi afrika ongenacalucalulo ngokobuhlanga, ngokwesini, olawulwa ngokwentando yesininzi, ohlumayo nokhululekileyo.

src_text: at the same time, we know there is so much further we still have to go.
tgt_text: kubekho inkqubela yokwenene ekuphuculeni ubomi babantu basetyhini basemzantsi afrika kwezoqoqosho, kwizinga lezepolitiki nakubomi bukawonkewonke.

src_text: women still face discrimination, harassment and violence, and bear the greatest brunt of poverty.
tgt_text: kwangaxesha nye, siyaqonda ukuba isende indlela ekusafanele siyihambile.

src_text: if we are to truly realise the promise of our constitution we have to tackle the economic and financial exclusion that makes women more vulnerable to abuse and violence.
tgt_text: abantu basetyhini basajongene nokucalulwa, impathombi nobundlobongela, kwaye basajongene nobunzima obukhulu bendlala.

src_text: we have joined a groundbreaking campaign that links us to global efforts to achieve gender equality by 2030. generation equality is an ambitious and transformative agenda to end discrimination and violence against women and for their equal participation in political, social and economic life.
tgt_text: ukuba ngaba sizimisele ekuphumezeni isithembiso somgaqosiseko, kufanele siloyisile uqoqosho nokukhetheka kwezezimali okwenza ukuba abantu basetyhini babe zizisulu zokuphathwa kakubi nobundlo bongela ngakumbi.

src_text: as part of this campaign, we have joined two ‘action coalitions’, one for economic justice and rights and another against genderbased violence.
tgt_text: sizibandakanye nephulo eliqalayo ukubakho elisiqhagamshelanisa namalinge ehlabathi jikelele okuphumeza umakulingwane ngowesini ngowama2030.

src_text: both of these themes are critical to our own national agenda.
tgt_text: umakulingwane kwisizukuluwana yiajenda yebhongo neyenguqu yokuphelisa ucalucalulo nobundlobongela obugxile kwabasetyhini nokuthatha kwabo inxaxheba ngokulinganayo kubomi bezepolitiki, ezentlalo nobezoqoqosho.

src_text: eleven months since the emergency response action plan to combat genderbased violence and femicide was implemented we have made progress in expanding support and care to survivors, and progress is being made in legal reforms to afford them greater protection.
tgt_text: njengenxalenye yeli phulo, sizibandakanye ‘neendibanisela zokusebenza’ ezimbini, enye yeyobulungisa kwezoqoqosho namalungelo kunye nenye yokulwa ubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini.

src_text: during the month of august, we begin the implementation of the national strategic plan to combat genderbased violence and femicide.
tgt_text: yomibini le mixholo ibaluleke kakhulu kuqobo lweajenda yethu yesizwe.

src_text: a key aspect of the plan is on ensuring greater women’s financial inclusion.
tgt_text: sele izinyanga ezilishumi elinanye ukususela kwafezekiswa isicwangciso sokusebenza ukusabela kwimeko kaxakeka sokulwa ubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini nokubulawa kwabasetyhini ngamadoda senze inkqubela ekunabiseni inkxaso nenkathalelo kwabasindileyo, kwaye inkqubela iyenzeka kuhlaziyo lwezomthetho ukubanika ukhuseleko olukhulu.

src_text: this is because economic inequality and social inequality are interconnected.
tgt_text: ngenyanga yethupha, siyaqala ukufezekisa isicwangciso sobuchule sesizwe ukulwa ubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini nokubulawa kwabasetyhini ngamadoda.

src_text: the economic status of women in south africa makes them more vulnerable to abuse.
tgt_text: umba ongundoqo wesi sicwangciso usekuqinisekiseni ngokubandakanyeka kakhulu kwabantu basetyhini kwezezimali.

src_text: we must therefore scale up support for women to enable them to become financially independent.
tgt_text: oku kungenxa yokuba ukungalingani kwezoqoqosho nokungalingani kwezentlalo kuyathungelana.

src_text: we have made a number of commitments under generation equality that will be given effect to through the national strategic plan.
tgt_text: isimo sezoqoqosho sabantu basetyhini emzantsi afrika sibenza babe zizisulu zokuphathwa kakubi ngakumbi.

src_text: firstly, we are going to drive women’s economic inclusion through public procurement.
tgt_text: ngoko ke kufuneka siyinyusile inkxaso yabasetyhini ukubenza bakwazi ukuzimela ngokwezezimali.

src_text: we have set the target of ensuring that at least 40 percent of goods and services procured by public entities are sourced from womenowned businesses.
tgt_text: senze iqela lezibophelelo phantsi kukamakulingwane kwisizukuluwana oko kuza kuqala ukucaca kwisicwangciso sobuchule sesizwe.

src_text: secondly, we are going to scale up support for womenowned smmes and for women who work in the informal sector or are unemployed.
tgt_text: okokuqala, siza kuqhuba ukubandakanyeka kwabantu basetyhini kuqoqosho ngenkqubo yentengo karhulumente.

src_text: this will include engagement with the financial sector to make financial services accessible and affordable for women.
tgt_text: sesiwumisele umli nganiselo wokuqinisekisa ukuba ama40 eepesenti ubuncinane bempahla neenkonzo ezithengwa ngamaqumrhu karhulumente kufuneka zithengwe kumashishini wabantu basetyhini.

src_text: thirdly, we want to ensure more women have access to productive assets such as land.
tgt_text: okwesibini, sizakuyinyusa inkxaso yamashishini amancinci aphakathi naphuhlayo (ismmes) wabantu basetyhini neyabantu basetyhini abasebenza kwicandelo elingekho sesikweni okanye abangaphangeliyo.

src_text: it is essential that women are beneficiaries of the accelerate land reform programme.
tgt_text: oku kuzakuquka nokudibana necandelo lezezimali ukwenza ukuba iinkonzo zezezimali zifikeleleke kwaye zingababizi kakhulu abantu basetyhini.

src_text: it is significant that of the r75 million in covid19 relief earmarked for farming input vouchers 53 percent of the beneficiaries will be rural women.
tgt_text: okwesithathu, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu basetyhini bayakwazi ukufikelela kwiimpahla ezivelisayo ezifana nomhlaba.

src_text: we must ensure that women subsistence and smallscale farmers continue to receive support beyond the pandemic.
tgt_text: kubalulekile ukuba abantu basetyhini babe ngabaxhamli kwinkqubo yohlengahle ngiso lomhlaba ekhawulezileyo.

src_text: fourthly, we want to ensure that women are protected from genderbased violence in the workplace.
tgt_text: kubalulekile ukuba kwimali ezizigidi ezingamashumi asixhenxe anesihla nu seerandi zoncedo lwecovid19 ebekelwe bucala igalelo lezolimo ngeevawutsha ama53 eepesenti zabo bangabaxhamli iza kuba ngabantu basetyhini basemaphandleni.

src_text: in this regard, we will be working at a national and regional level towards the ratification of the ilo convention on violence and harassment in the workplace.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba abantu basetyhini abangamafama okuzi philisa nawemithamo emincinci bayaqhubeka ukufumana inkxaso nasemva kwalo bhubhane.

src_text: it is said that freedom is not given, but taken.
tgt_text: okwesine, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu basetyhini bakhuselekile kubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini kwindawo yempangelo.

src_text: the emancipation of women is only words on paper unless it is matched by commitment from all sectors of society.
tgt_text: kule meko, siza kusebenza kwinqanaba lesizwe nelommandla ekusondeleni ukuqinisekisa ingqungquthela yombutho wezabasebenzi wezi zwengezizwe engobundlobongela nempathombi kwindawo yempangelo.

src_text: as we prepare for the reconstruction of our economy in the wake of the coronavirus pandemic, we have said that we cannot simply return to where we were before the outbreak of the virus.
tgt_text: kuthiwa inkululeko ayinikezelwa, kodwa iyathathwa.

src_text: we must build a fundamentally different economy which, among other things, substantially improves the material position of women.
tgt_text: ukukhululeka kwabantu basetyhini kusephepheni nje kuphela ngaphandle kokuba kukhatshwa sisibophelelo esivela kuwo onke amacandelo oluntu.

src_text: this means that our investment in infrastructure must support not only the development of local industry, but also womenowned businesses.
tgt_text: njengokuba silungiselela ukwakha uqoqosho lwethu ekuqhambukeni kobhubhane wentsholongwane icorona , sathi asinokwazi ukuvela nje sibuyele apho besikho phambi kokuqhambuka kwale ntsholongwane.

src_text: it must deliberately create employment opportunities for women in all stages of planning, financing, building and maintaining infrastructure.
tgt_text: kufuneka sakhe uqoqosho olohluke ngokubalulekileyo neliza kuthi, phakathi kokunye, liphucule ngokubonakalayo indawo abakuyo abantu basetyhini.

src_text: by the same measures, as we scale up our public employment programmes, we must ensure that young women in particular are identified as participants.
tgt_text: oku kuthetha ukuthi kutyalomali lwethu kwiziseko ezingundoqo kufuneka singaxhasi nje uphuhliso kumashishini asekhaya kuphela, kodwa sixhase namashishini wabantu basetyhini.

src_text: in addition to an income, these programmes will provide them with an opportunity to acquire some of the skills and experience necessary to enter the mainstream economy.
tgt_text: kufuneka ludalengabomi amathuba emisebenzi yabantu basetyhini kuwo onke amanqanaba okucwangcisa, elezezimali, elokwakha nokulungisa iziseko ezingundoqo.

src_text: as much as it is government’s responsibility to provide economic opportunities for women and create an enabling framework for advancing gender equality, everyone in society needs to play their part.
tgt_text: ngokomlinganiselo ofanayo, njengokuba sisenyusa iinkqubo zemisebenzi yethu karhulumente, kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba ngokukodwa abantu basetyhini abalulutsha bachongwa njengabathathi nxaxheba.

src_text: businesses must support womenowned enterprises in the procurement of goods and services.
tgt_text: ukongeza kwimivuzo, ezi nkqubo ziza kubabonelela ngethuba lokufumana izakhono ezithile namava adingekayo ukungena kuqoqosho lwesiqhelo.

src_text: they should employ more women and appoint more women to management positions.
tgt_text: nangona iluxanduva lukarhulumente ukubonelela abantu basetyhini ngamathuba ezoqoqosho nokudala inkqubosikhokelo yokuxhasa ukuqhubela phambili ukulingana kwezesini, wonke umntu eluntwini udinga ukudlala indima yakhe.

src_text: this is all the more important considering that the private sector’s record on genderrepresentation at management level lags behind that of the public sector.
tgt_text: abezoshishino kufuneka baxhase amashishini amancinci wabantu basetyhini ekuthengeni iimpahla neenkonzo.

src_text: this is an issue that is repeatedly raised in engagements i have had with a number of women’s business organisations.
tgt_text: kufuneka baqeshe abantu basetyhini abongezelelweyo baze banyusele abantu basetyhini abongezelelweyo kwizikhundla zezolawulo.

src_text: by equal measure, we must eliminate gender disparities in pay for men and women, and give effect to the principle of equal pay for equal work contained in the employment equity act.
tgt_text: oku kubaluleka ngakumbi xa uqwalasela ukuba imbali yecandelo labucala ekumelweni kwesini kwinqanaba lezikhundla zezolawulo litsala emva kunecandelo likarhu lumente.

src_text: women must also be protected from harassment and discrimination in the workplace.
tgt_text: lo ngumba ophakanyiswa izihlandlo ngezihlandlo kuthethathethwano endilubamba nemibutho yezoshishino yabantu basetyhini.

src_text: it is up to transport operators, university administrators, school governing bodies and religious organisations to create conditions for women and girls to travel, study and worship in safety.
tgt_text: ngokufanayo, kufuneka sikuphelisile ukungalingani okugxile kwisini kwimivuzo yamadoda neyabantu basetyhini, size sisebenzise imigomo yokuhlawula umvuzo olinganayo ngomsebenzi ofanayo oqulathwe kumthetho womakulinganwe emsebenzini.

src_text: we must forge ahead with our efforts to eradicate chauvinism, sexism and patriarchy.
tgt_text: abantu basetyhini kukwafuneka bekhuselwe ekuphathweni kakubi nakucalucalulo emsebenzini.

src_text: it is these attitudes that enable the oppression of women.
tgt_text: kuxhomekeke kubanikazi bezothutho, abalawuli beedyunivesithi, iibhodi ezilawulayo ezikolweni kunye nemibutho yezenkolo ukudala iimeko ezilungiselela abantu basetyhini namantombazana ukuba ahambe, afunde aze akhonze ngokukhuselekileyo.

src_text: it is up to us – both men and women – to affirm that a woman’s value, position and opinions are no less than that of a man.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubele phambili ngamalinge wethu okukuncothula ukudlisela ngobudoda ngokugqithisileyo, ukuthathela phantsi abantu basetyhini nogonyamelo lwabasetyhini ngamadoda.

src_text: it is up to us as parents and grandparents to treat and raise our sons and our daughters the same.
tgt_text: kuxhomekeke kuthi – sisonke amadoda nabasetyhini – ukungqina ukuba ixabiso lomntu wasetyhini, isikhundla akuso neembono zakhe azikho ngaphantsi kwezomntu oyindoda.

src_text: it is up to us as men to reject and speak out against genderbased violence wherever we see it, even if it is against our friends, fathers or brothers.
tgt_text: kuxhomekeke kuthi njengabazali noomawokhulu ukubaphatha nokubakhulisa ngendlela efanayo oonyana neentombi zethu.

src_text: let us be the generation that ends the oppression of women in all its forms, in our lifetime.
tgt_text: kuxhomekeke kuthi njengamadoda ukubuphikisa size sibugxeke ubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini nanini na xa sibubona, nkqu nokuba benziwa ngabahlobo bethu, ootata okanye abantakwethu.

src_text: the brave generation of 1956 marched for us all.
tgt_text: masibe sisizukulwana esiphelisa zonke iindlela zokucinezelwa kwabantu basetyhini, ngexesha lokudla kwethu ubomi.

src_text: we owe it to them, to ourselves and to future generations to not betray this noble legacy.
tgt_text: ukubhiyozela abantu basetyhini ukubhiyozela abantu basetyhini ngokubabandakanya kuqoqoshongokubabandakanya kuqoqosho vukuzenzele unnamed ngenyanga yethupha umzantsi afrika ubhiyozela inyanga yabantu basetyhini.

src_text: when i test positive for covid19, how long do i have to stay in isolation?
tgt_text: xa uvavanyo lundifumanisexa uvavanyo lundifumanisendinayo indinayo icovid19covid19 , kufanele, kufanelendihlale ixesha elingakananindihlale ixesha elingakananikugcino labucala?

src_text: people who test positive for covid19, but don’t have any symptoms, must remain in isolation at home or in a government isolation facility for 10 days, from the day they receive their positive test result.

src_text: let’s keep each other safe vukuzenzele unnamed our country has moved to alert level 2 in our response to the coronavirus pandemic.
tgt_text: masigcinane sikhuselekile vukuzenzele unnamed ilizwe lethu lehlele kwinqanaba lokulu mka lesi2 kwimpe ndulo yethu kubhu bhane wentsholongwa ne icorona .

src_text: this has come as a relief to all south africans who have had to live under stringent restrictions for the last five months.
tgt_text: oku kuni ke uninzi lwabantu basemzantsi afrika abe behlala phantsi kwemi qathango engqongqo kwezi nyanga zintlanu zidlulileyo isiqabu.

src_text: it is a sign of the progress we are making in reducing new infections and demand on our health facilities.
tgt_text: olu luphawu lwenkqubela esiyenzayo ekunciphiseni usuleleko olutsha nomthwa lo kumaziko wenkathalelo yezonyango wethu.

src_text: it is also a very important development as we strive to restart our economy.
tgt_text: ikwayi nkqubela phambili ebalu leke kakhulu njengokuba sizamela ukuqalisa ngoqo qosho lwethu.

src_text: but it is too soon to celebrate.
tgt_text: kodwa kusekutsha kakhu lu ukuba singakubhiyozela oku.

src_text: we are still very much in the middle of a deadly pandemic that has taken over 11,000 lives in south africa alone.
tgt_text: sisesembindini wobhubha ne obulalayo osele uthathe imiphefumlo engaphezulu kwe11 000 kumzantsi afri ka nje wodwa.

src_text: at more than half a million confirmed cases, we still have the fifth highest number of infections in the world.
tgt_text: kwizehlo zosuleleko ezingaphezulu kwesiqingatha sesigidi ezi ngqiniweyo, sisekwindawo yesihlanu ubuninzi bosule leko ehlabathini.

src_text: and there is always a chance of a resurgence of the disease.
tgt_text: kwaye akusoloko ekhona wona amathuba wokuba esi sifo singaphinda sivuke kwa khona.

src_text: if we ever need a stark reminder of the need for vigilance, we should look to recent events thousands of kilometres away in new zealand.
tgt_text: ukuba ngokuyinene sidi nga ukuzikhumbuza nge mfuno yokuba sihlale sipha phile, kufanele sikhangele kwizehlo zakutsha nje ku mgama ongamawaka nga mawaka weekilomitha kude le enew zealand.

src_text: three months since the country was declared coronavirusfree, new zealand is once again under lockdown.
tgt_text: kwisithu ba nje seenyanga ezintathu emva kokuba ela lizwe libhe ngezwe njengelingenayo intsholongwane icorona , inew zealand kwakhona ikwisimo sokuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile.

src_text: although the latest outbreak was of relatively few cases, the government swiftly reimposed lockdown restrictions.
tgt_text: nangona okwakutsha nje ukuqhambuka kwakho na kwale ntsholongwane kube zizehlo nje ezimbalwa, urhulumente ukhawulezise wamisela kwakhona imi qathango yokuvaleleka pha ntsi kwemiqathango ethile.

src_text: similar restrictions have had to be reimposed in several parts of europe as they experience a ‘second wave’ of infections.
tgt_text: imiqathango efanayo kuye kwanyanzeleka imiselwe kwakhona kwimimandla eliqela yaseyurobhu nje ngokuba baye beva ‘umsi nga wesibini’ wosuleleko.

src_text: these experiences show just how swiftly things can change when it comes to covid19.
tgt_text: la mava abonakalisa nje ukuba izinto zitshintsha msinya kangakanani na ngoku bhekisele kwicovid19 .

src_text: it is a wakeup call to any among us who may harbour illusions that we are even close to seeing the end of this grave public health emergency.
tgt_text: sisilumkiso eso kuye naba ni na onemibono yokubona into engekhoyo yokuba sesisondele esiphelweni sokuba kwimo enzima kaxa keka kumaziko wezempilo kawonkewonke.

src_text: certainly, there are signs of hope.
tgt_text: ngokuqinisekileyo, zikho na iimpawu zethemba zona.

src_text: the number of new confirmed cases in south africa continues to decline.
tgt_text: inani lezehlo ezitsha zosule leko ezingqiniweyo emza ntsi afrika ziyaqhubeka ukwehla.

src_text: at the peak of the disease just one month ago, we were recording around 12,000 new cases a day.
tgt_text: ngexesha sisenco tsheni yovuthondaba lwesi sifo kwinyanga nje enye edlu lileyo, besibhalisa malunga ne12 000 lezehlo ezitsha zo suleleko ngosuku.

src_text: this has dropped to an average of around 5,000 a day over the past week.
tgt_text: oku kuye kwehla kwafika kumyinge omalunga nama5 000 ngo suku kule veki idlulileyo.

src_text: our recovery rate stands at 80 percent.
tgt_text: izinga lethu lokuphucuka lumi kuma80 eepesenti.

src_text: as the country moves to alert level 2, many restrictions on social and economic activity have been lifted.
tgt_text: njengokuba ilizwe lehlele kwinqanaba lokulumka lesi2, imiqathango emi ninzi kwiintshukumo ze zolonwabo nezoqoqosho isusiwe.

src_text: with this comes increased risk of transmission.
tgt_text: oku kuhambelana nokwanda komngcipheko wokusasazeka.

src_text: we now need to manage this risk and ensure the gains we have made thus far in containing the pandemic’s spread are not reversed.
tgt_text: ngoku kufanele siwu lawule umngcipheko size siqinisekise ukuba iinzuzo esele sizizuzile ukuza ku tsho ngoku ekulawuleni ukunwena kwalo bhubhane asizibuyiseli mva.

src_text: the greatest threat to the health of nation right now is complacency.
tgt_text: esona soyikiso sikhulu kwimpilo yelungelo lesizwe ngoku kukwaneliseka.

src_text: it may be that we are now permitted to meet friends and family, to visit entertainment venues, to travel for leisure and to consume alcohol in restaurants, bars and taverns.
tgt_text: kuseno kuba sivumelekile ngoku ukuba sidibane nabahlobo neentsapho, siye kwiindawo zokuzonwabisa, sihambele ulonwabo nokusela utywala kwiindawo zokutyela, iibha ri neethaveni.

src_text: but as the old adage goes, just because you can, doesn’t mean you should.
tgt_text: kodwa ke njengoko lisi tsho iqhalo lakudala, into yokuba uyakwazi, ayithethi ukuba kufanele wenze.

src_text: many people who have the coronavirus do not have symptoms and may not even know they are infected.
tgt_text: uninzi lwabantu aba nentsholongwane icorona ababinazo iimpawu kwaye basenokungayazi nokuba bosulelekile.

src_text: this is a sobering reality because it means that any of us could be infected right now and could unwittingly infect others.
tgt_text: le yinyaniso ezolisayo kuba oku kuthetha ukuba nabani na apha kuthi usenokuba wosulelekile ngoku sithethayo kwaye usenokuba wosulela abanye engaqondanga.

src_text: this is particular the case when visiting relatives, especially the elderly and those with preexisting medical conditions that render them vulnerable to infection.
tgt_text: oku kungenzeka ngoku kodwa xa ehambele izihlobo, ingakumbi abantu abadala kunye nabo banezigulo abaphila nazo ezibenza babe sesichengeni sokosuleleka lula.

src_text: it is also true for attending religious services or cultural activities.
tgt_text: kukwayinyaniso uku ba naxa beye kwimisebenzi yezenkolo okanye yezenkcu beko.

src_text: the ‘second wave’ of infections that several other countries have experienced is an everpresent possibility for us too.
tgt_text: ‘umsinga wesibini’ wo suleleko athe amazwe ama ninzi awuva yinto eyaku hlala inokwenzeka nakuthi.

src_text: although many restrictions have been lifted, it does not mean they will not return should we experience a significant rise in infections.
tgt_text: nangona imiqathango emininzi irhoxisiwe, oko akuthethi ukuba ayinoku phinda ibuye xa sinoku phinda sehlelwe kukunyuka okukhulu kosuleleko.

src_text: this pandemic is a matter of life and death.
tgt_text: lo bhubhane yinto yokuphila nokufa.

src_text: we need to adapt and we need to be vigilant.
tgt_text: sidinga ukuziqhela nisa kwaye sidinga ukuba sihlale siphaphile.

src_text: in the days, weeks and months that lie ahead, we must urgently focus our efforts on recovery.
tgt_text: kwezi ntsuku, iiveki nee nyanga ezizayo, kufuneka sigxile ngokungxamiseki leyo kumalinge wethu oku phila.

src_text: our economy and our society has suffered a great deal.
tgt_text: uqoqosho noluntu lwethu luchaneke kakhulu.

src_text: as we return to economic activity across almost all industries – and work to repair the damage done – we have a responsibility to not let our guard down as individuals, employers, communities, families, professionals, workers and citizens.
tgt_text: njengokuba sibuyela kwii ntshukumo zezoqoqosho phantse kuwo onke ama shishini – nokusebenzela ukulungisa umonakalo owenzekileyo – sinoxanduva lokuba singayekeleli umxa katho umntu ngamnye, abaqeshi, uluntu, iintsapho, amagcisa ezemisebenzi, abasebenzi nabemi.

src_text: none of us wants a return to the early days of extreme lockdown restrictions.
tgt_text: akukho namnye kuthi ofu na ukubuyela kweza ntsuku zokuqala zemiqathango engqongqo yokuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile.

src_text: we want to move on with our lives.
tgt_text: sifuna ukuqhu bela phambili nobomi bethu.

src_text: we want our friends and loved ones to remain healthy and safe.
tgt_text: sifuna abahlobo bethu nabo sibathandayo bahlale bese mpilweni kwaye bekhuse lekile.

src_text: as a nation, let us continue to work together to ensure that we progress.
tgt_text: njengesizwe, masiqhubeke ukusebenza sonke uku qinisekisa ukuba siqhubela phambili.

src_text: the move to alert level 2 of the lockdown is not a ‘free for all.’ the rules on social distancing, mask wearing, social gatherings and international travel remain.
tgt_text: ukwehlela kwi nqanaba lokulumka lesi2 asinguye ‘uvula zibhuqe’.

src_text: our success rests on our ability to abide by these regulations and to ensure that we each behave carefully and responsibly.
tgt_text: umthetho wokugcina umgama wokuqelelana, ukunxitywa kwesigqubu thelo sobuso, iindibano zolonwabo nohambo phakathi kwezizwengezi zwe usemile.

src_text: every time we are considering any form of nonessen tial activity, we should ask: what is the risk of infection to ourselves and to others?
tgt_text: impumelelo yethu ixho mekeke kumandla oku kwazi ukuyithobela le mi miselo nokuqinisekisa ukuba siziphatha ngoku lumkileyo nangenkathalo umntu ngamnye kuthi.

src_text: where there is a risk, even a slight one, it is better not to do it.
tgt_text: ngalo lonke ixesha sicinga ngokwenza imisebenzi enge nguwo undoqo, kufanele sizibuze ukuba: ungakanani umngcipheko wokosule leka kwethu nabanye?

src_text: let us proceed, as ever, with caution.
tgt_text: apho kukho khona umngcipheko, nokuba umncinci kangaka nani na, kungcono ungabi sakwenza oko ubukucinga.

src_text: let us keep each other safe.
tgt_text: masigcinane sikhuselekile vukuzenzele unnamed ilizwe lethu lehlele kwinqanaba lokulu mka lesi2 kwimpe ndulo yethu kubhu bhane wentsholongwa ne icorona .

src_text: protect our women and children vukuzenzele unnamed a year ago, almost to the day, thousands of wom en, men and children marched to parliament to protest against a spate of rapes and killings of women and girls.
tgt_text: khusela amanina nabantwana vukuzenzele unnamed kunyaka ophelileyo, phantse ngolu suku, amawaka amanina, amadoda nabantwana benza umngcelele oya epalamente bekhalazela iziganeko zokudlwengulwa nokubulawa kwamanina namantombazana.

src_text: at the time, the nation was reeling from the murders of uyinene mrwetyana, leighandre jegels, jesse hess and a number of other women who had lost their lives at the hands of brutal men.
tgt_text: ngelo xesha, isizwe sasixhelekile kukubulawa kukauyinene mrwetyana, uleighandre jegels, ujesse hess kunye namanye amanina aphulukana nobomi bawo ebulawa ngamadoda anobundlobongela.

src_text: from all social backgrounds, young and old, students and working women, the peaceful protesters held aloft placards that read ‘enough is enough’ and ‘am i next?’.
tgt_text: abaqhankqalazi ababenoxolo, bephuma kwiindawo ngeendawo, bequka abancinci nabadala, abafundi kunye namanina asebenzayo, babephethe amaxwebhu amakhulu bewaphakamisele phezulu kwaye ayefundeka ngolu hlobo 'enough is enough' amanye ebhalwe ' am i next?'.

src_text: the anguish and the anger was palpable that day.
tgt_text: intlungu nomsindo zazibhalwe ebusweni babantu ngaloo mini.

src_text: as i received their clearly articulated demands, it was clear to me that we needed to act urgently and with determination.
tgt_text: njengokuba ndandifumana izikhalazo zabo ezicaciswe gca, kwakucacile kum ukuba kufuneka sithathe amanyathelo ngokungxamisekileyo nangokuzimisela.

src_text: it was important to me that i did not respond with hollow words and empty promises.
tgt_text: kwakubalulekile kum ukuba ndingaphenduli nje ndingadlulisi usana kunina xa ndibaphendula futhi ndenze nezithembiso endingazi kuzizalisekisa.

src_text: a few days later, i called a joint sitting of parliament, where we announced a r1.6 billion emergency response action plan to combat genderbased violence and femicide (gbvf).
tgt_text: emva kwentsuku ezimbalwa, ndabiza indibano yezindlu zombini zepalamente, apho ndazisa isicwangciso sokusebenza esingxamisekileyo esasiza kutyabula isigidigidi seerandi esiyi1.6 sokulwa ubundlobongela obubhekiselele kwisini kunye nokubulawa kwamanina (igbvf).

src_text: over the six months of its implementation, public spending in various government departments was reprioritised to support interventions for care and support for survivors, for awareness and prevention campaigns, to improve laws and policies, to promote the economic empowerment of women, and to strengthen the criminal justice system.
tgt_text: kwezi nyanga zintandathu zokuqhuba kwesi sicwangciso, urhulumente woxule imali kumasebe ahlukeneyo ache; wayithumela kumaphulo okuncedisa kunakekelo nenkxaso yabo basinde kwintlungu yegbvf , kumaphulo okufundisa nokuthintela igbvf , okuphucu la imithetho nemigaqonkqubo, okukhuthaza ukuxhotyiswa kwamanina ngokwezoqoqosho nokwenza ngqingqwa nangcono icandelo lezolwaphulomthetho nobulungisa.

src_text: and now we are on the cusp of the most farreaching legislative overhaul in the fight against gbvf.
tgt_text: kwaye ngoku sekumbovu ukuba senze utshintsho olumandla kwimithetho yokulwa negbvf .

src_text: three key bills relating to gbvf have been introduced in parliament recently.
tgt_text: imithetho eyilwayo engundoqo emithathu enxulumene nobundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini isanda kungeniswa epalamente.

src_text: through the introduction of these bills, we are honouring the promise we made to the protestors last year and to all the women of this country.
tgt_text: ngokungenisa le mithetho iyilwayo, sizalisekisa isithembiso esasenza kubaqhankqalazi kunyaka ophelileyo nakuwo onke amanina eli.

src_text: the three amendment bills are designed to fill the gaps that allow some perpetrators of these crimes to evade justice and to give full effect to the rights of our country’s women and children.
tgt_text: le mithetho iyilwayo mithathu yenziwe izilungiso ilungiselelwe kanye ukuvala izikhewu ezivumela abanye baba bophulimthetho ukuba bakwazi ukungaziva izithonga zomthetho futhi ifezekisa namalungelo amanina nabantwana belizwe lethu.

src_text: these bills, once finalised, will help to restore the confidence of our country’s women that the law is indeed there to protect them.
tgt_text: le mithetho iyilwayo, nje yakuba igqitywe, iya kunceda ukubuyisela ukuzithemba kwamanina elizwe lethu ukuba umthetho ukhona ngokwenene ukubakhusela.

src_text: the first is the bill to amend the criminal law (sexual offences and related matters) amendment act.
tgt_text: owokuqala ngumthetho oyilwayo owenza izilungiso kumthethosihlomelo womthetho wolwaphu lomthetho (amatyala esondo kunye nemicimbi enxulumene noko).

src_text: this creates a new offence of sexual intimidation, extends the ambit of the offence of incest, and extends the reporting duty of persons who suspect a sexual offence has been committed against a child.
tgt_text: oku kudala ityala elitsha lokugrogrisa ngokwesondo, kwandise izinto ezinokuqukwa kwityala lombulo, futhi kwandise nomsebenzi wokunika ingxelo wabantu abakrokrela ukuba ulwaphulomthetho ngokwesondo lwenziwe emntwaneni.

src_text: it expands the scope of the national register for sex offenders (nrso) to include the particulars of all sex offenders.
tgt_text: yandisa iinkcukacha ezifakwa kwirejista kazwelonke yabaphulimthetho ngokwesondo (inrso) zitsho ziquke iinkcukacha zabo bonke abaphulimthetho ngokwesondo.

src_text: until now, it has only applied to sex offenders convicted of sex crimes perpetrated against children or persons with mental disabilities.
tgt_text: kude kube ngoku, ibikade iquka kuphela abaphulimthetho abadlwengule abantwana okanye abantu abakhubazeke ngokwengqondo.

src_text: the time an offender’s particulars must remain on the register has been increased, and those listed on the register will have to disclose this when they submit applications to work with vulnerable persons.

src_text: the bill also provides for the names of persons on the nrso to be publicly available.

src_text: this was one of the issues that was raised sharply during my engagement with the south african national editors’ forum recently.
tgt_text: lo ngomnye wemiba ethe yaphakanyiswa kabukhali ngexesha lothethathethwano lwam neqonga labahle li besizwe basemzantsi afri ka (isanef) kutsha nje.

src_text: instead of lamenting their fate, however, the media industry is working hard to refine business models, to drive innovation and to retain staff as much as possible.
tgt_text: endaweni yokusizela imeko yabo, noxa kunjalo, ushishino lwezendaba lusebenza nzima ukuphucula iindlela zezoshi shino, ukuqhuba ubuchule kunye nokugcina abasebenzi kangangoko lunako.

src_text: at the same time, the media is a unique entity in any society because its practitioners fulfil a role that is so essential to our democratic order.
tgt_text: kwangaxesha nye, ijelo leendaba liqumrhu elilodwa kulo naluphi na uluntu kuba abasebenzi balo bazalisekisa indima ebaluleke kakhulu kulawulo lwentando yethu yesininzi.

src_text: they work to keep the public informed and to keep power in check.
tgt_text: umsebenzi walo kukugcina uluntu luso loko lusazi kwaye lugcina abasemagunyeni bephantsi kweliso.

src_text: we need more journalists, not less.
tgt_text: sidinga iintatheli ezininzi, hayi ezimbalwa.

src_text: that is why the loss of even a single journalist is not just a loss to the industry but to the country.
tgt_text: kungoko ke ukulahlekelwa yintatheli nje enye asiyolahleko nje kolu shishino kodwa yilahleko kwisizwe jikelele.

src_text: we need our media veterans, who bring with them vast experience and institutional memory, and are able to offer critical reportage and informed analysis.
tgt_text: sidinga amagqala wethu kumajelo eendaba, aza kunye namava amaninzi neenkumbulo zeziko, kwaye nakwaziyo ukubonelela ngokunika ingxelo ehlaba amadlala nophononongo olusemxholweni.

src_text: at the same time we need more young journalists in the profession who are techsavvy, abreast with new trends in storytelling and in touch with the concerns of a youthful population.
tgt_text: kwangaxe sha nye sidinga iintatheli ezi selula ezininzi kweli khondo nanolwazi lobuchwepheshe, anolwazi oluhambelana nala maxesha ekubaliseni amabali kwaye ezinolwazi ngeenkxa labo zolutsha.

src_text: as a society we owe the media our full support.
tgt_text: njengoluntu amajelo eendaba adinga inkxaso yethu.

src_text: whether it is electing to pay for content, supporting crowdfunded journalism, paying our sabc license fees or simply buying a newspaper, we can all play our part to support this industry in crisis.
tgt_text: nokuba kungokukhe tha ukuhlawulela umxholo, ngokuxhasa ubuntatheli obuhlawulelwa igquba, ngokuhlawula umrhumo welayisenisi yeziko losasazo lomzantsi afrika (isabc) okanye njengokuthenga iphe phandaba, sonke singadlala indima yethu ukuxhasa olu shishino lukwintlekele.

src_text: as government, despite the gloomy economic climate we will continue to extend advertising spend to publications and broadcasters, especially community media.
tgt_text: nje ngorhulumente, nangona ime ko yezoqoqosho imfiliba nje siza kuqhubeka ukwandisa inkcitho yokwenza iintengiso kushicilelo nakusasazo, inga kumbi kumajelo eendaba oluntu.

src_text: the private sector must also continue to support the industry through advertising and working with media houses in the production of innovative content in line with global media trends.
tgt_text: namacandelo abucala ku funeka nawo aqhubeke uku xhasa olu shishino ngokwe nza iintengiso nokusebenzi sana namaziko ezendaba eku veliseni umxholo onobuchule ngokuhambelana nentsingi selo yamajelo eendaba ehla bathini jikelele.

src_text: local philanthropic and donor organisations should also come on board and support public interest journalism ventures, as is the case in many democracies.
tgt_text: abathandi babantu balapha ekhaya nemibutho yesisa kufanele nayo izeke mzekweni ize ixhase amalinge obuntatheli obukwimfuno yoluntu, njengoko kunjalo kumazwe amaninzi aphantsi kolawulo lwentando yesininzi.

src_text: the proliferation of fake news during the pandemic, primarily on social media platforms, has added to the urgency for more news that is accurate, fair and impartial.
tgt_text: ukwanda kweendaba zobuxoki ngeli xesha lika bhubhane, okuqala ku maqonga ezonxulumelwano, kukwandisile ukungxamise ka kokufuneka kweendaba ezongezelelweyo eziyinyani so, ezingenamkhethe nezi ngakhethi cala.

src_text: during this time our people have relied on our established media houses for information, once again underscoring their importance as pillars of our democracy.
tgt_text: ngeli xesha abantu bakuthi baxhomekeke kumaziko wethu weendaba asekiweyo ukufumana ulwazi, kwakhona ukugxi ninisa ukubaluleka kwawo njengeentsika zolawulo lwentando yesininzi.

src_text: as we begin the great task of rebuilding our economy in the aftermath of the pandemic, the media industry will need our support more than ever.
tgt_text: njengoko siqalisa umse benzi omkhulu wokwakha uqoqosho lwethu emva kwesiphumo sikabhubhane, ushishino lwezeendaba luza kuyidinga kakhulu ngoku inkxaso yethu kunangapha mbili.

src_text: the free press was once described as ‘the unsleeping guardian of every other right that free men and women prize’.
tgt_text: amajelo eendaba asemzantsi afrika ayintsika engundoqo kulawulo lwethu lwentando yesininzi vukuzenzele unnamed kumazwe amani nzi ehlabathini jikelele, ubhu bhane wentsholongwane icorona uye wafunisa uku ba kubekho ukuthintelwa kweenkululeko ezininzi kubemi waza wabeka intla lontle kuvavanyo.

src_text: transforming the agricultural sector vukuzenzele unnamed recently, the department of agriculture, land reform and rural development (dalrrd) announced that members of the public will be able to apply to lease 700 000 hectares of underutilised or vacant state land in seven of the provinces.
tgt_text: ukwenza inguqu kwicandelo lezolimo vukuzenzele unnamed kutsha nje, isebe lezolimo, ukubuyekezwa komhlaba nophu hliso lwamaphandle (idlrd) libhengeze ukuba abantu baza ku kwazi ukufaka izicelo zokuba baqeshe umhlaba karhulumente ozii hektare ezingama700 000 ongasetyenziswa ngokwaneleyo okanye ongenanto kumapho ndo asixhenxe.

src_text: agricultural land is the mainstay of our natural resource base.
tgt_text: umhlaba wokulima usisise ko somthombo wethu wenda lo.

src_text: the availability and sustainable use of farmland to grow crops and for animal husbandry is key to our very survival.
tgt_text: ukuze sikwazi ukuphila kufuneka kubekho umhlaba wokulima nokufuya futhi usetyenziswe ngononophelo.

src_text: south africa has vast tracts of land suitable for agricultural production, with 37,9% of our total land area currently being used for commercial agriculture.
tgt_text: umzantsi afrika unemimadla yomhlaba otyebileyo olungele iimveliso zezolimo, kangangokuba sithetha nje umhlaba weli ongama37,9% usetyenziselwa amaphulo ezolimo lwentengo.

src_text: like many other countries, our arable land is under threat from land degradation, water scarcity and urban encroachment.
tgt_text: njengamanye amazwe amaninzi, umhlaba wethu wokulima usemngciphe kweni wokuphelelwa lixabi so, ukunqatyelwa ngamanzi kunye nokungenelela kwee dolophu kuwo.

src_text: we are also losing prime agricultural land through landuse changes.
tgt_text: sikwaphu lukana nomhlaba wokulima obalulekileyo kuba utshi ntshwa usetyenziselwe izinto ezingadibananga nolimo.

src_text: given our history, broadening access to agricultural land for commercial production and subsistence farming is a national priority.
tgt_text: njengoko sonke siyazi imbali yeli lizwe, ke ngoko ukukhokelisa njengomba ophambili kwisizwe ukufikelela kumhlaba wokulima ukwenzela iimveliso zezo rhwebo futhi nokulimela uku zondla kubalulekile.

src_text: although the post1994 land reform process has resulted in more land being restored and restituted to black south africans, the pernicious effects of the 1913 natives land act continue to be in patterns of farmland ownership.
tgt_text: nangona iinkqubo zokuthathwa nokubuyiswa ko mhlaba ezaqala emva ko nyaka we1994 zakhokelela ekubeni umhlaba omninzi ubuyiselwe kubantu aba ntsundu bomzantsi afri ka, umonakalo owenziwa ngumthetho womhlaba wabantu bomthonyama wowe1913 usabonakala nangoku kubuninimhlaba wasezifama.

src_text: the act went far beyond dispossessing millions of people of their ancestral land.
tgt_text: lo mthetho zange ususe nje izigidi zabantu kumhlaba wokhokho babo wade wa gqithisa.

src_text: with land ownership still concentrated in the hands of the few, and agriculture primary production and value chains mainly owned by white commercial farmers, the effects of our past remain with us today.
tgt_text: njengoko umhlaba usesezandleni zegcuntswana labantu, futhi iimveliso zezolimo zokuqala kunye nawo onke amashishini asebenzisanayo ngazo asaphethwe ngamafama orhwe bo amhlophe, loo nto ithetha ukuba iziphumo zomonakalo wangaphambili zisabonakala nanamhlanje.

src_text: the continued monopolization of a key means of production like land is not just an obstacle to advancing a more egalitarian society; it is also a recipe for social unrest.
tgt_text: ukuqhubeka kokuxhamla kwegcuntswana kuphela kumthombo ongundoqo wokuvelisa ofana nomhlaba ayingomqobo nje kuphela othintela ukuqhubela pha mbili ngakumbi ukuxhasa isizwe sone; ikwayingxaki enokubangela ukuba abantu bade bavukele umbuso.

src_text: the hunger for land to farm is growing, especially amongst the rural poor.
tgt_text: inani labantu abalambela ukuba nomhlaba babe ngamafama liyakhula, ingakumbi kubantu abangathathi ntweni basemaphandleni.

src_text: and for a number of reasons, the pace of land reform in this particular sector has been slow and unsatisfactory.
tgt_text: kwaye ngenxa yezizathu ezithile, isantya sokubuyiselwa ko mhlaba kweli candelo siha mba kancinci futhi ngendlela engamkelekilyo.

src_text: transforming patterns of agricultural land ownership is vital not just to address the historical injustices of the past, but to safeguard our nation’s food security.
tgt_text: ukwenza inguqu kwimbonakalo yobuninimhlaba wezolimo kubalulekile kungenzelwa nje ukulungisa intswela bulungisa yembali yangapha mbili, kodwa oku kwenzelwa ukuqinisekisa ngokhuseleko lokubakho kokutya okwaneleyo kwisizwe sakowethu.

src_text: as noted in the 2019 report of the presidential advisory panel on land reform and agriculture, "whilst we export food, back home 41% of people in rural areas and 59,4% in urban areas have severely inadequate access to food."
tgt_text: njengoko kuqatshelwe kwingxelo yowama2019 yeqela labacebisi bakamo ngameli elijongene nokubu yiselwa komhlaba nezolimo ukuba, "nangona sithumela ukutya kumazwe angapha ndle, apha ekhaya abantu basemaphandleni abangama41% kunye nabasezi dolophini abangama59,4% bathwaxwa yingxaki yoku nqongophala kakhulu koku tya.

src_text: agrarian reform has been a priority of successive administrations since democracy.
tgt_text: "uhlaziyo lezolimo ibisoloko ingumba ophambili wolawulo olulandelelanayo ukusukela oko sabaphantsi kolawulo lwentando yesininzi.

src_text: between 1994 and march 2018 the state has delivered 8,4 million hectares of land to previously disadvantaged individuals under the land reform programme.
tgt_text: phakathi kowe1994 nenya nga yokwindla yowama2018, umbuso unike abantu ababehlelelekile ngaphambili u mhlaba ozihekthare ezizigidi ezisi8,4 phantsi kwenkqubo yokubuyiswa komhlaba.

src_text: but this progress amounts to less than 10% of all commercial farmland.
tgt_text: noko kunjalo, lo mhlaba sele unikezelwe ungaphantsi kwe10% zawo wonke u mhlaba wokulima wobufama bentengo.

src_text: in my state of the nation address earlier this year i committed that stateowned agricultural land would soon be released for farming.
tgt_text: ngethuba ndisenza intetho engobume besizwe ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka ndathembisa ukuba umhlaba karhulumente wokulima uza kukhululelwa ukuba kwenziwe ukufama kuwo.

src_text: this is a major milestone in the agrarian reform process, and gives effect to the promise of the freedom charter that the land shall be shared among those who work it.
tgt_text: le ibe yimpumelelo elibalulekileyo kwinkqubo yohlaziyo lwezemihlaba, kwaye kuzalisekisa isithembiso esasenziwe kumqulu wenkululeko wokuba umhlaba kuza kwabelwana ngawo ngabo bawusebenzayo.

src_text: our redistributive vision aims to strike a balance between social justice and redress, and enhancing agricultural output by bringing more black farmers into the mainstream of the economy.
tgt_text: umbono wethu wokubu yisela umhlaba uneenjongo zokuqinisekisa ukuba kukho ukulingana phakathi kobulungisa kwezentlalo noku lungiswa umonakalo wanga phambili, kwaye kwandiswa imveliso yezolimo ngokuthi kufakwe amafama amnyama kumacandelo angundoqo namakhulu ezoqoqosho.

src_text: land is a productive asset that generates profit and can be used for collateral to secure other assets.
tgt_text: umhlaba bubutyebi obu ngenisa inzuzo obunokuse tyenziswa njengesibambiso xa umntu efuna ukuthenga into ethile enexabiso.

src_text: we have to ensure that land acquired for farming purposes is productively used.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba umhlaba ofunyanelwe ukufama usetyenziswa nge ndlela enemveliso.

src_text: to safeguard the allocated state land for farming purposes, the lease is not transferrable.
tgt_text: ukukhu sela umhlaba karhulumente onikezelelwe ngeenjongo zokufama, isivumelwano sokuqesha umhlaba asidluliselwa komnye umntu.

src_text: beneficiaries will sign a lease agreement with the state and pay a rental fee consistent with the land value.
tgt_text: abo bafumana umhlaba baza kutyikitya isivumelwano sokuqesha umhlaba norhulumente bahlale imali yokuqe sha loo mhlaba ngokwexabiso lawo elaziwayo.

src_text: we must also ensure that farmers are supported along the road to sustainability and profitability.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqinisekise kwa khona ukuba amafama afu mana inkxaso xa ezama uku ba amashishini awo anozinzo kwaye enza nengeniso.

src_text: as part of this programme, beneficiaries will be trained in financial management and enterprise development.
tgt_text: njengenxalenye yale nkqubo, abaxhamli baza kufumana uqeqesho ngeza khono zolawulo lwezimali kunye nophuhliso lwama shishini asakhulayo.

src_text: experience has shown that emerging and smallscale farmers often lack the financial skills to exploit market opportunities and integrate with value chains.
tgt_text: ama va angaphambili asibonisa ukuba amafama asakhasayo namancinci kumaxa amaninzi awabinazo izakhono zezimali ukuze akwazi ukusebenzisa amathuba akhoyo kurhwebo nokusebenzisana namanye amashishini akweli candelo.

src_text: we are prioritizing women, youth and persons with disabilities as beneficiaries.
tgt_text: siwuthatha njengomba ophambili ukuqala ngabantu basetyhini, ulutsha kunye nabantu abakhubazekileyo njengabaxhamli kule nkqubo.

src_text: there has been demonstrable success with empowering women farmers under the existing proactive land acquisition strategy.
tgt_text: sibone iziphumo ezincumisayo kumaphulo ethu okuxhobisa abantu basetyhini abangamafama phantsi kwale nkqubo ikhoyo yepro active acquisition strategy (iplas).

src_text: in a number of provinces, women who have been allocated farms by the dalrrd have been able to run them successfully and even move into commercial production.
tgt_text: kumaphondo amaninzi, abantu basetyhini abanikwe iifama yidlrd bakwazile ukuziqhuba ngempumelelo kwaye bakwazi nokunyukela kwinqanaba lokuvelisela ukurhweba.

src_text: in addition to the land acquisition itself, the department continues to invest in infrastructure, equipment and machinery to enable these entrepreneurs to run successful businesses.
tgt_text: ukongeza kumba wokufumaneka komhlaba ngokwawo, eli sebe liyaqhubeka nokutyala imali kwiziseko ezingundoqo, izixhobo zokusebenza kunye noomatshini ukuze kuncedwe aba somashishini bancinci ukuze baqhube ushishino lwabo ngokuyimpumelelo.

src_text: broadening access to land and opportunities for farming will support job creation and enterprise development, and improve the market for food, agricultural goods and services.
tgt_text: ukunabisa ukufumaneka komhlaba namathuba okuba ngamafama kuza kudala imisebenzi nophuhliso lwama shishini amancinci, kuze kuphucule nenani labantu abathenga ukutya, iimveliso kunye neenkonzo zezolimo.

src_text: the ultimate goal of releasing these land parcels is to transform the agricultural landscape by growing a new generation of farmers.
tgt_text: eyona njongo iphambili yokukhululela lo mhlaba ebantwini kukwenza iinguqu kwezolimo ngokuthi kwandiswe isizukulwana samafama amatsha.

src_text: leasing land under such favourable conditions must spur them to think big; to not just grow their own businesses but to advance shared wealth and prosperity in the communities in which they farm.
