tgt_text: ukuqeshisa ngomhlaba phantsi kwemeko elula ngolu hlobo kufanele kubahlupheze batsho babe namaphupha amakhulu; bangazameli nje ukukhulisa awabo amashishini koko baqhubele phambili ubutyebi bokwabelana nokuhluma koluntu kwiindawo abaqhuba ukufama kuzo,kufuneka bapholise iya ntlukwano yangaphambili.

src_text: they must heal the deep divisions of our past.
tgt_text: kufuneka baluphikise olu luvo lungenabunyani lokuba ngamafama amhlophe kuphela emzantsi afrika anamashishini aqhuba kaku hle kakhulu kwezentengo nokuba amafama angabantu abantsundu akuhlala ’ekhasa’.

src_text: they must dispel the stereotype that only white farmers are commercially successful in south africa, and that black farmers are perpetually ‘emerging.’in working this land; in turning it to productive use, they will indeed turn swords into ploughshares.
tgt_text: ngokusebenza lo mhlaba, ukuwuguqula ube ngove lisayo, baya kuba ngoku yinene bafezekisa amaphupha okujika izikrweqe zokulwa zibe ngamakhuba okusebenza umhlaba.

src_text: they will become the faces of national reconciliation.
tgt_text: ukwenza inguqu kwicandelo lezolimo vukuzenzele unnamed kutsha nje, isebe lezolimo, ukubuyekezwa komhlaba nophu hliso lwamaphandle (idlrd) libhengeze ukuba abantu baza ku kwazi ukufaka izicelo zokuba baqeshe umhlaba karhulumente ozii hektare ezingama700 000 ongasetyenziswa ngokwaneleyo okanye ongenanto kumapho ndo asixhenxe.

src_text: building a society that works vukuzenzele unnamed the launch of the presidential employment stimulus last week marks a fundamental shift in our ap proach to tackling unem ployment.
tgt_text: ukuvuselela uqoqosho olusebenzayo vukuzenzele unnamed ukuphehlelelwa kwesicwa ngciso sika mongameli sokudala imisebenzi kwiveki ephelileyo kubonise utshintsho olukhulu kwindlela yethu yoku lwa nentswelangqesho.

src_text: we are undertaking a farreaching and ambitious public investment in human capital, with the state as both a creator and an enabler of jobs.
tgt_text: senza utyalomali loluntu olukhuthazayo noluchaphazela abantu abaninzi kwiza khono nolwazi lwabantu, apho urhulumente njengomvelisi kunye nomenzi wemisebenzi.

src_text: the presidential employment stimulus is unprecedented in its scale and breadth, involving a public investment of r100 billion over the next three years.
tgt_text: isicwangciso sikamongameli sokudala imisebenzi asizange senziwe ngaphambili ngokobukhulu nangokobubanzi baso, kuquka utyalomali loluntu lweebhiliyoni ezilir100 zeerandi kule minyaka mithathu izayo.

src_text: we will protect and create directlyfunded jobs and livelihood support interventions while the labour market recovers from the coronavirus pandemic.
tgt_text: siza kuyikhusela futhi siyivelise imisebenzi exhaswa ngezimali ngokuthe ngqo kunye nenkxaso yokuphila ngelixa imarike yezabasebenzi ibuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo kulo bhubhane wentsholo ngwane icorona.

src_text: each of these is ready for implementation, and is additional to existing commitments.
tgt_text: nganye kwezi ikulungele uku phunyezwa, futhi yongezwa kwizibophelelo ezikhoyo.

src_text: while some of the interventions build on the strengths of existing programmes, the stimulus also includes new and innovative approaches.
tgt_text: ngelixa amanye ama ngenelelo esakha kwiinkqubo ezikhoyo ezinamandla, ukuvuselela kukwaquka iindlela ezintsha kunye nokuqaliswa kwezinto ezintsha.

src_text: this includes a focus on what we have termed ‘social employment’.
tgt_text: oku kuquka ukugxila kwinto esiyibize ngokuba 'kukuqeshwa koluntu'.

src_text: we are working from the premise that there is no shortage of work to be done to address the many social problems in our society.
tgt_text: sisebenza kuluvo lokuba akukho kunqongophala komsebenzi ekufuneka kwenziwe ukulu ngisa iingxaki ezininzi zolu ntu kwiindawo esihlala kuzo.

src_text: the aim is to support the considerable creativity, initiative and institutional capabilities that exist in the wider society to engage people in work that serves the common good.
tgt_text: injongo kukuxhasa ubuchule obukhulu bokuyila, izakhono zenyathelo lokuqala kunye nezeziko elikhoyo kuluntu ngokubanzi ukubandakanya abantu kumsebenzi onenzuzo kumntu wonke.

src_text: this work cuts across a range of themes, including food security, ending genderbased violence, informal settlement upgrading and much more.
tgt_text: lo mse benzi uchaphazela uluhlu lwemixholo emininzi, equka ukhuseleko lokutya, ukuphe liswa kobundlobongela obuse kelwe kwisini, ukuphuculwa kweendawo zoogobityholo nokunye okuninzi.

src_text: this will supplement the efforts of the public sector, allowing for greater scale and social impact as well as new forms of partnership with diverse social actors.
tgt_text: oku kuza kongeza iinzame zecandelo likarhulumente, elivumela ukubandakanywa kwabantu abaninzi kunye nefuthe lezentlalo kunye neendlela ezintsha zobambiswano nabantu abohlukeneyo ababandakanyekayo kwezentlalo.

src_text: the stimulus includes a new national programme to employ teaching and school assistants in schools.
tgt_text: isicwangciso siquka inkqubo entsha yesizwe yokuqesha ootitshala nabancedisi bezikolo ezikolweni.

src_text: schools are making these appointments right now, delivering new opportunities in every community across the length and breadth of the country.
tgt_text: izikolo ziyaqesha ngoku, zibonelela ngamathuba amatsha kulu ntu lonke kubude nobubanzi belizwe.

src_text: public employment is not just for unskilled work.
tgt_text: ukuqeshwa koluntu asingomsebenzi onge nasakhono kuphela.

src_text: there is a crosscutting focus on graduates, with opportunities for nurses, science graduates, artisans and others.
tgt_text: kukho ukugxila okuchaphazela abo banezidanga, ngamathuba kubongikazi, abanezidanga kwezenzululwazi, amagcisa kunye nabanye.

src_text: the stimulus will also protect jobs in vulnerable sectors that have been hit hard by the pandemic.
tgt_text: isicwangciso kwakhona siza kukhusela imisebenzi kumacandelo asemngciphekweni athe antlithwa ngulo bhu bhane.

src_text: support will be provided to early childhood development practitioners, mainly selfemployed women.
tgt_text: inkxaso iza kunike zelwa kumagcisa ophuhliso lwabantwana abasakhulayo, ingakumbi amanina azisebenzelayo.

src_text: over 74,000 small farmers will also receive production input grants.
tgt_text: angaphezulu kwama74,000 amafama amancinci aza kuzifumana nawo izibonelelo zongenelo lwemveliso.

src_text: as a nation, we need arts and culture to lift our spirits once more – the stimulus provides new funding to help the sector back onto its feet, including support to digital contentcreation and expansion of ecommerce platforms.
tgt_text: njengesizwe, sifuna ubugcisa kunye nenkcubeko ukuvuselela imimoya yethu kwakhona – isicwangciso sinikezela ngenkxasomali entsha ukunceda icandelo ukuba libuyele esimeni salo, kuquka nenkxaso yokuvelisa umxholo wedijithali kunye nokwandiswa kwamaqonga orhwebo ngeintanethi.

src_text: this will enable artists to adapt to the new market conditions that the pandemic has imposed on us all and to seize new opportunities for growth.
tgt_text: oku kuza kwenza ukuba amagcisa akwazi ukuziqhelanisa neemeko ezintsha zorhwebo ezenziwe ngulo bhubhane kuthi sonke futhi athathe la mathuba matsha okukhula.

src_text: a critical enabler for wider job creation, made more important by the pandemic, is connectivity.
tgt_text: isibonelelo esibalulekileyo esibanzi sokudala imisebenzi, esenziwe sabaluleka nga kumbi ngenxa yalo bhubha ne, lunxibelelwano.

src_text: to overcome the digital divide, the stimulus will provide affordable, highspeed broadband to lowincome households through innovative connection subsidies and the expansion of free public wifi.
tgt_text: ukoyisa iyantlukwano yedijithali, ukuvuselela kuza kunikezela ngeintanethi ehamba ngesa ntya esiphezulu ngexabiso eli phantsi, kumakhaya afumana imivuzo ephantsi ngendlela yeenkxaso yonxibelelwano loqaliso lwezinto ezintsha kunye nokwandiswa kwe wifi yasimahla yoluntu.

src_text: as our country recovers from the devastation of the coronavirus pandemic, we are in no doubt as to the size of the task before us.
tgt_text: njengokuba ilizwe lethu libuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo emva yentshabalalo yalo bhubhane wentsholongwane icorona, asithandabuzi ngobukhulu bomsebenzi ophambi kwethu.

src_text: we have to achieve an economic recovery that is swift and inclusive.
tgt_text: kufuneka siphumeze ukubuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo koqoqosho olukhawulezayo futhi nolubandakanyayo.

src_text: we have to get as many of our people as possible working again.
tgt_text: kufuneka senze ukuba abantu bethu abaninzi babuyele emisebenzini kwakhona kanga ngoko kunokwenzeka.

src_text: we also have to regain lost ground in the provision of basic services and critical infrastructure, addressing social challenges and transforming townships and rural communities too.
tgt_text: kwa khona kufuneka sizuze inkxa so esiphulukene nayo yobone lelo ngeenkonzo ezisisiseko kunye neziseko ezingundoqo ezibalulekileyo, ukujongana nemicelimngeni kwezentlalo nokuguqula iilokishi kunye noluntu lwasemaphandleni.

src_text: public employment is an instrument that can do all of the above: creating jobs at scale in the short term while markets recover, and creating social value in the process.
tgt_text: ukuqeshwa koluntu sisixhobo esinokukwenza konke oku kungentla: ukuvelisa imisebenzi kangangoko ngexesha elifutshane ngelixa iimarike zibuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo, kunye nokuvelisa ixabiso lentlalontle kwangaxeshanye.

src_text: the example is often cited of the massive public works programme undertaken by the united states after the great depression in the 1930s.
tgt_text: umzekelo uhlala ukha nkanywa kwinkqubo enkulu yemisebenzi karhulumente eyenziwa yimelika emva kokudakumba okukhulu kwamashishini kwiminyaka yowee1930.

src_text: this was not just a stimulus, but also promoted social participation and inclusion.
tgt_text: oku yayingekuko nje ukuvuselela, kodwa yayikukukhuthaza ukuthatha inxaxheba kwezentlalo kunye nokuqukwa.

src_text: there are several examples of innovative public employment programmes in the developing world, including in india, ethiopia and here in south africa.
tgt_text: mininzi imizekelo yeenkqubo zemisebenzi yoluntu yo kuqaliswa kwezinto ezintsha kwilizwe elisakhulayo, kuquka eindia, eethiopia nalapha emzantsi afrika.

src_text: these programmes make a direct investment in local economies, reaching poorer areas first, supporting local small enterprises and trickling up into the wider economy from there.
tgt_text: ezi nkqubo zenza utyalomali oluthe ngqo kuqoqosho lwa sekhaya, zifikelela kwiindawo ezihlwempuzekileyo kuqala, zixhasa amashishini ama ncinci asekuhlaleni zize zi dluliselwe kuqoqosho oluba nzi ukusuka apho.

src_text: they also promote social participation and inclusion, providing communities with the means to change their lives as they undertake new forms of work.
tgt_text: zikwakhuthaza ukuthatha inxaxheba kwezentlalo kunye nokuqukwa, kokubonelelwa koluntu ngeendlela zokutshintsha ubomi balo nje ngoko luqala iintlobo ezintsha zomsebenzi.

src_text: in doing so, they contribute to transformation both at a local level and within broader society.
tgt_text: ngokwenza njalo, luba negalelo kutshintsho kwinqanaba lasekuhlaleni kunye nololuntu ngokubanzi.

src_text: direct public investment to support employment and create economic opportunities that generate social value does more than just tackle the unemployment crisis.
tgt_text: utyalomali loluntu oluthe ngqo kukuxhasa ingqesho kunye nokuvelisa amathuba ezoqoqosho avelisa ixabiso lentlalontle oluya kwenza ngaphezulu kunokujongana nengxaki yentswelangqesho.

src_text: it is responsive, because it uses the state’s resources to respond to local community needs, be it for greener spaces, food security, more early childhood development centres, or for better and more accessible roads.
tgt_text: iyaphendula, kuba isebe nzisa izixhobo zikarhulu mente ukusabela kwiimfuno zoluntu, nokuba zezeendawo zoluntu eziqulathe umhlaba onengca neentyatyambo, ukhuseleko lokutya, amaziko ophuhliso lwabantwana abasakhulayo, okanye iindlela ezingcono nezifikelelekayo nangakumbi.

src_text: it is progressive, because it offers social protection and income security to those who face destitution because they are unable to find work.
tgt_text: inenkqubelaphambili, kuba inikezela ngokhuseleko lwezentlalo kunye nokhuseleko lwemivuzo kwabo bajongene nokuswela ngenxa yokuba bengakwazi ukufumana umsebenzi.

src_text: it is an investment in the future, in that it supports the broader economic recovery agenda by urgently getting our people to work on improving our national and municipal infrastructure.
tgt_text: lutyalomali lwexesha elizayo, kuba luxhasa iajenda yokuvuselelwa ngokubanzi kwezoqoqosho ngokuthi kubuyiselwe ngokukhawuleza abantu bethu ukuba basebenze ekuphuculeni iziseko zethu ezingundoqo zesizwe nezikamasipala.

src_text: through the interventions in the stimulus, we are creating work for those who need it, while leaving a lasting impact on entire communities.
tgt_text: ngenxa yongenelelo kuvuselelo, sidala imisebenzi kwabo bayidingayo, ngelixa sishiya ifuthe eliya kuhlala lihleli ixesha elide kuluntu luphela.

src_text: like public employment programmes across the world, this employment stimulus supports and complements the critical role of the private sector in creating jobs.
tgt_text: njengeenkqubo zokuqesha zikarhulumente kwihlabathi jikelele, oku kuvuselelwa kwengqesho kuxhasa kwaye kufezekisa indima ebalulekileyo yecandelo labucala ekuveliseni imisebenzi.

src_text: it is countercyclical, in that as the recovery advances, the scale of public employment will decline.
tgt_text: kuyinto ejikelezayo, kuba njengoko ukubuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo kuqhubela pha mbili, inqanaba lokuqeshwa koluntu luza kuhla.

src_text: the work experience and skills acquired by beneficiaries of the presidential employment stimulus will improve their prospects of securing formal employment.
tgt_text: amava omsebenzi kunye nezakhono ezifunyenwe ngabaxhamli bokuvuselela ingqesho ngumongameli aya kuphucula amathuba abo okufumana ingqesho ese mgangathweni.

src_text: the experience gained is also a pathway to entrepreneurial activity.
tgt_text: amava afunyenweyo akwayindlela eya kwi misebenzi yezorhwebo.

src_text: participants will improve their skills and capabilities to start their own businesses, and can use the steady income provided by public employment to branch out into other incomegenerating activities.
tgt_text: abathathinxaxheba baza kuphucula izakhono zabo kunye namandla abo okuqala amashishini abo, futhi banokusebenzisa umvuzo ozinzi leyo obonelelwa yingqesho karhulumente ukuhlumisa eminye imisebenzi engenisa imali.

src_text: i have consistently affirmed that the covid19 crisis is also a window of opportunity to build back better.
tgt_text: bendisoloko ndiqinisekisa ukuba ingxaki yecovid19 ikwalithuba lokwakha ngcono kwakhona.

src_text: at this time of great upheaval, we would be doing ourselves no favours by making unrealistic promises that raise expectations, only to come short when they are not met.
tgt_text: ngeli xesha lesiphithiphithi esikhulu, siya kube singazincedi ngokuthi senze izithembiso ezingafezekisekiyo eziphakamisa ulindeleko, kuze kwe nzeke ukuba singaphumeleli xa zingahlangatyezwanga.

src_text: this is why each of the jobs and livelihood support interventions is fully funded, with a clear implementation plan.
tgt_text: yiyo loo nto eminye yemisebenzi kunye namangenelelo enkxaso yokuphila exhaswa ngemali ngokupheleleyo, sinesicwangciso sokuphumeza esicacileyo.

src_text: the employment stimulus is not about vague commitments for some time in the future, but about jobs being created right here and now.
tgt_text: isicwangciso sengqesho asikho malunga nokuzibo phelela okungacacanga ka ngangexesha elithile kwixesha elizayo, kodwa kumalunga nemisebenzi eveliswayo apha nangoku.

src_text: the stimulus is the result of extensive consultation with national departments, provinces and metros to rapidly design employment pro grammes that can be rolled out or expanded within six months.
tgt_text: isicwangciso sisiphumo sothethathethwano olubanzi namasebe esizwe, awama phondo kunye nawezixeko ezimbaxa ukuba kuyilwe ngokukhawuleza iinkqubo zemisebenzi ezinokuthi zi khutshwe okanye zandiswe kwixesha leenyanga ezinta ndathu.

src_text: the implementing departments and other stakeholders were rigorously assessed on their capacity to implement.
tgt_text: amasebe afezekisayo kunye namanye amahlakani ahlolisiswe ngokungqongqo ukuba anawo kusini na umthamo wokufezekisa.

src_text: in every one of the programmes that fall under the stimulus, opportunities will be widely advertised and recruitment will be fair, open and transparent.
tgt_text: kuzo zonke iinkqubo eziwela phantsi kokuvuse lela, anezithuba eziza kubhe ngezwa ngokubanzi futhi ukufunyanwa kwabasebenzi kuza kwenziwa ngobulungisa, kuvuleke kwaye kubonakale.

src_text: the goals we have set ourselves are realistic, measura ble and achievable, and draw lessons from past experience and international best prac tice.
tgt_text: iinjongo esizibeke ngokwe thu ziyinyani, zinokulingani swa kwaye zinokufikeleleka, futhi sifunde namava adlulileyo kunye nezenzo ezilungi leyo zamanye amazwe.

src_text: our people are ready and willing to work.
tgt_text: abantu bethu bakulungele kwaye bazimisele ukusebenza.

src_text: this vast potential must be harnessed, and our collective skills and capabilities brought to bear in rebuilding our country in the wake of the coronavirus.
tgt_text: obu buchule bukhulu kufuneka busetyenziswe, kwaye izakhono zomdibaniselwano wethu kunye nobuchule ziziswe ekwakheni ilizwe lethu emva kwentsholongwane icorona.

src_text: the presidential employment stimulus provides a respite for families who have endured a long hard winter with greatly reduced income, and for individuals who have spent many years without work.
tgt_text: isicwangciso sikamongameli sokudala imisebenzi sibonelela ngekhefu kwiintsapho eziye zanyamezela ubusika obude nobunzima zinemivuzo enciphe kakhulu, kunye nabantu abachithe iminyaka emininzi bengena misebenzi.

src_text: real, decent work is the right of every human being.
tgt_text: umsebenzi wokwenyani, nonesidima lilungelo lomntu wonke.

src_text: it is a precondition for economic growth and social stability.
tgt_text: yinto efunekayo eku khuleni koqoqosho nakuzinzo lwezentlalo.

src_text: by giving effect to this fundamental right, the presidential employment stimulus is making a decisive contribution to building a society that works.
tgt_text: ukuvuselela uqoqosho olusebenzayo vukuzenzele unnamed ukuphehlelelwa kwesicwa ngciso sika mongameli sokudala imisebenzi kwiveki ephelileyo kubonise utshintsho olukhulu kwindlela yethu yoku lwa nentswelangqesho.

src_text: recovery on the horizon for sa vukuzenzele unnamed the jacaranda trees are in full bloom across the nation’s capital, heralding the start of summer.
tgt_text: sele zithukuza iimpawu zohlumo emzantsi afrika vukuzenzele unnamed imithi yejacaranda idubule kwisixeko esi likomkhulu leli lizwe, into leyo ethetha ukuba ihlobo alifikanga ligalele kile.

src_text: after a long and difficult winter, the beginning of a new season should fill us with optimism.
tgt_text: emva kweenyanga ezinde nezinzima zobusi ka, ukungena kwehlobo kufanele ukuba kuzenze iintliziyo zethu zikhulelwe lithemba.

src_text: when the national state of disaster was declared in march, our immediate priority was to contain the spread of the virus and provide emergency relief to citizens, communities, workers and businesses.
tgt_text: ngethuba kubhengezwe imo yentlekele kuzwelonke ngenyanga yokwindla, into eyayiphambili ezi ngqondweni zethu yayi kuthintela ukunwenwa kwale ntsholongwane size sinike nabemi, abahlali, abasebenzi kunye namashi shini izibonelelo zokuncedisa ngexesha likaxakeka.

src_text: over the course of eight months and with the support of our social partners, we rolled out a comprehensive set of measures to limit the social and economic impact of the pandemic.
tgt_text: kwezi nyanga zisibhozo, futhi oko sikwenza ngenkxa so esiyifumene kumahlakani ethu ezentlalo, saqalisa nge nkqubo ebanzi yokunceda ukuba ungabi mbi kakhulu umonakalo wezentlalo nowe zoqoqosho onokwenziwa ngulo bhubhane.

src_text: we massively expanded social protection on a scale that has never been attempted before in this country.
tgt_text: siye sazandisa kakhulu iinkqubo zezibonelelo zezentlalo ngendlela enga zange yakha yalingwa kweli lizwe ngaphambili.

src_text: we are one of the few countries in the world where the right of access to social security is enshrined in the constitution, and we can be proud that during this grave crisis we gave practical expression to this right in many ways.
tgt_text: silelinye lamazwe ambalwa apho ilungelo lokufumana izibonelelo zentlalo libhalwe kumgaqosiseko, kwaye siziva sinebhongo kuba sikwazi ukuzalisekisa esi sithembiso ngethuba kanye wonke umntu esengxakini yokugutyungelwa ngubhu bhane.

src_text: in addition to our existing social grants, which reach more than 17 million people every month, we toppedup the old age, disability and child support grants.
tgt_text: ukongeza kwizibonelelo zentlalo ebezikade zikho, ezixhanyulwa ngabantu abangaphezulu kwezigidi ezili17, siye senza uchatha kwisibonelelomali sa bantu abadala, esokukhu bazeka kunye nesokondla abantwana.

src_text: we rolled out a special coronavirus disease (covid19) social relief of distress grant, which has reached some six million people to date.
tgt_text: saqalisa ngesi bonelelo esikhethekileyo secovid19 sezentlalo, sona esincede abantu asele befikelele kwizigidi ezitha ndathu kungokunje.

src_text: this was done within weeks of the national state of disaster being declared.
tgt_text: esi sibo nelelo saqalisa kwiivekana nje ezimbalwa emva kokuba kubhengezwe imo yentle kele kuzwelonke.

src_text: the scale of such an undertaking cannot be understated.
tgt_text: lo msebenzi ungaka awu kwazi ukuzolelwa okanye ukujongelwa phantsi.

src_text: to bring this system online there was extensive collaboration between the south african social security agency, south african revenue service, home affairs and many others.
tgt_text: ukuze le nkqubo ikwazi ukusebenza kwaye kwakho intsebenzi swano emandla phakathi kwearhente yezibonelelo zezentlalo yomzantsi afrika (isassa), iziko leenkonzo zerhafu lomzantsi afrika (isars), isebe lemicimbi yezekhaya, kunye namanye amahlakani amaninzi.

src_text: we set up a fully automated application and disbursement process, and integrated multiple databases, including the national population register and the unemployment insurance fund (uif) database.
tgt_text: saqalisa ngenkqubo ezihlawulela ngokwayo isebenzisa ubuxhakaxhaka bale mihla, yadityaniswa nezinye izintlu ezineenkcu kacha, eziquka uluhlu lwabantu besizwe kunye nengxowamali yeinsho rensi yabangaphangeliyo (iuif).

src_text: we set up new application channels like whatsapp and ussd, and created systems with the commercial banks to enable banking detail verification.
tgt_text: saqalisa neendlela ezintsha zokufaka izicelo ezifana nokusetyenziswa kukawhatsapp kunye neussd, saze saqalisa nango bunye ubuxhakaxhaka bale mihla sisebenzisana nee bhanki zabucala ukuze si kwazi ukuqinisekisa iinkcu kacha zebhanki zabantu.

src_text: this is a remarkable achievement in a very short space of time.
tgt_text: lo ngumsebenzi omhle kakhulu owenziwa ngexesha elifu tshane kakhulu.

src_text: alongside the measures we took to protect and sustain livelihoods, we also supported ailing businesses.
tgt_text: ukukhapha la manyathelo sawathathayo ngeenjongo zokukhusela abantu bakuthi, saya safaka isandla naku mashishini nawo ebeqalisa ukutsala nzima.

src_text: we provided relief to small businesses in the form of debt relief, finance, tax payment deferrals and other instruments.
tgt_text: siye sanika isibonelelo amashishini asakhasayo, isibonelelo eso sinxulumene namatyala, ese zimali, ukwandiswa kwexe sha lokungeniswa kwama xwebhu eengxelo zerhafu kunye nezinye izibonelelo.

src_text: we implemented a covid19 loan guarantee scheme to enable businesses to meet their operational expenses during the lockdown, and are currently looking at how this scheme can reach more companies in need.
tgt_text: saqalisa ngenkqubo yema limboleko eqinisekisiweyo yecovid19 ukuze since dise amashishini akwazi ukubhatala imali yeendleko zemisebenzi yemihla ngemi hla ngethuba ilizwe livaliwe, ngoku sizama nezinye indlela zokwenza ukuba esi sikimu sifikelele kwamanye amashishini amaninzi afuna uncedo.

src_text: we provided income protection to workers and relief to business owners through the temporary employer relief scheme administered by the uif.
tgt_text: sisikhuphile isibonelelo sokuqinisekisa ukuba imivuzo yabasebenzi iyahla wulwa kunye nesibonelelo sabaqeshi sethutyana, yona yokunceda abanikazimashi shini, nekhutshwa yiuif.

src_text: these were all in direct response to an emergency and were by nature temporary.
tgt_text: onke la manyathelo aye nzelwe ukusabela ngqo kule meko kaxakeka sikuyo kwaye ebengawokubambisa okwethutyana.

src_text: some are now coming to an end, while others have been extended as the labour market recovers.
tgt_text: ezinye zezi zibonelelo ziza kufikelela ekupheleni ngoku, ngeli thu ba ezinye ziza kuqhubeleka zisetyenziswa lude uqoqosho luqalise ukuhluma.

src_text: the measures we implemented went a long way towards protecting our society from the harsh winds of covid19.
tgt_text: ezi zibonelelo saziqali sayo zaba luncedo kakhulu ekukhuseleni isizwe sa kuthi ukuba singathwaxwa kakhulu yicovid19 .

src_text: the additional grants helped to prevent millions of people from falling below the food poverty line.
tgt_text: ezi nye izibonelelo zasindisa abantu abaninzi ekubeni bafe yindlala.

src_text: had we not intervened to secure livelihoods and save businesses, the living conditions of our people and the circumstances of thousands of businesses would have been considerably worse.
tgt_text: ukuba sasingazange singe nelele sisindise abantu ba kuthi kunye namashishini, iimeko zabantu bakuthi kunye nezamawaka amashi shini ngezibe maxongo kakhulu.

src_text: now we are in a transition from relief to recovery.
tgt_text: ngoku sikwixesha apho sigqithayo kwixesha loku khongoza kwabantu namashi shini ngezibonelelo singena kweli lokuhluma koqoqosho.

src_text: the emergency measures we put in place have laid a firm foundation on which to rebuild our economy.
tgt_text: ezi zibonelelo zingxami sekileyo saziqalisayo zizo eziza kusebenza njengee ntsika ekuza kwakhelwa phezu kwawo uqoqosho lweli lizwe.

src_text: as our focus now shifts to the implementation of the economic reconstruction and recovery plan, our priority will be to stimulate growth and create jobs.
tgt_text: njengoko ngoku sijongisa amehlo kumba wokuphumeza isicwangci so soqoqosho sohlumo no kwakha ngokutsha, into esiza kuyibeka phambili kukukhwezela uqoqosho nokudala imisebenzi.

src_text: there has already been progress in a number of areas.
tgt_text: ikhona indima esele ibonakala kumacandelo ama ninzi.

src_text: we are seeing new funding commitments for infrastructure development following an infrastructure project roundtable last week.
tgt_text: sifumene izithembiso ezi tsha zokuxhasa ngemali ama phulo ophuhliso lweziseko ezingundoqo ezenziwe emva kwendibano ebibanjwe kule veki iphelileyo ebigwadla umba weziseko ezingu ndoqo zophuhliso.

src_text: a number of employment programmes under the presidential employment stimulus have started.
tgt_text: iinkqubo zokudala imisebenzi phantsi kwesicwangciso sika mongameli sokuvuselela uqoqosho sele ziqalisile.

src_text: we are pushing ahead with economic reforms in areas such as energy and telecommunications.
tgt_text: si yaqhubeleka namalinge okuza neenguqu kuqoqosho lweli kwicandelo elifana nelezamandla kunye nele ziseko zonxibelelwano.

src_text: plans are being converted to action and commitments are being reflected in jobs and opportunities.
tgt_text: ngoku sikwixesha apho siyekileyo ukuthetha, sisenza izinto ezibonwayo futhi nezithembiso ezazenziwe ngoku ziveza la mathuba emisebenzi ayethenjisiwe.

src_text: it is all the more critical at this time, more so with the festive season approaching, that we do not become the architects of our own undoing.
tgt_text: kubaluleke kakhulu oku ngeli xhesa, ingakumbi nje ngoko ixesha leziyunguma zokuphela konyaka nalo sele lifikile, ukuba ingabisithi abaza kuphinda babuyisele umva lo msebenzi sele we nziwe.

src_text: the greatest vigilance is required from us all to keep the virus at bay.
tgt_text: kufuneka sihlale sivule amehlo, sibaze neendlebe si qinisekise ukuba asichatsha zelwa yile ntsholongwane.

src_text: a resurgence at any scale will not just dramatically reverse our health gains.
tgt_text: ukuvumbuluka kwaso kwakhona nokuba ivumbu luke sele ingasenamandla kakhulu kwakuwabuyisela emva la malinge ezempilo sele enziwe.

src_text: it will choke the green shoots of economic recovery that have emerged, and take us back from spring to winter.
tgt_text: lo nto iyakubanga ukuba nalo mathuba aqala ukuvela aphinde aphephe theke nomoya, isibuyisele kwixesha lobumnyama ne ntsokolo esiphuma kulo.

src_text: to prevent a second wave of covid19 infections, we must observe the public health guidelines that remain in place.
tgt_text: ukuthintela ukuba icovid19 ingaphindi iqhambu ke, kufuneka sithobele imi gaqo yezempilo ekhoyo.

src_text: when we fail to wear a mask at a social gathering, when we attend crowded events, we are not only putting ourselves and others at risk.
tgt_text: ukuba asisinxibi isifonyo kwiindibano zoluntu, xa sisiya kwimisitho enabantu abaninzi, asizibeki nje thina kuphela kunye nabanye emngciphekweni.

src_text: we are also putting our economic recovery in jeopardy.
tgt_text: sikwa beka nala malinge sele enzi we okuvuselela uqoqosho emngciphekweni.

src_text: let us all continue to play our part.
tgt_text: masiqhubeke, umntu ngamnye adlale indima yakhe.

src_text: the positive actions of wearing a mask, of maintaining social distancing and of regular hand washing helped us overcome the worst effects of the pandemic.
tgt_text: amanyathelo aluncedo afana nokunxiba isifonyo, ukungasondelelani phakathi kwabantu kunye nokuhla mba izandla rhoqo asincedile sakwazi ukumelana nalo bhubhane ngethuba kanye egqubela ukugqugqisa.

src_text: they are still our best defence.
tgt_text: la manyathelo ngawo aluncedo kakhulu, kwaye sifunza ngawo.

src_text: let us remember the sacrifices we all had to make to contain the spread of the virus in the early days.
tgt_text: masikhumbule izinto esa sikhethe ukuzincama sisi sizwe kuba sifuna ukuthi ntela ukuba le ntsholongwa ne inganwenwi kwiintsuku zokuqala zokufika kwayo.

src_text: even as most social and economic activity has resumed, we must still observe all the health measures.
tgt_text: nangona sele iqalile imise benzi yoluntu kunye neyezo qoqosho, kufuneka sihlale siyithobela imiqathango yezempilo esiyibekelweyo.

src_text: this is absolutely necessary if we are to rebuild our economy and put this crisis behind us.
tgt_text: sele zithukuza iimpawu zohlumo emzantsi afrika vukuzenzele unnamed imithi yejacaranda idubule kwisixeko esi likomkhulu leli lizwe, into leyo ethetha ukuba ihlobo alifikanga ligalele kile.

src_text: sa overcoming hiv and aids vukuzenzele unnamed as we continue our efforts to manage the devastating coronavirus pandemic, we cannot ignore the other public health challenges that our country faces.
tgt_text: mzantsi afrika woyisa intsholongwane kagawulayo (ihiv) nogawulayo (iaids) vukuzenzele unnamed njengokuba siqhubeka namalinge wethu okulawula ubhubhane wentsholongwane icoronaotshabalalisayo, asikwazi ukungayihoyi eminye imicelimngeni yezempilo kawonkewonke ilizwe lethu elijongene nayo.

src_text: for more than three dec ades, our country has been engaged in an ongoing struggle against hiv and aids, which has cost many lives and caused great hardship and suffering.
tgt_text: ngaphezulu kweminyaka engamashumi amathathu, ilizwe lethu belixakeke zinza me eziqhubekayo zokulwa intsholongwane kagawulayo (ihiv) nogawulayo (iaids), nothe wathatha imiphefumlo emininzi waze wadala imbandezelo nentlungu.

src_text: since the outbreak of cov id19 in the country, with the nationwide lockdown and the pressure on our health facilities, many hiv , aids and tuberculosis services have suffered.
tgt_text: ukususela ekuqhambukeni kwecovid19 kweli lizwe, ngokuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile kwisizwe jilele kunye noxinzelelo kwiziseko zethu zezempilo, uninzi lweenkonzo zehiv , iaids nesifo sephepha (itb) ziye zabulaleka.

src_text: this has posed a challenge for people testing and starting antiretroviral treatment.
tgt_text: oku kuye kwabangela umcelimngeni ekuvavanyweni kwabantu nokuqalisa unyango lokuthomalalisa intsholongwane kagawulayo.

src_text: many people found it difficult to collect their medicines and fewer people accessed other services, such as voluntary male medical circumcision.
tgt_text: abantu abaninzi bakufumanise kunzima ukulanda amayeza wabo kwaye bambalwa abantu abebekwazi ukuﬁ kelela kwezinye iinkonzo, ezifana nolwaluko lwamadoda olwenziwa kwagqirha ngokuzithandela.

src_text: at the same time, there are many lessons that have been learnt from our public health response to the coronavirus pandemic that can strengthen our fight against hiv and tb.
tgt_text: kwangaxesha nye, zininzi izifundo ezifundiweyo kwindlela amaziko ezempilo kawonkewonke wethu asabele ngayo kubhubhane wentsholongwane icorona okunokomeleza umlo wethu wokulwa nehiv kunye netb.

src_text: south africa continues to have the largest number of people living with hiv in the world.
tgt_text: umzantsi afrika usaqhubeka ukuba nelona nani liphezulu labantu abaphila nehiv ehlabathini.

src_text: it is encouraging, however, that over the last decade we made progress in reducing the number of new hiv infections in the population by nearly 60%.
tgt_text: noxa kunjalo, kuyakhuthaza ukufumanisa ukuba kule minyaka ilishumi yokugqibela idlulileyo sithe senza inkqubela ekunciphiseni inani losuleleko olutsha lwehiv kubo bonke abantu beli ngama60%.

src_text: it is also encouraging that hiv infections in adolescent girls and young women have significantly declined in the last decade.
tgt_text: kukwakhuthaza ngokunjalo ukuba usuleleko lwehiv kumantombazana afikisayo nabantu basetyhini abaselula luye lwehla ngokuncomekayo kule minyaka ilishumi yokugqibela.

src_text: this is a crucial group because they are much more likely to be at risk of getting hiv .
tgt_text: eli liqela elibalulekileyo kuba lelona lilindeleke ukuba lisenokuba kumngcipheko wokufumana ihiv .

src_text: our treatment programme has contributed to a reduction in the number of deaths due to aids by 60%.
tgt_text: inkqubo yethu yonyango ibe negalelo ekunciphiseni inani lokusweleka okubangelwa yiaids ngama60%.

src_text: there has been a greater reduction in hivrelated deaths among young people.
tgt_text: kubekho ukuncipha okukhulu ekuswelekeni okunxulumene nehiv phakathi kwabantu abatsha.

src_text: it was possible to reduce the number of deaths because we, together with our partners, have rolled out an extensive antiretroviral programme reaching millions of people living with the disease.
tgt_text: sikwazile ukunciphisa ina ni lokusweleka kuba thina, ndawonye kunye namahlakani wethu, siye sasungula inkqubo ebanzi yamachiza okuthomalalisa intsholongwane kagawulayo eﬁ kelela kwizigidi ngezigidi zabantu abaphila nesi sifo.

src_text: at the beginning of the decade, our programme to prevent mother to child transmission (pmtct) of hiv had very low coverage.
tgt_text: ekuqaleni kweminyaka elishumi, inkqubo yethu yokuthintela usuleleko lomntwana olusuka kunina (ipmtct) lwehiv ayikhange ifumane kupapashwa ngokwaneleyo.

src_text: now we have one of the highest rates of coverage of pmtct in southern africa, which has substantially reduced rates of infection among children.
tgt_text: ngoku sinelinye lawona mazinga aphezulu okupapashwa kwepmtct emazantsi eafrika, nethe yalehlisa kakhulu izinga losuleleko phakathi kwabantwana.

src_text: while we have reduced deaths and new infections, we still are far from reaching the goal we committed ourselves in 2016 of achieving a 75% reduction in hiv infections by 2020. if we succeed in doing so, we are likely to end aids as a public health threat by 2030. unfortunately, we are not there yet.
tgt_text: nangona sikunciphisile ukusweleka nosuleleko olutsha, sisekude ekuﬁ keleleni kwiinjongo zethu eziphambili esasizibophelele ukuba sijongise kuzo ngowama2016 zokunciphisa usuleleko lwehiv ngama75% ngowama2020.

src_text: we have to do far more to ensure that young people are empowered to prevent infections, including through changing behaviour, accessing condoms and testing regularly.
tgt_text: ukuba ngaba siyaphumelela ukwenza oko, sisenokuyiﬁ kisa esiphelweni into yokuba iaids ibe sisoyikiso kwezempilo kawonkewonke ngowama2030.

src_text: we need to make sure that everyone who is infected has access to treatment and care.
tgt_text: ngelishwa, asikafikeleli apho.

src_text: we need to work harder on hiv prevention among key populations, including sex workers, men who have sex with men, and people who inject drugs.
tgt_text: kufanele senze kakhulu nangaphezulu ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu abatsha bayaxhotyiswa ukuthintela usuleleko, kuquka nangokutshintsha indlela yokuziphatha, ukuﬁ kelela kwiikhondomu nokwenza uvavanyo rhoqo.

src_text: we must end the stigma and discrimination towards these populations.
tgt_text: kufanele siqinisekise ukuba umntu ngamnye owosulelekileyo uyakwazi ukufikelela kunyango nenkathalelo.

src_text: we cannot hope to end hiv if we ignore the needs, concerns and rights of any part of our population.
tgt_text: kufanele sisebenze nzima nga kumbi ngokuthintela usuleleko lwehiv phakathi kwabemi abangundoqo, kuquka nabo bathengisa ngemizimba, ama doda awabelana ngesondo namanye amadoda, kunye nabantu abazitofa ngeziyobisi.

src_text: south africa needs to increase efforts to medically circumcise young men to reduce their risk of acquiring hiv .
tgt_text: kufuneka sikuphelise ukubabeka ibala nokubacalucalula aba bemi.

src_text: unsafe circumcision should not leave young men with lifelong health problems, and no one should die from circumcision.
tgt_text: asinakuba nethemba lokuyiphelisa ihiv ukuba nga ba asizinanzi izidingo, iinkxalabo namalungelo walo naliphi na iqela labemi bethu.

src_text: we must make sure that young men have safe circumcision.
tgt_text: umzantsi afrika kufanele uwandise amalinge okwaluswa kwabafana kwagqirha ukunci phisa umgcipheko wokuba bafumane ihiv .

src_text: we are encouraged by findings of a recent study on preexposure prophylaxis (prep).
tgt_text: ulwaluko olungakhuselekanga akufanelekanga ukuba lushiye abafana neengxaki zezempilo ubomi babo bonke, kwaye akukho mntu umakabhubhe ngenxa yolwaluko.

src_text: unlike antiretroviral treatment that is given to people who are hiv positive, prep involves the regular use of antiretroviral drugs by hiv negative people to prevention infection.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba abafana boluka ngendlela ekhuselekileyo.

src_text: the study, conducted by scientists from the hiv prevention trials network, found that longacting injections once every eight weeks was better than the daily tablet used for hiv prevention.
tgt_text: sikhuthazwa ziziphumo zophononongo lwakutsha nje malunga nokutyhileka kwangaphambi kokukhuseleka kwizifo (iprep).

src_text: these findings have the potential to significantly strengthen our response to the epidemic.
tgt_text: ngokungafaniyo nonyango lokuthomalalisa intsholongwane kagawulayo olunikwa abantu abanehiv , iprep iquka ukusetyenziswa rhoqo kwamachiza okuthomalalisa ngabantu abangenayo ihiv ukuthintela usuleleko.

src_text: if we are to succeed in ending aids as a public health threat within the next decade, we need to combine these medical breakthroughs with fundamental changes in behaviour.
tgt_text: olu phononongo, lwenziwa ngoosonzululwazi bothungelwano lokulinga uthintelo lwehiv , lufumanise ukuba ukutofaemvakwexesha elide okwenziwa kanye ngeeveki ezisibhozo kungcono kunokusetyenziswa kwepilisi yokukhusela ihiv yonke imihla.

src_text: we also need to tackle the economic and social conditions that contrib ute to high rates of infection.
tgt_text: ezi ziphumo zinamandla okomeleza indlela esisabela ngayo kulo bhubhane ngokuncomekayo.

src_text: one of our central tasks is to empower adolescent girls and young women, educationally, economically and socially.
tgt_text: ukuze siphumelele ekupheliseni iaids njengesoyikiso kwezempilo kawonkewonke kule minyaka ilishumi izayo, kufanele sidibanise ezi mpumelelo zinkulu kunye neenguqu ezibalulekileyo zokuziphatha.

src_text: they need to be able to make their own decisions about every aspect of their lives, including their sexuality and sexual behaviour.
tgt_text: sikwadinga ukuba soyise iimeko zezoqoqosho nezentlalo ezenza igalelo kwizinga eliphezulu losuleleko.

src_text: ultimately, we will achieve the end of aids through the empowerment of young people, women and other people at risk.
tgt_text: omnye wemisebenzi yethu engundoqo kukuxhobisa amantombazana afikisayo kunye nabantu basetyhini abaselula, ngokwasemfundweni, ngokwezoqoqosho nangokwezentlalo.

src_text: this includes empowerment through access to information, advice and support.
tgt_text: kufanele ukuba bakwazi ukuzithathela izigqibo malunga nazo zonke iinkalo zobomi babo, kuquka isini sabo nokuziphatha kwabo ngokwezesini.

src_text: it includes access to education and economic opportunities, especially for young women.
tgt_text: ekugqibeleni, siza kuphumelela ekupheliseni iaids ngokuxhobisa abantu abatsha, abantu basetyhini kunye nabanye abantu abasemngciphekweni.

src_text: empowerment also means that every person must have access to testing, treatment and other health services.
tgt_text: oku kuquka ukuxhobisa ngokuﬁ kelela kulwazi, iingcebiso nenkxaso.

src_text: the people of south africa have come so far, endured so much and made such great progress in the fight against hiv , aids and tuberculosis.
tgt_text: kuquka ukuﬁ kelela kwimfundo nakumathuba ezoqoqosho, ingakumbi kubantu basetyhini abaselula.

src_text: let us intensify both our resolve and our actions to confront and overcome aids once and for all.
tgt_text: mzantsi afrika woyisa intsholongwane kagawulayo (ihiv) nogawulayo (iaids) vukuzenzele unnamed njengokuba siqhubeka namalinge wethu okulawula ubhubhane wentsholongwane icoronaotshabalalisayo, asikwazi ukungayihoyi eminye imicelimngeni yezempilo kawonkewonke ilizwe lethu elijongene nayo.

src_text: a better 2021 for all south africans the first weeks of the year have been difficult for all south africans.
tgt_text: unyaka ka2021 ongcono kubo bonke abemi bomzantsi afrikaiiveki zokuqala zonyaka bezinzima kubo bonke abemi bomzantsi afrika.

src_text: vukuzenzele unnamed the coronavirus pandemic has gotten worse, with new infections increasing far faster and far higher than before.
tgt_text: vukuzenzele unnamed ubhubhane wentsholongwane icorona uye wanwenwa kakhulu, kukho usulelo olutsha olukhula ngokukhawuleza kwaye luhamba ngesantya esikhulu kunangaphambili.

src_text: hospitals have been under great strain as more people have needed medical attention.
tgt_text: izibhedlele zaphantsi koxinzelelo olukhulu nanjengoko abantu abaninzi bebefuna ukufumana ingqwalasela ngokwezonyango.

src_text: while most economic sectors have been able to operate again for several months, it will take some time for the economy to recover and for lost jobs to be restored.
tgt_text: nangona uninzi lwamacandelo ezoqoqosho ekwazile ukusebenza kwakhona ngeenyanga ezininzi, kuza kuthatha ixesha ukuba uqoqosho lubuyele kwimeko yesiqhelo kunye nokubuyiselwa kwemisebenzi elahlekileyo.

src_text: as the new year starts, many families are still feeling the effects of the pandemic on their lives and livelihoods.
tgt_text: njengokuba kuqala unyaka omtsha, iintsapho ezininzi zisaziva izivubeko zobhubhane kubomi bazo nakwindlela yokuphila.

src_text: the world is now entering the second year of the coronavirus pandemic.
tgt_text: ihlabathi ngoku lingena kunyaka wesibini wobhubhane wentsholongwane icorona.

src_text: for south africa, as for most countries around the world, the year 2021 will be extremely challenging.
tgt_text: kumzantsi afrika, njengakumazwe amaninzi kwihlabathi liphela, unyaka ka2021 uza kuba nomceli mngeni omkhulu.

src_text: the second wave of covid19 infections may well be followed by further waves, which will threaten both the health of our people and the recovery of our economy.
tgt_text: ityeli lesibini lokosuleleka yicovid19 lisenokulandelwa ngamanye amatyeli, wona ayakuthi abe sisoyikiso empilweni zabantu bethu kunye nokubuyiselwa koqoqosho lwethu.

src_text: difficult as this year will be, i am certain that we will overcome the pandemic and set our country firmly on the path to recovery.
tgt_text: nokuba kunzima kulo nyaka, kodwa ndiqinisekile ukuba siza kuwoyisa lo bhubhane kwaye sibeke ilizwe lethu ekhondweni lendlela yokubuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo.

src_text: my confidence comes from the south african people.
tgt_text: ukuzithemba kwam kuvela kubantu basemzantsi afrika.

src_text: if i look at how south africans responded to this crisis from the moment the virus arrived on our shores, i have no doubt that we have the resilience, discipline and ability to defeat this disease.
tgt_text: ukuba ndijonga indlela abemi bomzantsi afrika abasabele ngayo kule ngxaki ukusukela oko intsholongwane yafika elunxwemeni lwethu, andithandabuzi ukuba somelele, sithobela umthetho kwaye siyakwazi ukulwa nesi sifo.

src_text: certainly there were exceptions, but the vast majority of south africans understood the need for restrictions on their movement and activities, and complied with the regulations that we had to put in place.
tgt_text: ngokuqinisekileyo bekukho iimeko ezohlukileyo, kodwa uninzi lwabemi bomzantsi afrika bebeyiqonda imfuneko yezithintelo kwiintshukumo zokuhamba nakwimisebenzi yabo, kwaye bathobela imigaqo ethe yabekwa ukuba ilandelwe.

src_text: even more important than compliance, most south africans took responsibility for themselves and for others, following advice on issues like social distancing, wearing a mask and hand washing.
tgt_text: okubaluleke nangakumbi kunokuthobela imigaqo, uninzi lwabantu basemzantsi afrika bazithathele uxanduva ngokwabo benza njalo nakwabanye, belandela iingcebiso kwimiba efana nokugcina umgama phakathi kwethu, ukunxiba iimaskhi kunye nokuhlamba izandla.

src_text: and where we fell short, we have, sadly, seen the consequences.
tgt_text: kwaye apho sisilele khona, ngelishwa, sizibonile iziphumo.

src_text: we now know about the risks of closed spaces and crowded gatherings, of not wearing masks and not keeping our distance from others.
tgt_text: ngoku siyazi ngomngcipheko weendawo ezivalekileyo kunye neendibano ezixineneyo, xa kunganxitywanga iimaskhi kunye nokungagcini umgama phakathi kwethu.

src_text: this bodes well for the year ahead.
tgt_text: oku kuhlakulela indlela yonyaka ozayo.

src_text: we now know much more about the disease and how to prevent its spread.
tgt_text: ngoku siyazi ngakumbi malunga nesi sifo kunye nendlela yokuthintela ukusasazeka kwaso.

src_text: and despite what one could call ‘pandemic fatigue’, we are no less determined as south africans to do what needs to be done.
tgt_text: kwaye ngaphandle nje kwento umntu anokuyibiza ngokuba 'kukudinwa ngubhubhane', sizimisele njengabemi bomzantsi afrika ukwenza into ekufuneka yenziwe.

src_text: as we adhere even more rigorously to the basic prevention measures, we will also be rolling out a mass vaccination campaign.
tgt_text: njengokuba sibambelela ngokungqongqo ngakumbi kumanyathelo asisiseko sokuthintela isifo, siza kube siqalisa iphulo lokugonya abantu abaninzi.

src_text: as more and more people are vaccinated, we will both save lives and progressively reduce the risk of infection across the population.
tgt_text: njengokuba besiya begonywa abantu, siya kusindisa ubomi kwaye sinciphise ngokuthe gqolo umngcipheko wosulelo kuluntu lonke.

src_text: getting enough vaccines as quickly as possible – and making sure that they reach the people who need them – will be one of the biggest tasks of the year.
tgt_text: ngokufumana ugonyo olwaneleyo ngokukhawuleza kwaye kuqinisekiswe ukuba luyafikelela ebantwini abaludingayolowo iya kuba ngowona msebenzi mkhulu wonyaka.

src_text: this will be particularly challenging as every country in the world is clamouring to secure a limited supply of vaccines.
tgt_text: oku kuya kuba ngumceli mngeni njengoko ilizwe ngalinye kwihlabathi likhalela ukufumana isabelo kolo gonyo olulinganiselweyo.

src_text: but we are hard at work with partners in business, labour and civil society to make this happen.
tgt_text: kodwa sisebenza nzima kunye namaqabane kwezoshishino, abasebenzi kunye noluntu ukwenza oku kufikeleleke.

src_text: we are working on several fronts to get vaccines, including through the global covax facility, the african union initiative and through our own engagements with vaccine manufacturers.
tgt_text: sisebenza kwimida eliqela ukuzama ukufumana iyeza lokugonya, kubandakanya indawo yehlabathi yecovax, inyathelo lembumba yeafrika kunye nokuzibandakanya kwethu nabavelisi bezitofu zogonyo.

src_text: as we act together to overcome the pandemic, we will need to work together to rebuild and transform our economy.
tgt_text: njengokuba sisebenza kunye ukoyisa lo bhubhane, kuya kufuneka sisebenzisane ukwakha ngokutsha nokuguqula uqoqosho lwethu.

src_text: we have both the ability and the will to stimulate economic activity, grow our economy and create jobs.
tgt_text: sinawo amandla kunye nomqweno wokukhuthaza imisebenzi yezoqoqosho, ukukhulisa uqoqosho lwethu kunye nokudala imisebenzi.

src_text: and to do so in the midst of a pandemic.
tgt_text: oku sikwenza kanye ngexesha likabhubhane.

src_text: public finances are under extreme strain, now even more so because of the cost of our health response to covid19 and the social and economic relief measures we put in place to assist businesses and poor households.
tgt_text: izimali zikarhulumente ziphantsi koxinzelelo olugqithisileyo, ngoku nangakumbi ngenxa yeendleko zeziphumo kwezempilo kwicovid19 kunye nemilinganiselo yezoncedo kwezentlalo nezoqoqosho esiyimisileyo ukukhawulelana namashishini kunye namakhaya ahluphekayo.

src_text: the contraction of the economy also meant that tax revenue has declined significantly.
tgt_text: ukucuthwa koqoqosho kukwathetha ukuba ingeniso yerhafu yehla kakhulu.

src_text: there are some parts of the economy that will take longer to recover due to lower global demand generally and restrictions on international travel.
tgt_text: kukho iindawo ezithile zoqoqosho eziza kuthatha ixesha elide ukubuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo ngenxa yemfuno esezantsi jikelele ngokubanzi kunye nezithintelo kuhambo lwamazwe aphesheya.

src_text: that is why we need to be innovative and focused in our plans to rebuild the economy.
tgt_text: yiyo loo nto kufuneka ukuba sibe nezinto ezintsha kwaye sigxile kwizicwangciso zethu zokwakha ngokutsha uqoqosho.

src_text: significantly, the economic reconstruction and recovery plan that we announced in october last year is based on broad consensus among all social part ners on the actions needed to rebuild the economy.
tgt_text: ngokubalulekileyo, isicwangciso sokwakhiwa ngokutsha nokuvuselelwa koqoqosho esasibhengeza kweyedwarha kulo nyaka uphelileyo sisekwe kwimvumelwano ebanzi phakathi kwawo onke amaqabane ezentlalo ngezenzo ezifunekayo zokwakha ngokutsha uqoqosho.

src_text: this lays a firm basis for effective cooperation that draws on the resources, capabilities and energies of all sections of society.
tgt_text: oku kubeka isiseko esifezekileyo sentsebenziswano kusetyenziswa izixhobo, amacebo kunye namandla awo onke amacandelo oluntu.

src_text: we are seeing this in various practical ways.
tgt_text: sibona oku ngeendlela ezahlukeneyo.

src_text: for example, we have been working closely with private funders and multilateral development institutions to prepare infrastructure projects in areas like transport, human settlements, water and telecommunications.
tgt_text: umzekelo, besisebenza ngokubambisana nabaxhasi ngezimali babucala kunye namaziko ophuhliso lwamazwe amaninzi ukulungiselela iiprojekthi zeziseko zophuhliso kwiindawo ezinje ngezothutho, ukuhlaliswa kwabantu, amanzi kunye nonxibelelwano ngomnxeba.

src_text: using the infrastructure fund as one of the vehicles, we are developing funding models for these projects that draw on several sources in both the public and private sectors.
tgt_text: sisebenzisa ingxowamali yeziseko njengenye yendlela, siphuhlisa iindlela zokuthola inkxasomali kwezi projekthi sisebenzisa imithombo emininzi kumacandelo karhulumente nawabucala.

src_text: this is particularly important at a time when public finances are limited.
tgt_text: oku kubaluleke ngakumbi ngexesha apho iimali zikarhulumente zinqongophele.

src_text: the presidential employment stimulus is another example of partnership in action.
tgt_text: iphulo likamongameli lenkqubo yokudala imisebenzi ngomnye umzekelo wentsebenziswano ekusebenzeni.

src_text: understanding that it will take time for economic growth to translate into private sector employment, we have launched the employment stimulus to start creat ing work opportunities now.
tgt_text: ukuqonda ukuba kuya kuthatha ixesha ukukhula koqoqosho ukuba kuguqulwe kumashishini abucala, sisungule inkuthazo yengqesho yokuqalisa ukudala amathuba emisebenzi ngoku.

src_text: this programme is being coordinated from the presiden cy, but is being implemented by a range of government departments and different spheres.
tgt_text: le nkqubo iyaququzelelwa isuka kwiofisi kamongameli, kodwa isetyenziswa ngamasebe karhulumente ohlukeneyo kunye nezigaba ezohlukeneyo.

src_text: through this programme, tens of thousands of unemployed people are able to both earn and learn as they provide valuable social services.
tgt_text: ngale nkqubo, amashumi amawaka abantu abangaphangeliyo bayakwazi ukuzuza umvuzo kwaye bafunde njengoko bebonelelwa ngeenkonzo zentlalo ezixabisekileyo.

src_text: in time, this programme will include a ‘social employment’ part, where we will partner with other social actors to employ people in a variety of activities – from improving food security, to tackling genderbased violence to upgrading informal settlements – that all contribute to the common good.
tgt_text: ekuhambeni kwexesha, le nkqubo iza kuquka indawo 'yokuqeshwa koluntu', apho siza kudibana nabanye ababandakanyekayo bezentlalo ukuqesha abantu kwimisebenzi eyahlukeneyoukusuka ekuphuculeni ukuba kukho ukutya, ukujongana nobundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini ukuya ekuphuculeni iindawo zokuhlala zasemijondolo konke oko kunegalelo elilungileyo kokuqhelekileyo.

src_text: all this work is being reinforced by an aggressive focus on those economic reforms that will have the greatest focus on growth.
tgt_text: wonke lo msebenzi uqiniswa kukugxilwa ngokukuko kwezo nguqulelo zezoqoqosho eziza kuqwalasela ngakumbi ekuphuhleni.

src_text: these include the expansion of electricity generation capacity, making our ports more efficient and competitive, improving access to affordable broadband, and improving turnaround times for water, mining and other licenses.
tgt_text: oku kubandakanya ukwandiswa kwamandla okuvelisa umbane, okwenza amazibuko ethu asebenze ngakumbi kwaye akhuphisane, kuphuculwe ukufikelela kwizixokelelwano zonxibelelwano ngeintanethi ezifikelelekayo ngexabiso, kunye nokuphucula amaxesha okufumana amanzi, kwezemigodi kunye namanye amaphephamvume.

src_text: these efforts are being coordinated and monitored jointly by my office and national treasury.
tgt_text: ezi nzame ziyaququzelelwa kwaye zibekwe iliso ngokudibeneyo yiofisi yam kunye nonongxowa wesizwe.

src_text: there is much to be done in the year ahead.
tgt_text: okuninzi apha kufuneka kwenziwe kulo nyaka siya kuwo.

src_text: and we should be in no doubt that we will have to confront many daunting challenges.
tgt_text: kwaye kufuneka singathandabuzi ukuba kuya kufuneka sijongane nemiceli mngeni emininzi.

src_text: but we have shown that, as a nation, we are able to succeed when we work together in pursuit of a common purpose.
tgt_text: kodwa sibonisile ukuba, njengesizwe, siyakwazi ukuphumelela xa sisebenza kunye ukulandela injongo enye.

src_text: if we remember that, and if we put our unity into action, we will ensure that 2021 brings better health and better lives to all our people.
tgt_text: ukuba siya kukhumbula oko, kwaye ukuba sibeka ubunye bethu kwintshukumo, siya kuqinisekisa ukuba owama2021 uya kuza nempilo engcono kunye nobomi obungcono kubo bonke abantu bethu.

src_text: i wish you all the best for the new year.
tgt_text: unyaka ka2021 ongcono kubo bonke abemi bomzantsi afrikaiiveki zokuqala zonyaka bezinzima kubo bonke abemi bomzantsi afrika.

src_text: an honour to lead the african union vukuzenzele unnamed south africa’s term as chair of the african union has come to an end.
tgt_text: uzuko lokukhokela imanyano yamave aseafrika vukuzenzele unnamed ixesha lomzantsi afrika njengosihlalo wemanya no yamave aseafrika (iau) lifikelele esiphe lweni.

src_text: as we reflect on our year in this position, i am reminded of the old saying that ‘in crisis lies opportunity’.
tgt_text: xa sijonga emva kunyaka wethu kwesi sikhundla, ndikhumbu la intetho endala ethi ‘kwintlekele kukho ithuba’.

src_text: ours was a baptism of fire, having assumed the chairship in the same month the first case of coronavirus was reported on the continent.
tgt_text: olwethu ibiluphehlelelo lomlilo, kuba sithathe isihlalo kanye ngale nyanga ku chazwe ngayo isehlo sokuqa la sentsholongwane yecorona kweli lizwekazi.

src_text: the priorities we outlined for our term, among them furthering peace and security, the economic empowerment of women and deepening economic integration, had to be immediately and dramatically reoriented to deal with the pandemic.
tgt_text: izinto ezihamba phambi li esasizondlalile siceba ukuzenza ngexesha lethu, phakathi kwazo ibikukuqhubela phambili uxolo nokhuseleko, ukuthwesa amanina amandla ezoqoqosho nokwenza nzulu uma nyaniso lwezoqoqosho, kuye kwafuneka ukuba zihlenga hlengiswe ngoko nangoko nangendlela emangalisayo ukumelana nalo bhubhane.

src_text: our most pressing task was to steer the focus of the african union to addressing the worst global emergency in over a century.
tgt_text: owona msebenzi wethu ebekumelwe ukuba siwenze ngokukhawuleza ibikuku tshintsha apho ijonge khona iau ingqalane neyona meko kaxakeka embi elikhe lajongana nayo ihlabathi kwiminyaka elikhulu.

src_text: covid19 has affected all the countries on the continent.
tgt_text: icovid19 ichaphazele onke amazwe akweli lizwekazi.

src_text: to date there are more than 3.5 million confirmed cases in africa, and more than 88,000 people have died.
tgt_text: ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, kukho ngaphaya kwe3.5 yezigidi zezehlo eziqinisekisiweyo eafrika, kwaye ku sweleke ngaphaya kwabantu abangamawaka angama88 000. le ibe yintlekele yezempilo, yobuntu, yentlalo yoluntu neyoqoqosho kumazwe aseafrika, uninzi lwawo ebe ngakulungelanga ukulawula imeko kaxakeka yempilo enkulu kangaka.

src_text: it has been a health, humanitarian, social and economic crisis for african countries, most of whom are inadequately resourced to manage a health emergency of this size.
tgt_text: kodwa nangona kunjalo, nangona ubume balo bhubhane ibobungazange babonwa, ikwa njalo ne ndlela amazwe aseafrika aye abumbana ngayo uku yilwa.

src_text: and yet, as unprecedented as the nature of the pandemic has been, so too has been the manner in which african countries have come together to fight it.
tgt_text: ngokwenza njalo, ikakhulu sisebenzise ulwazi, amandla namaziko alo izwekazi, afana namaziko eafrika olawulo nothintelo lwezifo (icdc yaseafrika)iafrika khange ihlale nje isonge izandla ngethuba kuvela obona bungakanani nobungozi balo bhubhane.

src_text: in doing so we have drawn principally on the continent’s own expertise, capabilities and institutions such as the africa centres for disease control and prevention (africa cdc).
tgt_text: ukususela kwiintsuku zokuqala zalo bhubhane sikhokelwe yiau, siye savelisa iqhinga lokulwa ngokukhawuleza, liqhutywa yicdc yaseafrika nesigqeba sengingqi.

src_text: africa did not sit by passively as the true extent and danger of the pandemic unfurled.
tgt_text: siye sabona ukuba ilizwe ngalinye kweli lizwekazi liza kuchatshazelwa ka khulu ngulo bhubhane.

src_text: from the earliest days of the pandemic and led by the au, we swiftly developed a continental response strategy, driven by the africa cdc and regional task forces.
tgt_text: uninzi lwawo belungazuba nazo izixhobo ezidingekayo ukumelana nomceli mngeni wezempilo woluntu okanye ukukhusela uqoqosho lwawo.

src_text: we realised that every country on the continent would be severely affected by the pandemic.
tgt_text: ngoko ke siye savumelana singamazwe aseafrika ukuba sichonge abemi abaliqela baseafrika ababalaseleyo njengabameli abakhethekileyo, abaza kuthi bathethathethane nabatyalizimali behlabathi namaziko maninzi ohlukeneyo ukuze bathethelele ukuba kutheni kufuneka sifumane inkxaso yezezimali noxolelo lwamatyala egameni leafrika.

src_text: most would not have the resources needed to meet the public health challenge or to protect their economies.
tgt_text: ngale ndlela, sisebenza njengezwekazi elinye, siye sakwazi ukufumanela amazwe amaninzi uxolelo lwamatyala kunye noncedo lwezezimali oluya ekulweni necovid19 nokuchachiwa koqoqosho.

src_text: we therefore agreed as african countries to appoint several prominent africans as special envoys, who would engage with international funders and multilateral institutions to make the case for financial support and debt relief on africa’s behalf.
tgt_text: kodwa nangona amazwe aseafrika eye kuluntu lwehlabathi ukufumana inkxaso, siqale sazinceda ngokwethu – ngokuseka nokwenza ingxowamali yelizwekazi yokulwa necovid19.

src_text: in this way, working as a one continent, we were able to achieve debt relief for many countries and financial assistance towards our covid response and economic recovery.
tgt_text: ngentsebenziswano nganye eyenziweyo namazwe aneenkonzo ezibhetele kunye noluntu lwehlabathi olunikeleyo, sizisekele elethu iqonga leafrika elitsha lokufumana izinto zonya ngo ukwenza onke amazwe aseafrika ukuba afumane izixhobo zokuzikhusela nezinye izinto zonyango ngokukhawuleza, ngendlela elinganayo nefikelelekayo ngokwezezimali.

src_text: but much as african countries went to the international community for support, we first helped ourselves – establishing and capitalising a continental covid19 response fund.
tgt_text: kwaye njengokuba li khona ichiza lokugonye la icovid19, sisebenze njengembumba ukuqinise kisa ukuba izwekazi lifumana isabelo salo esifanelekileyo, sisebenza neziko lecovax kwaye sikhokelwe liqela lethu elithunyiweyo lokufumana ichiza lokugonya laseafrika.

src_text: for every partnership forged with betterresourced nations and the international donor community, we set up our own innovative and groundbreaking african medical supplies platform to enable all african countries to quickly secure personal protective equipment and other medical supplies in an equitable, affordable manner.
tgt_text: sele liqalile ukukhu tshwa ichiza lokugonya kwizwekazi kwaye injongo yethu kukuba athi ephela u2021 lube uninzi lwabemi bezwekazi lugonyiwe ukuze sifikelele kukhuseleko lwa bantu abaninzi.

src_text: and now that the covid19 vaccine is available, we have worked as a collective to ensure that the continent gets its fair share, working with the covax facility and led by our own african vaccine acquisition task team.
tgt_text: sisebenzisene ukukhusela impilo, abantu, neendlela zokuziphilisa kwizwekazi.

src_text: vaccine rollout has already commenced on the continent and we aspire to have the majority of the continent’s population vaccinated by the end of 2021 to achieve herd immunity.
tgt_text: ngokwenzenjalo, sibonise amandla ethu okuxhomekeka kuthi nokwazi kwethu ukuba ngabaqhubi bophu hliso lwethu ngokwethu.

src_text: we have acted as one to protect health, people and livelihoods on the continent.
tgt_text: nangona icovid19 ibigquba, siye sakwazi ukuba nenkqubela kwiqela lezinto eziphambili ebesifuna ukuzenza.

src_text: in doing so, we have demonstrated our capacity for selfreliance and our ability to be the drivers of our own development.
tgt_text: ngexesha lolawulo lwe thu, ummandla ongahla wulisani irhafu yorhwe bo welizwekazi iafrika (iafcfta) ude wamiselwa, ubonisa ixesha elitsha lokwenza ushishino phakathi eafrika nomanya niso loqoqosho.

src_text: despite the dominance of covid19, we have still managed to make advances in several of our key priorities.
tgt_text: naphantsi kweemeko ezinzima eziziswe ngulo bhubhane, izwekazi liye laqhubekela phambili ne njongo yalo yoku ‘thulisa imi pu’ kwizwekazi.

src_text: during our term, the africa continental free trade area (afcfta) was finally launched, heralding a new era of intraafrican trade and economic integration.
tgt_text: iau ibiso loko izibandakanya nothe thathethwano olumalunga negrand ethopian renai ssance dam, ukuphelisa imfazwe elibya nokukhu thaza uxolo esouth sudan.

src_text: even under the difficult conditions posed by the pandemic, the continent has pushed ahead with towards the goal of ‘silencing the guns’ on the continent.
tgt_text: enye into ebesigxile kuyo ngexesha lethu ibikuku thwesa amanina amandla ezoqoqosho, nto leyo esizakuqhubeka nokuyikhu thaza nangona seliphelile ixesha lethu nakwishumi leminyaka yokubandaka nywa kwamanina aseafrika ngokwezezimali noqoqosho ukuya ku2030.

src_text: the au has been actively involved in negotiations around the grand ethiopian renaissance dam, in achieving a ceasefire in libya and promoting peace in south sudan.
tgt_text: xa sinikezela intonga kwidemocratic republic of congo (idrc), sishiya eli qumhru libalaseleyo lezwekazi likwindawo enamandla amakhulu nangakumbi.

src_text: another focus of our term has been on the economic empowerment of women, which we will continue to champion even beyond our term and throughout the decade of african women’s financial and economic inclusion to 2030. as we hand over the baton to the democratic republic of congo (drc) we leave this preeminent continental body in a position of greater strength.
tgt_text: umzantsi afrika uza kuqhubeka nokudlala indima yawo ukunceda ukwakha umanyaniso kwizwekazi, nokuxhasa usihlalo ongenayo nombutho kwii nzame zawo zokumelana neminqweno yeagenda 2063 yeau.

src_text: south africa will continue to play its part to foster integration on the continent, and support the incoming chair and the organisation in its efforts to meet the aspirations of the au’s agenda 2063. when the organisation for african unity was founded in 1963, member states planted the seeds of cooperation and solidarity in pursuit of a better life for all the peoples of africa.
tgt_text: xa umbutho womanya no lweafrika wawusekwa ngo1963, amazwe angamalungu atyala iimbewu zentsebenziswano nobu mbano ngethuba ekhangelela abantu baseafrika ubomi obubhetele.

src_text: they affirmed that african unity was paramount if the welfare and wellbeing of africa’s people was to be assured.
tgt_text: angqina ukuba umanyano lweafrika kufuneka luha mbe phambili ukuze kuqi nisekiswe intlalontle ne mpilo yabantu baseafrika.

src_text: history bears witness that these seeds have not always fallen on fertile ground, and over the years the continental unity project has experienced many hurdles and false starts.
tgt_text: imbali ilingqina lokuba ngoku ezi mbewu aziwe langa kumhlaba otyebi leyo maxesha onke, kwaye kwiminyaka egqithileyo iprojekthi yezwekazi yoma nyano ibe nemiqobo emininzi neziqalo ezininzi ezingezizo.

src_text: but the grave threat posed by this pandemic has galvanised african countries to collective action.
tgt_text: kodwa umngcipheko omkhulu obekwe ngulo bhu bhane uvuse amazwe aseafrika emaqandeni ukuze asukume asebenze kunye.

src_text: in the hothouse of the covid19 crisis, the seeds of unity and cooperation planted by our pioneering forebears have come to life and flourished.
tgt_text: kwisizikithi sobushushu bentlekele yecovid19, imbewu yobumbano nentse benziswano etyalwe ngoo khokho bethu abasivulela indlela ziqhamile zachuma.

src_text: this time of great trial and difficulty has been among the au’s finest hours.
tgt_text: eli xesha lesilingo nobu nzima obukhulu libe lelinye lawona maxesha eau aha mba phambili.

src_text: we are honoured to have been given the opportunity to lead the organisation through this period, when it practically demonstrated the true meaning of the words african union.
tgt_text: sizukisiwe kukunikwa ithuba lokukhokela lo mbutho ngeli xesha, apho uvele wabonisa intsingiselo eyiyo ncakasana yamagama athi imanyano yeafrika.

src_text: this is an accomplishment for which all the citizens of our continent africa should feel proud and from which they should draw encouragement.
tgt_text: uzuko lokukhokela imanyano yamave aseafrika vukuzenzele unnamed ixesha lomzantsi afrika njengosihlalo wemanya no yamave aseafrika (iau) lifikelele esiphe lweni.

src_text: steps to revive the economy vukuzenzele unnamed it will soon be a year since the first reported case of coronavirus disease (covid19) in our country.
tgt_text: amanyathelo okuvuselela uqoqosho vukuzenzele unnamed kungekudala iza kuba ngunyaka ukusukela oko sanika ingxelo yokuqala yesimo sentsholongwane icorona kwilizwe lethu.

src_text: the pandemic has come at a great cost to both public health and the livelihoods of millions of our people.
tgt_text: ubhubhane uza nendleko enkulu kwimpilo yoluntu nakwiindlela zokuphila zezigidi zabantu bethu.

src_text: many workers lost part of their income as their work hours were reduced with many being retrenched.
tgt_text: abasebenzi abaninzi ba phulukana nenxalenye yemi vuzo yabo njengoko iiyure zabo zomsebenzi zancitshi swayo kwaye uninzi lwaba ntu badendwa emisebenzini.

src_text: several businesses have incurred heavy losses from scaledback operations.
tgt_text: uninzi lwamashishini afumana ilahleko enzima evela kuncitshiso lwemisebenzi.

src_text: others have had to close.
tgt_text: amanye kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba avale.

src_text: people working in the informal sector have also suffered.
tgt_text: abantu abasebenza kwicandelo elingamiselekanga bacha phazeleka nabo.

src_text: most difficult of all, the pandemic has claimed the lives of breadwinners in many families, leaving them destitute and fearful for the future.
tgt_text: eyona nto inzima kakhulu, kukuba ubhubhane uthathe ubomi babondli kwiintsapho ezininzi, wazishiya ziswele kwaye zisoyika ikamva elizayo.

src_text: this is why the extensive relief measures we put in place were both necessary and urgent.
tgt_text: kungeso sizathu ke apho amanyathelo oncedo amaninzi enziweyo abeyimfu neko kwaye engxamisekile.

src_text: and, now that nearly a year has passed, we can say that these measures have proved effective.
tgt_text: kwaye, njengoko sele kudlule unyaka, singatsho ukuthi la manyathelo angqinisisile ukuba ayasebenza.

src_text: of the full package of relief measures that we introduced, perhaps the two measures that had the greatest impact were the special covid19 social relief of distress grant and the unemployment insurance fund's (uif) covid19 temporary employer/employee relief scheme, generally known as covid ters.
tgt_text: kumqulu opheleleyo wamanyathelo oncedo esiwa zisileyo, mhlawumbi la ma nyathelo mabini athe ane futhe elikhulu yayisisibo nelelo sezentlalo esikhethe kileyo secovid19 kunye neuif’s covid19 temporary employer/employee relief scheme, aziwa ngokubanzi njengecovid ters.

src_text: we would not have been able to roll out these measures in such a short space of time if we had not had an extensive social security infrastructure already in place.
tgt_text: besingaz’ ukuba nako ukuwenza la manyathelo ngexesha elifutshane ukuba besingenazo iziseko zophu hliso ezininzi zokhuseleko lwezentlalo esele zikhona.

src_text: we were able to respond to this huge and immediate need in our society thanks to the substantial nationwide infrastructure and systems of the south african social security agency and the uif.
tgt_text: sikwazile ukusabela kwesi sidingo sikhulu nesikhawulezileyo kuluntu lwethu ngo ncedo, lweziseko zophuhliso zikazwelonke ezingundoqo nakwiinkqubo zearhente yezibonelelo zezentlalo yomzantsi afrika (isassa) kunye nengxowamali yeinshorensi yabangaphangeliyo (iuif).

src_text: there were certainly technical and other glitches along the way, but most of these were speedily resolved.
tgt_text: ngokuqinisekileyo beku kho ukungasebenzi kakuhle kobugcisa kunye nokunye ukuphazamiseka endleleni, kodwa uninzi lwezi zinto zasonjululwa ngokukhawuleza.

src_text: these government agencies did outstanding work to enroll millions of new beneficiaries and ensure they were paid.
tgt_text: ezi arhente zikarhu lumente zenze umsebenzi omhle kakhulu wokubhalisa izigidi zabaxhamli abatsha zaza zaqinisekisa ukuba bahlawuliwe.

src_text: the support provided by the uif was a lifeline to struggling businesses and employees.
tgt_text: inkxaso enikezelwe yiuif ibiluncedo kumashishini nakubaqeshwa abasokolayo.

src_text: it made the difference between companies remaining open and being forced to close, between jobs saved and jobs lost.
tgt_text: yenza umahluko phakathi kweenkampani ezihlala zivuliwe nezanyanzelwa ukuba zivale, phakathi kwemisebenzi esindisiweyo kunye nemisebenzi elahlekileyo.

src_text: this benefited businesses like sihle’s brew, a restaurant in gauteng, which was able to retain its 18 employees because of the ters scheme.
tgt_text: oku kuxhamlise amashishini afana nesihle’s brew, indawo yokutyela esegauteng, ethe yabanako ukugcina abasebenzi bayo abali18 ngenxa yesikimu seters.

src_text: thanks to government support, mamoshal agae trading and projects, an autoelectrical business in mokopane, was able to pay its workers as well as its rent and rates during the lockdown.
tgt_text: siyayibulela inkxaso karhulumente, kuba imamoshalagae trading and projects, ishishini lombane elise mokopane, likwazile ukubhatala abasebenzi balo kunye nerente kunye nee rhafu ngexesha lokuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile.

src_text: employees in dire straits were able to receive a portion of their salaries.
tgt_text: abaqeshwa abakwimeko emaxongo babenako ukufumana inxenye yemivuzo yabo.

src_text: lindiwe ntuli, a paralegal in centurion, has told how receiving her benefits enabled her to work from home and be able to afford her rent.
tgt_text: ulindiwe ntuli, umncedisi kwezomthetho ecenturion, uchaze ngendlela izibonelelo azifumeneyo ezithe zakwazi ukumenza ukuba asebenzele ekhaya kwaye abenako nokubhatala irente.

src_text: there are many stories of companies that have been able to stay afloat over the past year because of the support they received from the uif.
tgt_text: maninzi amabali ee nkampani ezithe zakwazi ukuhlala zisebenza kunyaka ophelileyo ngenxa yenkxaso eziyifumene kwiuif.

src_text: the same can be said of the small businesses helped by the various grants and loans provided by a number of departments.
tgt_text: ku ngathethwa njalo nangama shishini amancinane ancedwe ngezibonelelo ezahlukeneyo nangeemalimboleko ezinike zelwa ngamasebe amaninzi.

src_text: these measures greatly helped our people in their time of need.
tgt_text: la manyathelo abancede kakhulu abantu bethu ngexesha labo lobunzima.

src_text: as we transition from relief to recovery, we have to shift gear.
tgt_text: njengoko sitshintsha ukusuka kuncedo sibuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo, kufuneka siqale ukucinga ngenye indlela.

src_text: while these relief measures were designed to be temporary, the economy will continue to feel the effects of the pandemic for some time.
tgt_text: ngelixa la manyathelo oncedo enzelwe ukuba abe ngawethutyana, uqoqosho luza kuqhubeka ukuva iimpembelelo zobhubhane ixesha elide.

src_text: even as lockdown restrictions have been eased, many companies are struggling to cope with the fallout of months of diminished operations and lost revenue.
tgt_text: nangona zinyenyisiwe izithintelo zokuvaleleka pha ntsi kwemiqathango ethile, uninzi lweenkampani ziya sokola ukumelana neziphu mo ezingalunganga zeenya nga zokuncipha kwemisebe nzi kunye nelahleko yenge niso.

src_text: it is for this reason that, following extensive discussion with social partners at the national economic development and labour council the covid ters benefit has been extended until 15 march 2021 for sectors that have not been able to fully operate.
tgt_text: kungenxa yesi sizathu sokuba, xa kulandelwa ingxoxo ebanzi kunye namahlakani ezentlalo kwinedlac, isi bonelelo secovid ters s andisiwe kude kube ngumhla we15 kweyokwindla 2021 kumacandelo angakwazanga ukusebenza ngokupheleleyo.

src_text: the special covid grant has been extended for another three months.
tgt_text: isibonelelo esikhethekileyo secovid sandiselwe ezinye iinyanga ezintathu.

src_text: these remain shortterm measures.
tgt_text: la ahlala engamanyathelo amafutshane.

src_text: our focus now must be on creating an enabling environment for businesses to recover, and for economic growth that spurs job creation and attracts invest ment.
tgt_text: ingqwalasela yethu ngoku kufuneka ibe kukudala imeko evumela amashishini ukuba abuyele kwimeko yesiqhelo, kunye nokukhu la koqoqosho olukhuthaza ukudala imisebenzi kunye nokutsala utyalomali.

src_text: the recovery will be difficult and will take time, not least because we are still in the midst of the pandemic.
tgt_text: ukubuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo kuya kuba nzima futhi kuya kuthatha ixesha, hayi kancinci nje kuba sisephakathi kulo bhubhane.

src_text: important as these relief measures are now, we will not be able to sustain them indefinitely.
tgt_text: nangona ebalulekile okwa ngoku la manyathelo oncedo, asisoze sikwazi ukuwagcina unaphakade.

src_text: we need to make sure that these relief measures provide a firm foundation for a broader recovery without driving the country deeper into debt.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba la manyathelo oncedo abonelela ngesiseko esiqinileyo sokubuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo ebanzi ngaphandle kokutyhalela nzulu ilizwe etyaleni.

src_text: unless we can bring our national debt down to sustainable levels no meaningful economic recovery will be possible.
tgt_text: ngaphandle kokuba sinokwehlisa ityala lesizwe lethu liyokufikela kuma nqanaba azinzileyo aku nakubakho ukubuyelwa kwimeko yesiqhelo yoqoqosho.

src_text: our national consciousness must now move beyond the realm of relief into that of recovery, and we must all be part of this effort.
tgt_text: ukuqonda kwethu kwesi zwe ngoku kufuneka kudlu lele ngaphaya kommandla woncedo uyokufikelela kolo lokubuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo, kwaye sonke kufuneka sibe yinxalenye yezi nzame.

src_text: as government, hard decisions on public spending will need to be made and implemented this year.
tgt_text: njengorhulumente, izigqibo ezinzima kwinkcitho yo luntu kuya kufuneka zenzi we kwaye ziphunyezwe kulo nyaka.

src_text: companies will need to be innovative in driving methods and processes that secure their sustainability and profitability, with job retention being their foremost consideration.
