tgt_text: iinkampani kuza kudingeka ukuba zibe noqaliso lwee ndlela ezintsha zokuphe mbelela iindlela kunye nee nkqubo ezikhusela uzinzo ku nye neenzuzo zazo, ukugci nwa kwemisebenzi ibe ye yona nto yazo iphambili ethathelwa ingqalelo.

src_text: we must put our money back into our economy by buying local products, supporting local businesses and industrie and procuring from local suppliers.
tgt_text: kufuneka sibuyisele imali yethu kuqoqosho lwethu ngokuthenga iimveliso zalapha ekhaya, ukuxhasa amashishini asekuhlaleni kunye nemizimveliso kunye nokuthenga kubathengisi basekhaya.

src_text: an injured patient with strong prospects for recovery is given regular phys ical therapy to help them get stronger until they can stand unaided.
tgt_text: isigulana esonzakeleyo esinethemba lokubuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo sinikwa unyango lwarhoqo lwase mzimbeni ukusinceda ukuba somelele side sibe nakho ukuzimela singancediswa nga.

src_text: so must these temporary relief measures be seen as the means to get our economy back on its feet.
tgt_text: ngoko ke kufuneka la manyathelo oncedo abonwe njengeendlela zokubuyisela kwimeko yesiqhelo uqoqosho lwethu.

src_text: our ultimate goal is to walk again.
tgt_text: eyona njongo yethu ephambili kukuqhubela phambili kwakhona.

src_text: as a nation, let us all lend a hand.
tgt_text: njengesizwe, masincedisaneni sonke.

src_text: let us be part of our own development and progress.
tgt_text: masibe yinxa lenye yophuhliso lwethu kunye nenkqubelaphambili.

src_text: let us use the extended relief to drive a stronger recovery.
tgt_text: amanyathelo okuvuselela uqoqosho vukuzenzele unnamed kungekudala iza kuba ngunyaka ukusukela oko sanika ingxelo yokuqala yesimo sentsholongwane icorona kwilizwe lethu.

src_text: a professional public service vukuzenzele unnamed when i was elected to the position of president of south africa, i said that building an efficient, capable and ethical state free from corruption was among my foremost priorities.
tgt_text: imisebenzi karhulumente enobuchule vukuzenzele unnamed xa ndandonyulwa kwisikhundla so kuba ngumonga meli womzantsi afrika, ndathi ukwakha umbuso osebenzayo, onesakhono noziphatha kakuhle onge nalo urhwaphilizo zezona zinto zam eziphambili.

src_text: only a capable, efficient, ethical and developmentoriented state can deliver on the commitment to improve the lives of the people of this country.
tgt_text: kuphela ngumbuso one sakhono, osebenzayo, ozi phatha kakuhle kunye nojoli se kuphuhliso onokunikezela ngeenkonzo ngokuzinikela ekuphuculeni ubomi ba bantu beli lizwe.

src_text: this means that the public service must be staffed by men and women who are professional, skilled, selfless and honest.
tgt_text: oku kuthetha ukuba imisebenzi karhulumente kufuneka ibenabasebenzi abangamadoda nabasetyhini abaqeqeshiweyo, abaneza khono, abangazicingeliyo nabathembakeleyo.

src_text: they must be committed to upholding the values of the constitution, and must, as i said in my inaugural speech, "faithfully serve no other cause than that of the public".
tgt_text: kufuneka bazinikele ekuxhaseni iindlela zoku ziphatha zomgaqosiseko, kwaye kufuneka, njengoko nditshilo kwintetho yam yokungeniswa esikhundleni, "bangabingabo abasebenza ngokuthembakeleyo kwe zinye iinjongo ngaphandle kwezo zikarhulumente".

src_text: over the past two weeks, public consultations have been underway on an important policy document that will give greater impetus to our efforts to bolster, strengthen and capacitate the civil service.
tgt_text: kwezi veki zimbini zidlu lileyo, uthethathethwano noluntu belusenziwa ku xwebhu lomgaqonkqubo obalulekileyo oluza kunika amandla amakhulu kwiinza me zethu zokuxhasa, ukuqi nisa, kunye nokuxhobisa abasebenzi bakarhulumente.

src_text: the draft national implementation framework towards the professionalisation of the public service aims to build a state that better serves our people, that is insulated from undue political interference and where appointments are made on merit.
tgt_text: umthetho osaqulunqwayo wenkqubosikhokelo wo kuphunyezwa kwesizwe kuqeqesho lwabasebenzi bakarhulumente lujolise ekwakheni umbuso osebe nzela ngcono abantu bakuthi, olukhuselweyo kungenelelo olungafanelekanga lwezo politiko nalapho ukuqeshwa kwenziwa ngokwezakhono kunye nemfundo.

src_text: the framework was approved by cabinet in november last year and structured consultation with various sectors of society are now underway.
tgt_text: le nkqubosikhokelo ya vunywa yikhabhinethi kwe yenkanga kunyaka ophe lileyo kwaye uthetha thethwano olucwangcisi weyo kunye namacandelo ohlukeneyo oluntu ngoku luyaqhuba.

src_text: twentyseven years into democracy, it can be said of the public service that while several pockets of excellence exist, we have serious challenges in many government departments with regards to skills, competence and professionalism.
tgt_text: iminyaka engamashumi amabini anesixhenxe ku lawulo lwentando yesininzi, kunokuthethwa ngemise benzi karhulumente ukuba, ngelixa kukho imisebenzi eyenziwe kakuhle, sinemiceli mngeni emandla kumasebe amaninzi karhulumente ma lunga nezakhono, ubuchule kunye nobungcali.

src_text: all too often, people have been hired into and promoted to key positions for which they are neither suitable nor qualified.
tgt_text: rhoqo, abantu baye baqeshwa bonyuselwa kwizikhundla eziphambili abangazifanelanga okanye abangazifundelanga.

src_text: this affects government performance, but also contributes to nepotism, political interference in the work of departments, lack of accountability, mismanagement and corruption.
tgt_text: oku kuchaphazela ukusebenza kukarhulumente, kodwa kukwa negalelo ekuqesheni ngokuzalana, ungenelelo lwezopolitiko kumsebenzi wamasebe, ukunqongophala koxanduva lokuphendula, ukuphatha gwenxa kunye norhwaphilizo.

src_text: there is also the related problem of political and executive interference in the administration of the public service.
tgt_text: kukwakho ingxaki eha mbelana nokungenelela kwezopolitiko nongenelelo lwabaphathi kulawulo lwe misebenzi karhulumente.

src_text: one need only to look at the instability in government departments when senior managers are swopped or replaced each time a new minister is appointed.
tgt_text: umntu kufuneka ajonge kuphela ekungazinzini kumasebe karhulumente xa kutshintshwa abaphathi abaphezulu okanye betha thelwa indawo ngabanye abaphathi ngalo lonke ixesha xa kuqeshwa umphathiswa omtsha.

src_text: directorsgeneral (dgs) and provincial heads of departments (hods) are particularly affected.
tgt_text: abalawulijikelele kunye neentloko zamasebe epho ndo bayachaphazeleka ngokukodwa.

src_text: in some departments, dgs, hods and executive managers have had stability of tenure, enabling the departments to function with little disruption.
tgt_text: kwamanye amasebe, iidgs, iihods kunye nabaphathi abaphezu lu babe nozinzo lwengqesho, okwenza ukuba amasebe asebenze ngokuphazamiseka okuncinci.

src_text: in most of these departments where there is leadership stability, audit outcomes tend to be positive and public funds can be accounted for.
tgt_text: kwinkoliso yala masebe apho kukho uzinzo kubunkokheli, iziphumo zophicothozincwadi zihlala zintle kwaye neengxowamali zikarhulumente zitha thelwa ingqalelo.

src_text: where there is a high turnover of heads of department, there is often administrative turmoil.
tgt_text: apho kukho iinguqu zeentloko zamasebe, kuhlala kukho ingxwabangxwaba kula wulo.

src_text: one of the key recommendations made in the draft framework is that the public service must be depoliticised and that government departments must be insulated from politics.
tgt_text: esinye sezindululo ezi phambili ezenziwe kulo mthetho osaqulunqwayo wenkqubosikhokelo kukuba imisebenzi karhulumente kufuneka ingenziwa upoli tiko kwaye amasebe karhulu mente kufuneka akhuselwe kwezopolitiko.

src_text: professionalisation is necessary for stability in the public service, especially in the senior ranks.
tgt_text: ukuqeqeshelwa umse benzi kuyafuneka ukuze kubekho uzinzo kwimi sebenzi karhulumente, ingakumbi kwizikhundla eziphezulu.

src_text: public servants must be able to continue doing their jobs "regardless of any changes of ministers, members of the executive council or councillors within the governing party in charge of the administration, or changes to political parties after elections".
tgt_text: abasebenzi bakarhulumente kufuneka babenakho ukuqhubeka nokwenza imisebenzi yabo "ngaphandle kwazo naziphi na iinguqulelo zabapha thiswa, amalungu ebhunga olawulo oluphezulu okanye ooceba ngaphakathi kwi qela elilawulayo elongamele ulawulo, okanye utshintsho kwimibutho yezopolitiko emva konyulo".

src_text: we are proposing a number of farreaching reforms, such as extending the tenure of hods based on merit and performance, doing occupationbased competency assessments and involving the public service commission in the interviews of dgs and deputy dgs.
tgt_text: siphakamisa uninzi lwe enguqu ezibanzi, ezinje ngokwandisa ixesha lokuhla la kweentloko zamasebe ngokusekelwe kwisakhono nemfundo kunye nokuse benza, ukwenza uvavanyo lokubanako ukusebenza olubhekiselele kumsebenzi kunye nokubandakanya iko mishoni yezemisebenzi ka rhulumente kudliwano ndlebe lwabalawulijikelele kunye nosekela balawulijikelele.

src_text: introducing integrity tests for all shortlisted individuals will help so that we can recruit civil servants who can serve honestly.
tgt_text: ukwazisa iimvavanyo zokunyaniseka kubo bonke abagqatswa abakuluhlu olufutshane kuza kunceda ukuze sikwazi ukufumana abasebenzi bakarhulumente abanokusebenza ngokunya nisekileyo.

src_text: we also need to extend the compulsory entrance exams that we introduced in april 2020 beyond senior management.
tgt_text: sikwafuna ukwa ndisa iimviwo zokungena ezinyanzelekileyo esazazisa ngeyetshazimpunzi wama2020 emva kwabaphathi abaphezulu.

src_text: successful developmental states have similar measures which help advance professionalism within the public service.
tgt_text: amazwe asa phuhlayo aphumeleleyo ana manyathelo afanayo anceda ukuqhubelelisa phambili ubuchule kwimisebenzi ka rhulumente.

src_text: as we note in the draft framework, "the bureaucracy must continue to loyally and diligently implement the political mandate set by voters and the party, but to refrain from being political actors themselves.
tgt_text: njengoko siqaphela ku mthetho osaqulunqwayo wenkqubosikhokelo, "imi thetho exabileyo ebambe zelayo kufuneka iqhubeke ngokuthembeka nangoku zimisela ukufezekisa igunya lezopolitiko elibekwe nga bavoti kunye neqela, kodwa bayeke ukuba ngabadlali bezopolitiko ngokwabo.

src_text: "we are suggesting a more rigorous approach towards recruitment and selection of public servants, induction and performance management.
tgt_text: "siphakamisa indlela ebu khali ngakumbi ekugayweni nasekukhetheni abasebenzi bakarhulumente, ukuqesha esikhundleni kunye no lawulo lokusebenza.

src_text: this includes continuous learning and a clear professional development path for every public servant.
tgt_text: oku kubandakanya ukufunda okuqhubekayo kunye ne ndlela ecacileyo yophuhliso lomsebenzi kuso sonke isise benzi sikarhulumente.

src_text: the draft framework puts emphasis on the need to hold public servants accountable for irregularities, to do away with a culture of impunity in the mismanagement and misappropriation of state resources.
tgt_text: umthetho osaqulunqwayo wenkqubosikhokelo ube ka ugxininiso kwimfuneko yokuba abasebenzi bakarhu lumente baphendule ngeze nzo ezinxaxhileyo, ukuze ku pheliswe isiqhelo sokungo hlwaywa kulawulo olugwe nxa kunye nokusetyenziswa gwenxa kwezixhobo zombuso.

src_text: professionalising the public service involves training for accounting officers across all spheres of government on the applicable legislative provisions.
tgt_text: ukusebenza ngobuchule kwimisebenzi karhulumente kubandakanya uqeqesho lwamagosa anoxanduva kuwo onke amanqanaba karhulumente ngezibonelelo zomthetho ezifanelekileyo.

src_text: the national school of government (nsg) has a vital role to play in this regard.
tgt_text: isikolo sesizwe sikarhu lumente sinendima ebalule kileyo ekufuneka siyidlalile malunga noku.

src_text: professionalism is not only about having the right qualifications and technical skills, but also about having appropriate standards of respect, courtesy and integrity in dealing with members of the public.
tgt_text: ubuchule abuphelelanga nje ekubeni ubeneziqinisekiso zemfundo ezifanelekileyo kunye nezakhono zobugcisa, kodwa bukwamalunga no kubanemigangatho efanele kileyo yentlonipho, imbeko nentembeko ekusebenzisa neni namalungu oluntu.

src_text: the public service is diverse, with a huge range of skills, qualifications and capabilities.
tgt_text: imisebenzi karhulumente yahlukile, inoluhlu olukhulu lwezakhono, iziqinisekiso zemfundo kunye namandla okusebenza.

src_text: many public servants have specialised skills that are necessary for the effective provision of services.
tgt_text: uninzi lwaba sebenzi bakarhulumente banezakhono ezikhethe kileyo eziyimfuneko eku nikezelweni kweenkonzo ngokufanelekileyo.

src_text: it is therefore not necessarily the case that we need a smaller public service: what we actually need is a fitforpurpose public service with suitable skills, a professional ethic and a commitment to serving the people.
tgt_text: ngoko ke ayonyani into yokuba sifuna abasebenzi bakarhulumente abancinane: eyona nto siyi funayo abasebenzi bakarhu lumente abafanele injongo abanezakhono ezifaneleki leyo, indlela yokuziphatha efanelekileyo kunye noku zibophelela ekusebenzeleni abantu.

src_text: the men and women of the public service need to be capacitated to play their role in driving development and consolidating democracy.
tgt_text: amadoda nabasetyhini abasebenza kurhulumente kufuneka baxhotyiswe ukuze badlale indima yabo ekuqhu beni uphuhliso nasekuqi niseni ulawulo lwentando yesininzi.

src_text: this is our best guarantee of a capable state that serves the interests of citizens.
tgt_text: esi sisiqinisekiso sethu esifanelekileyo so mbuso osebenzela iimfuno zabemi.

src_text: i call on you to be part of the public consultation process around this draft framework, which is available on the nsg's website, and to make your voice heard.
tgt_text: ndihlaba ikhwelo kuni ukuba nibe yinxalenye yenkqubo yokubonisana noluntu malunga nomthetho osaqulunqwayo wenkqubosikhokelo, olufumaneka kwi webhusayithi yesikolo sizwe sikarhulumente, kwaye wenze ilizwi lakho livakale.

src_text: the public service does not belong to any one party, nor should it be the domain of any particular interest group.
tgt_text: imisebenzi karhulumente ayisiyo eyalo naliphi na iqela elinye, kwaye ayifanelanga ukuba ibe lulawulo lwalo naliphi na iqela elinezimvo ezifanayo.

src_text: it should not be a law unto itself.
tgt_text: akufanelanga ukuba ibengumthetho kulo.

src_text: the public service belongs to the people of south africa.
tgt_text: imisebenzi kahulumeni ngeyabantu bomzantsi afrika.

src_text: it must serve them and them alone.
tgt_text: imisebenzi karhulumente enobuchule vukuzenzele unnamed xa ndandonyulwa kwisikhundla so kuba ngumonga meli womzantsi afrika, ndathi ukwakha umbuso osebenzayo, onesakhono noziphatha kakuhle onge nalo urhwaphilizo zezona zinto zam eziphambili.

src_text: traditional leaders key to recovery efforts vukuzenzele unnamed in the last few months, we have had to bid a sad farewell to two of our country’s most respected traditional monarchs.
tgt_text: iinkokheli zemveli ziphambili kwimizamo yokubuyisela kwimeko yesiqhelo vukuzenzele unnamed kwezi nyanga zi mbalwa zidluli leyo, kuye kwafu neka siginye nokuba kuya krakra xa iinkosi ezimbini ezihlonitshwayo kwilizwe lethu ziye zasutywa ku kufa.

src_text: the zulu people recently laid to rest his majesty king goodwill zwelithini ka bhekuzulu who reigned for half a century.
tgt_text: kutsha nje abantu bakwazu lu babeke kwikhaya lokugqi bela ukumkani ugoodwill zwelithini kabhekuzulu olawule kangangesiqingatha senkulungwane.

src_text: in january, the bapedi people buried kgoshikgolo thulare thulare iii, who passed away less than a year after his inauguration.
tgt_text: ngenya nga yomqungu, abapedi ba ngcwabe ukgoshikgolo thu lare thulare iii, osutywe ku kufa kungekapheli nonyaka emva kokubekwa kwakhe esihlalweni.

src_text: with their passing, we have lost champions of the preservation of our heritage, and revered custodians of the histories of their respective peoples.
tgt_text: ngokudlula kwabo emhla beni, siphulukene neentsha tsheli zolondolozo lwamafa ethu, kwaye sihlonipha aba gcini beembali zabantu babo.

src_text: at the same time, they were vital players in rural development, and were committed to driving programmes to uplift the material conditions of their people.
tgt_text: kwangelo xesha, ba bengabadlali bendima ebalulekileyo kuphuhliso lwasemaphandleni, kwaye babezinikele kwiinkqubo zokuqhuba ukuphakamisa iimeko ezibonakalayo za bantu babo.

src_text: with the advent of democracy in 1994, it was a priority of the new government to restore the integrity and legitimacy of traditional leadership in line with indigenous law and customs and subject to the constitution of the republic.
tgt_text: ngokufika kolawulo lwe ntando yesininzi ngonya ka we1994, yayiyeyona nto iphambili kurhulumente omtsha ukubuyisela isidima nokuba semthethweni kobunkokheli bemveli ngo kuhambelana nomthetho wemveli namasiko kwaye kuxhomekeke kumgaqosiseko weriphabhlikhi.

src_text: the institution of traditional leadership continues to play an important role in the lives of millions of people around our country, especially in rural areas.
tgt_text: iziko lobunkokheli bemveli liyaqhubeka nokudlala indi ma ebalulekileyo kubomi bezigidi zabantu kwilizwe lethu liphela, ingakumbi emaphandleni.

src_text: traditional leaders support and drive development in their communities.
tgt_text: iinkokheli zemveli zixhasa kwaye zi qhuba uphuhliso kwiindawo zabo.

src_text: recently, i had the opportunity to participate in the debate on the opening of the national house of traditional leaders, which was concerned with the most pressing issues currently facing the country.
tgt_text: kutsha nje, ndiye ndafuma na ithuba lokuthatha inxaxhe ba kwingxoxo mpikiswano kuvulo lwendlu yeenkokhe li zemveli yesizwe, ebikha thazwa ziingxaki ezinzima ezijamelene nelizwe ngoku.

src_text: what was particularly refreshing about the robust engagement was that traditional leadership has a keen appreciation of the difficult economic conditions facing our country, and want to be part of addressing the many challenges of underdevelopment and poverty in their areas.
tgt_text: eyona nto yayihlaziya kakhulu kuthethathethwano olomeleleyo yayikukuba iinkokheli zemveli zinombu lelo ongazenzisiyo ngeemeko ezinzima zoqoqosho ezijame lene nelizwe lethu, kwaye zifuna ukuba yinxalenye yo kujongana nemiceli mngeni emininzi yokungafumani uphuhliso kunye nentlu pheko kwiindawo zabo.

src_text: i have consistently said that our economic recovery in the wake of the coronavirus pandemic must be inclusive, and that nobody must be left behind.
tgt_text: ndisoloko ndisitsho ukuba ukubuyela kwethu kuqo qosho emva kobhubhane wentsholongwane icorona kufuneka kubandakanye wonke umntu, kwaye aku kho mntu ekufuneka ashi yeke ngasemva.

src_text: the success of the economic reconstruction and recovery plan rests on forging strong partnerships between not just government, business and labour, but also with traditional leadership and other societal formations.
tgt_text: impumelelo yesicwangci so sokwakha ngokutsha nokuvuselelwa koqoqosho ixhomekeke ekubumbeni ubudlelwane obuluqilima phakathi kungekuphela ku karhulumente, amashishini kunye nabasebenzi, kodwa kunye neenkokheli zemveli kunye nolunye ulwakhiwo loluntu.

src_text: a constant refrain from participants in the debate recently was that they do not want to be dependent on handouts or for their communities to perpetually look to government for financial assistance.
tgt_text: abakutsho ngokuphinda phinda kwingxoxompiki swano kutsha nje kukuba abafuni kuxhomekeka kwi zibonelelo okanye kuluntu lwabo ukuba luhlale lujonge kurhulumente ngoncedo lwezezimali.

src_text: they want to be provided with the necessary support, training and enabling environment to allow rural communities to be selfsufficient.
tgt_text: bafuna ukubonelelwa ngenkxaso eyimfuneko, uqeqesho kunye nemeko efanelekileyo yokuvumela uluntu lwasemaphandleni ukuba luzimele.

src_text: they want to bridge the urbanrural divide in access to government services and private sector resources.
tgt_text: bafuna ukuvala iyantlu kwano phakathi kwasezido lophini nasemaphandleni ekufikeleleni kwiinkonzo zi karhulumente nakwizixhobo zecandelo labucala.

src_text: what they would like to see is for rural areas to become centres of economic activity, industry and employment opportunity.
tgt_text: into abangathanda ukuyi bona kukuba iindawo zasemaphandleni zibe nga maziko emisebenzi yezoqo qosho, amashishini kunye namathuba engqesho.

src_text: this mirrors the aspirations of the district development model (ddm), which was launched in 2019. traditional leaders are well positioned to ensure that district plans are informed by and respond to the real needs of communities and that they reflect the lived reality in rural areas.
tgt_text: oku kubonisa iminqweno ye modeli yophuhliso yesithili (iddm), neyasungulwa ngowama2019.

src_text: just as the ddm supports localised programmes that focus on the needs, strengths and opportunities in specific areas, traditional leaders have pioneered their own approach to local economic development.
tgt_text: iinkokheli zemveli zikwi meko efanelekileyo yokuqi nisekisa ukuba izicwangciso zezithili ziyahambelana kwaye ziyaphendula kwi imfuno zokwenene zoluntu kwaye zibonakalisa ubunya ni bobomi obuphilwa ema phandleni.

src_text: they have developed the investrural masterplan, which was launched in north west last month.
tgt_text: njengokuba iddm ixha sa iinkqubo zalapha ekhaya ezijolise kwiimfuno, uko melela kunye namathuba kwiindawo ezithile, iinko kheli zemveli ziye zangenele la kwindlela yabo kuphuhliso loqoqosho lwasekhaya.

src_text: it is greatly encouraging that traditional leaders have rallied behind the plan and want to work with local authorities to ensure it is a success.
tgt_text: baqulunqe isicwangciso esikhulu seinvestrural , eyasungulwa emntla ntsho na kwinyanga ephelileyo.

src_text: during the debate in the national house of traditional leaders it was proposed that a major success factor for the investrural programme is that traditional structures are trained, strengthened and capacitated.
tgt_text: kuyakhuthaza kakhulu ukuba iinkokheli zemveli ziye zaxhasa esi sicwangciso kwaye zifuna ukusebenzisa na noorhulumente basekha ya ukuqinisekisa ukuba siyi mpumelelo.

src_text: a number of participants outlined economic plans that are already in advanced stages of development.
tgt_text: ngexesha lengxoxo kwi ndlu yeenkokheli zemve li yesizwe kwacetyiswa uku ba eyona mpumelelo ipha mbili kwinkqubo yotyalomali lwasemaphandleni kukuba imibutho yemveli iyaqeqeshwa, yomelezwe kwaye ixhotyiswe.

src_text: these range from agricultural projects to bioprospecting to renewable energy.
tgt_text: abathathinxaxheba aba ninzi bazichaza izicwangciso zoqoqosho esele zikwisigaba esiphambili sophuhliso.

src_text: what was evident is that the institution of traditional leadership understands that professionalisation is necessary for rural businesses in the form of small, medium and micro enterprises and cooperatives to become part of the mainstream economy.
tgt_text: olu luhlu lususela kwiiprojekthi zezolimo ukuya kuhlolo kwe mveliso ezivela kwizilwanya na nezityalo ezohlukeneyo ukuya ekudaleni amandla amatsha ombane.

src_text: the traditional leaders who spoke presented their vision of ‘developmental monarchs’, who see themselves as not just custodians of heritage but also as drivers of economic prosperity and progress.
tgt_text: okubonakalayo kukuba iziko lobunkokheli bemve li liyayiqonda into yokuba ukuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi wobugcisa kubalulekile ku shishino lwasemaphandle ni ngohlobo lwa mashishini amancinci, aphakathi kunye nookopolotyeni ukuze babe yinxalenye yoqoqosho olu phambili.

src_text: they have identified several projects and economic opportunities that will create jobs and improve livelihoods in rural areas.
tgt_text: iinkokheli zemveli ezithethi leyo ziveze umbono wazo 'weenkosi eziphuhlisayo', abangaziboni njengabagci ni bamafa emveli kuphela kodwa nanjengabaqhubi bempumelelo yezoqoqosho nenkqubela phambili.

src_text: traditional leaders have also expressed their willingness to play an active part in the land reform process.
tgt_text: ba chonge iiprojekthi ezininzi kunye namathuba ezoqo qosho azakudala imisebenzi kwaye aphucule ubomi kwii ndawo ezisemaphandleni.

src_text: since 2018, traditional leaders have made around 1 500 000 hectares of communal land available for development, and it is hoped this will increase in future.
tgt_text: iinkokheli zemveli zikwa vakalisile ukuzimisela kwazo ukuthatha inxaxheba ebona kalayo kwinkqubo yokubu yiselwa komhlaba.

src_text: to develop a coordinated and sustainable strategy, we have agreed to hold a presidential land summit in the next year.
tgt_text: ukusuke la ngowama2018, iinkokheli zemveli zenze malunga ne1 500 000 yeehektare zomhlaba wabahlali ukuba ufumane uphuhliso, kwaye kuyathe njwa ukuba oku kuza kwa nda kwixesha elizayo.

src_text: this will discuss pressing issues around land reform and its impact on communal land, much of which is located in rural areas.
tgt_text: ukuphuhlisa iqhinga elilu ngelelanisiweyo nelizinzi leyo, sivumelene ngoku bamba ingqungquthela yomhlaba kamongameli ku nyaka olandelayo.

src_text: the tone of the debate in the national house was a fitting reflection of a climate in which economic recovery is foremost among our considerations.
tgt_text: oku kuza kuxoxwa ngemiba enzima malunga nokubuyiselwa komhlaba kunye nefuthe lawo kumhlaba wabahlali, uninzi lwawo usezilalini.

src_text: at the same time it was a promising signal that traditional leaders appreciate their role in being part of the national recovery effort through being proactive and innovative.
tgt_text: imo yengxoxompikiswano kwindlu kazwelonke yayi yimbonakalo efanelekileyo yemeko apho ukubuyise lwa koqoqosho kubaluleke kakhulu phakathi kwe ngqwalasela yethu.

src_text: the most fitting legacy of great leaders is that the seeds of development they sow during their tenure grow into mighty trees that protect and shelter their communities for posterity.
tgt_text: kwa ngaxeshanye ibingumqo ndiso othembisayo wokuba iinkokheli zemveli ziyayi xabisa indima yazo yokuba yinxalenye yomzamo woku lungisa imeko yesizwe ngo kusebenza kunye nokwenza izinto ezintsha.

src_text: as we work together as a country to rebuild our economy, we will continue to count on the support of the institution of traditional leadership, which is an inextricable part of our past, our present and our future.
tgt_text: iinkokheli zemveli ziphambili kwimizamo yokubuyisela kwimeko yesiqhelo vukuzenzele unnamed kwezi nyanga zi mbalwa zidluli leyo, kuye kwafu neka siginye nokuba kuya krakra xa iinkosi ezimbini ezihlonitshwayo kwilizwe lethu ziye zasutywa ku kufa.

src_text: religious community vital in the fight against covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed recently many south africans of faith have joined others across the world in important religious observances.
tgt_text: amakholwa abalulekile kwidabi lokulwa necovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed kutshanje uni nzi lwabantu bezenkolo base mzantsi afrika baye bazi bandakanya nabanye abantu kwihlabathi jikelele kwimibhi yozo ebalulekileyo yezenkolo.

src_text: members of the jewish faith celebrated pesach, chris tians observed easter and muslims will soon be observing the holy month of ramadan.
tgt_text: amalungu enkolo yama juda abhiyozele ipesach , amakristu abhiyozela ipasika kwaye amasi lamsi kungekudala azakubhiyozela inya nga engcwele yeramadan .

src_text: for the second year, these occasions have been marked in the midst of a devastating global pandemic that has cost the lives of more than 2.5 million people across the world.
tgt_text: ukuza kutsho kunyaka wesibini, le misitho iye yaqatshelwa phakathi kobhubhane wehlabathi otshabalalisayo othe wa hamba nobomi babantu abangaphezulu kwezigidi eziyi2.5 kwihlabathi jikelele.

src_text: faithbased organisations have been vital to our national response to the disease, not only providing spiritual comfort and guidance, but also by caring for those most vulnerable to the effects of the pandemic, including through the provision of food, shelter and other social services.
tgt_text: imibutho esekwe kwinkolo iye yabaluleka ekuphendu leni kwesizwe kwesi sifo, inganeli nje ukunika intuthu zelo kunye nokuhokelwa ngokwasemoyeni, kodwa nangokukhathalela abo basemngciphekweni kwiziphumo zobhubhane, kuquka ukunikezelwa kokutya, indawo yokuhlala kunye nezinye iinkonzo zentlalo .

src_text: religion plays an important role in the lives of millions of south africans, and congregational worship forms a vital part of their religious practice.
tgt_text: inkolo idlala indima eba lulekileyo kubomi bezigidi zabantu basemzantsi afrika, kwaye ukukhonza kwama bandla kuyinxalenye eba lulekileyo yenkolo yabo.

src_text: being able to gather for religious services is also a welcome respite from a period of great hardship for individuals, families and communities.
tgt_text: ukubanakho ukuba neendibano zeenkonzo zenkolo kuwakukuphumla okwamkelekileyo ukusuka kwixe sha lobunzima obukhulu kubantu, iintsapho kunye noluntu.

src_text: it is understandable that after more than a year of labouring under restrictions on religious gatherings that the faith community are keen for a return to a semblance of normality.
tgt_text: kuyaqondakala ukuba emva konyaka wokuse benza phantsi kwezithintelo zeendibano zenkolo uku ba uluntu lwezenkolo lufuna ukubuyela kwi meko yalo yesiqhelo.

src_text: in recognition of the importance of congregational worship to the lives of our people, government has been engaging with the faith community.
tgt_text: ekuqwalaselweni ko kubaluleka kokukhonza kwamabandla kubomi babantu bethu, urhulu mente ebesoloko ethetha thethana namabandla.

src_text: leaders of the faith community understand and appreciate the very real danger of a new wave of covid19 infections.
tgt_text: iinkokheli zamabandla ziyayiqonda kwaye ziyayazi lengozi yokwenyani yexesha elitsha losuleleko olugqithi sileyo lwecovid19 .

src_text: since the outbreak of the pandemic, religious organisations have taken proactive and positive measures to limit the spread of the disease among worshippers.
tgt_text: uku sukela oko kwaqhambuka ubhubhane, imibutho ye zenkolo ithathe amanya thelo afanelekileyo nancomekayo ukunqanda ukusasazeka kwesi sifo phakathi kwabakhonzi.

src_text: another important factor is that during the various alert levels, religious organisations have incurred substantial financial losses that threaten their sustainability.
tgt_text: enye into ebalulekileyo ku kuba kwixesha lamanqana ba okulumkisa ahlukeneyo, imibutho yezenkolo ilahle kelwe yimali eninzi kakhulu ethe yanesigrogriso kwi sakhono sokuhlangabezana neemfuno zayo.

src_text: as government we remain committed to working with the faith community to find workable solutions.
tgt_text: njengo rhulumente sihlala sizinikele ekusebenzisaneni nama bandla ukufumana izisombululo ezisebenzisekayo.

src_text: at the same time, public health and safety must be our paramount consideration.
tgt_text: kwangaxeshanye, impilo yoluntu kunye nokhu seleko kufuneka zibe yeyona nto ethathelwa ingqalelo ephambili kuthi.

src_text: the religious community has shown innovation and initiative in the holding of worship at a time when there was a great deal of uncertainty over the trajectory of the pandemic.
tgt_text: amabandla abonakalise utshintsho kunye neqhinga lokukhonza ngexesha apho bekukho ukungaqi niseki okukhulu malunga nomkhondo wobhubhane.

src_text: congregational services were held online and worshippers were encouraged to pray in their homes instead of attending services.
tgt_text: iinkonzo zamabandla zaziqhutywa ngeinta nethi kwaye abakho nzi bakhuthazwa ukuba bathandaze emakhayeni abo endaweni yo kuzimasa iinkonzo.

src_text: this greatly aided the national effort to contain the spread of the disease.
tgt_text: oku kuncede kakhulu iinzame zesizwe zokunqanda ukusasazeka kwesi sifo.

src_text: religious leaders played a pivotal role in encouraging public adherence to health measures around important customary and cultural rituals like burials.
tgt_text: iinkokheli zakalizwi zidlale indima ebalule kileyo ekukhuthazeni ukubambelela koluntu kumanyathelo ezempilo angqonge amasiko nezithe the zenkcubeko ezibaluleki leyo ezifana nemingcwabo.

src_text: by equal measure, our people have demonstrated their commitment to adhering to public health protocols and to social distancing.
tgt_text: ngokomlinganiselo olinganayo, abantu bethu babonakalise ukuzinikela kwabo ekubambeleleni kwizicwangcisonkqubo ze zempilo zoluntu nasekugcinweni komgama ekuhlaleni.

src_text: and they correctly appreciate that they must continue to avoid large gatherings .
tgt_text: kwaye bayayiqonda ngo kuchanekileyo into yokuba kufuneka baqhubeke uku phepha iindibano ezinkulu.

src_text: we are now at a time where precaution is needed above all.
tgt_text: ngoku sikwixesha apho uku lumka kufuneka ngaphezulu kwako konke.

src_text: the coronavirus pandemic has not been eliminated, either in our own country or around the world.
tgt_text: ubhubhane wentsholongwane yecorona awupheliswanga, nokuba kukwilizwe lethu okanye kwihlabathi jikelele.

src_text: the threat of a third wave is real and everpresent.
tgt_text: isi grogriso setyeli lesithathu losuleleko olugqithisileyo siyinyani kwaye sihlala sikhona.

src_text: international experience has taught us that we should not tempt fate.
tgt_text: amava ehlabathi asifundisile ukuba akufu neki ukuba senze izinto ezi nomngcipheko okanye ezino bungozi.

src_text: many countries have eased restrictions, only for there to be resurgences, necessitating the imposition of even harsher restrictions.
tgt_text: amazwe amaninzi aye azinyenyisa izithintelo, yaye yavuka kwakhona intsholongwane, nto leyo inyanzelise ukumiselwa kwezithintelo ezingqongqo.

src_text: large gatherings, whether religious or otherwise, have the potential to spread the virus, despite the application of measures around social distancing and sanitising.
tgt_text: iindibano ezinkulu, nokuba zezenkolo okanye zingenye indlela, zinako ukusasaza intsholongwane, nangona kukho ukusetyenziswa kwamanyathelo angqonge ukuhlala ukumgama kunye nokusebenzisa isibulali ntsholongwane.

src_text: millions of south africans have been observing an important tenet of their faith.
tgt_text: izigidi za bemi bomzantsi afrika be ziqwalasela inkolelo eba lulekileyo yokholo lwabo.

src_text: in a country that enshrines the right to religious freedom, all effort must be made to support our people in the exercise of this right.
tgt_text: kwilizwe eligcina ilungelo lenkululeko yenkolo, kufu neka kwenziwe konke oku semandleni ukuxhasa abantu bethu ekusebenziseni eli lungelo.

src_text: and in exercising this right, we need to make sure that we do not place the rights or the lives of others at risk.
tgt_text: kwaye ekusebenziseni eli lungelo, kufuneka siqini sekise ukuba asibeki amalungelo okanye ubomi babanye abantu emngciphekweni.

src_text: this is a principle that the religious leaders i met with fully support and appreciate.
tgt_text: le yinkqubo endithe ndafu mana kuyo inkxaso kunye nokuxatyiswa okupheleleyo zinkokheli zakalizwi endi the ndadibana nazo.

src_text: they understand the responsibility of all people of faith – indeed of all south africans – to observe the practical measures put in place to protect people’s health and save lives.
tgt_text: ziya luqonda uxanduva lwabantu bonke bokholo ngenene bonke abemi bomzantsi afri ka – baqwalasela amanya thelo asebenzayo akhoyo okukhusela impilo yabantu kunye nokusindisa ubomi.

src_text: for more than a year, we have worked together as a society to contain this pandemic.
tgt_text: ngaphezulu konyaka, siye sasebenzisana njengo luntu ukugcina lo bhubhane phantsi kolawulo.

src_text: now as we work to overcome it, we need to reaffirm our shared determination to act responsibly and cautiously.
tgt_text: ngoku njengoko sisebenzela ukumoyisa, kufuneka siqinisekise ngokuzimisela kokwabelana kwethu ukuba senza ngoxanduva nangokulumkileyo.

src_text: in doing so, we will be giving practical effect to the universal messages of hope, salvation, freedom and solidarity that will be spoken of in the churches, synagogues, mosques and homes of our land in the days and weeks ahead.
tgt_text: amakholwa abalulekile kwidabi lokulwa necovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed kutshanje uni nzi lwabantu bezenkolo base mzantsi afrika baye bazi bandakanya nabanye abantu kwihlabathi jikelele kwimibhi yozo ebalulekileyo yezenkolo.

src_text: port of durban creates a sea of opportunities for sa vukuzenzele unnamed recently, i visit ed the port of durban to see for myself the work being done to make the port more efficient and competitive.
tgt_text: izibuko lasethekwini lehlisela umzantsi afrika imvula yama thuba vukuzenzele unnamed kutsha nje, ndikhe ndandwendwela izibuko lasethekwi ni ukuze ndizibonele ngo kwam umsebenzi owenziwayo ukulenza lisebenze ngendlela efanelekileyo likwazi uku melana nomgangatho wehla bathi.

src_text: after a briefing with the senior management of transnet, i toured the harbour in a pilot boat, which is usually used to guide large ships through the entrance channel to the pier.
tgt_text: emveni kokufumana ingxe lo kubalawuli abaphezulu bakwatransnet, ndiye ndakhe nketha izibuko ngesikhepe saba lathindlela, esidla ngokusetye nziselwa ukukhokela iinqanawe ezinkulu xa zingena kwijelo lokungena kwibrorho ezimisa kuyo.

src_text: seeing the workings of the port from the water, one is reminded of its vast scale and complexity.
tgt_text: ukubona ukusebenza kwezi buko usemanzini, kukhumbuza indlela elikhulu nelintsokothe ngayo.

src_text: if the port does not function efficiently, the entire economy suffers, from importers and exporters to consumers.
tgt_text: ukuba izibuko alisebenzi ngendlela, uqoqosho lonke luba nobunzima, ukususela kubantu bazisa izinto kweli nabo baha mbisa izinto kumanye amazwe ukuya kutsho kubathengi.

src_text: on the other hand, if the port works well it can drive economic growth and position our country as a gateway to the region and the continent.
tgt_text: kwelinye icala, ukuba izibuko lisebenza kakuhle, lingaqhuba ukukhula koqoqosho ze libeke ilizwe lethu kwindawo yokuba li sango lokuya kwingingqi nakwi zwekazi.

src_text: when i visited durban in october 2019, many local businesses and port users raised concerns with me about the performance of the durban port.
tgt_text: ngethuba endandindwe ndwele ethekwini ngeyedwarha ku2019, oosomashishini nabantu abaninzi abasebenzisa izibuko bandixelela ngeenkxalabo zabo malunga nendlela elisebenza ngayo izibuko lasethekwini.

src_text: shipping companies, in particular, expressed concern about truck congestion and waiting times, ship berthing delays and anchorage times, poor maintenance of equipment and generally low productivity in the port.
tgt_text: iinkampani ezithutha ngee nqanawe, ingakumbi, zavakali sa inkxalabo malunga noxinano lweeloli kunye namaxesha oku linda, ukulibaziseka kokumisa kweenqanawe kunye namaxe sha okubambelelisa iinqanawe, ukungakhathalelwa ngendlela kwezixhobo nokuba phantsi nje kwemveliso kweli zibuko.

src_text: my recent visit to the port was to check whether the commitments made in response to these concerns had been implemented.
tgt_text: utyelelo lwam lwakutsha nje kweli zibuko ibilolokujonga ukuba izibophelelo ezenziwayo njengempendulo kwezi nkxalabo ziphunyeziwe kusini na.

src_text: there has indeed been great progress over the past year in turning around the performance of the port, despite the impact of covid19.
tgt_text: ngenene kukho inkqubelaphambili yokwenyani kulo nyaka ugqithileyo kwindlela elisebenza ngayo eli zibuko, nangona be kukho ifuthe lecovid19 .

src_text: these efforts are already showing results in improved maintenance of equipment, reduced congestion, quicker turnaround times and increased use of rail instead of road transport.
tgt_text: le mizamo sele ibonakalisa iziphumo ekuphucukeni ko kukhathalelwa kwezixhobo, ukwehla koxinano, ukukhawu leziswa kokwenziwa kwezinto nokonyuka kokusetyenziswa kwezithuthi zikaloliwe endaweni yezendlela.

src_text: while this is important progress, there is still much work to be done to position durban as a worldclass port and as a hub port for the southern hemisphere.
tgt_text: nangona oku kuyinkqubelaphambili ebalulekileyo, usemni nzi umsebenzi ekufuneka we nziwe ukwenza ithekwini ibe lizibuko elikumgangatho wehla bathi nelona zibuko lixakekileyo kwisiqingatha somhlaba esise mazantsi.

src_text: in recent years, the port has slipped from its position as first in africa to third, behind tangier in morocco and port said in egypt.
tgt_text: kule minyaka yakutsha nje, eli zibuko lehlile kwindawo yalo yo kuqala eafrika laya kweyesitha thu, emva kwetangier yasemo rocco neport said yaseegypt.

src_text: truck turnaround times have greatly improved.
tgt_text: amaxesha eeloli okwenza imi sebenzi yazo aphucuke kakhulu.

src_text: similarly, the reliability of cargo handling equipment has improved to 80% and is heading towards at least 95% to meet international benchmarks.
tgt_text: kananjalo, ukwazeka kokuxho mekeka kwizixhobo zokuphatha umthwalo kuphucuke kwaya kutsho kwiipesenti ezingama80 kwaye kuleqa ubuncinane bee pesenti ezingama95 ukuze ku fikelele kwimilinganiselo yehla bathi.

src_text: ship waiting times have reduced to impressive levels.
tgt_text: ezi nkcukachamanani zinga ngathi zinobugcisa kakhulu, kodwa zinefuthe ngqo ekukhu leni koqoqosho lwethu kunye namaxabiso esiwahlawulayo singabathengi.

src_text: these statistics may seem technical and obscure, but they have a direct impact on the growth of our economy and on the prices we pay as consumers.
tgt_text: senze ukuba ukuphucula ukusebenza ngendlela kwama zibuko ethu kube yinto ehamba phambili kuoperation vuli ndlela kwaye sigxile ekwakheni itransnet kwakhona, olelinye lamashishini ethu karhulumente axabisekileyo.

src_text: we have made improving the efficiency of our ports a priority of operation vulindlela and have focused on rebuilding transnet, which is one of our valued stateowned enterprises.
tgt_text: abalawuli abatsha betrans net namacandelo okusebenza agxile ngokukodwa ekuguquleni ukusebenza kweli zibuko.

src_text: the new management of transnet and its operating divisions are resolutely focused on turning the performance of the port around.
tgt_text: abalawuli banezicwangciso ezinamabhongo nezenza imi ncili zokwandisa zontlanu iinkalo zeli zibuko.

src_text: the management has ambitious and exciting expansion plans for all five of the port’s precincts.
tgt_text: ezi ziquka ukwenza ijelo lemaydon wharf nzulu nangaku mbi ukuvumela ukuba iinqana we ezinkulu nezalemihla zingene kweli zibuko, ukugcwalisa ibro rho 1 nebrorho 2 ukwenza ukuba izikhongozeli zibe nomthamo owongezelelekileyo nophuhliso lwetheminali entsha yezikhongo zeli kwipoint precinct .

src_text: these include the deepening of the maydon wharf channel to allow larger, modern vessels to enter the port, the infill of pier 1 and pier 2 to create additional capacity for con tainers and the development of a new container terminal in the point precinct.
tgt_text: xa zizonke, ukwandiswa kwamaseko kweli zibuko kuza kufuna iibhiliyoni ezilir100 ezilutyalomali olutsha kweli shumi leminyaka lizayo nanga phezulu.

src_text: altogether, the expansion of infrastructure at the port will require r100 billion in new investment over the next decade and more.
tgt_text: oku kuza kulitshi ntsha kwaphela eli zibuko, landise umthamo walo wokusinga tha izikhongozeli ukusuka kwi2.9 yezigidi zeeyunithi ukuya kwizigidi zeeyunithi ezi ngaphaya kwe11.

src_text: this will completely transform the port, expanding its capacity for container handling from 2.9 million units to more than 11 million units.
tgt_text: ezi zicwangciso zinamabho ngo ziza kudinga ukuba icandelo labucala lithabathe inxaxheba kwaye lityale imali nangakumbi.

src_text: these ambitious plans will require greater private sector participation and investment.
tgt_text: itransnet, kuquka izibuko la sethekwini, yinto ebalulekileyo yesizwe eyeyabantu bomzantsi afrika.

src_text: transnet, including the durban port, is an important national asset belonging to the people of south africa.
tgt_text: ukusebenzisana necandelo la bucala kubalulekile ukuzisa utya lomali olutsha, ubuchwepheshe nolwazi kwindlela zokusebenza zezibuko nokwenza izixhobo na maseko zibe zezale mihla.

src_text: partnerships with the private sector are crucial to bring new investment, technology and expertise to port operations and to modernise equipment and infrastructure.
tgt_text: itransnet izimisele, umzekelo, ukupapasha isivumo ebudeni bonyaka sokwakha nokuqhuba itheminali entsha yezibuko.

src_text: transnet is planning, for example, to advertise a concession later this year to build and operate the new point terminal.
tgt_text: oku kuza kuzisa utyalomali lwabu cala ze kuphucule ukusebenza ngendlela kokuphathwa kwe zikhongozeli.

src_text: this will bring in private investment and improve the efficiency of container handling.
tgt_text: ngenkqubo yethu yokuhlaziya sikuphucula kancinci kancinci ukusebenza ngendlela kwama zibuko ethu neendlela zethu zoololiwe kwaye sivula inku ntyula yotyalomali kumaseko.

src_text: through our reform process we are steadily improving the efficiency of our ports and railways and unlocking massive investment in infrastructure.
tgt_text: oku akuzukwanela nje ukwe hlisa iindleko ze kuphucule umga ngatho wezinto esizithumela kwamanye amazwe, kodwa kuza kudala amawaka emisebenzi emitsha.

src_text: this will not only lower costs and improve the competitiveness of our exports, but will create thousands of new jobs in the process.
tgt_text: nokuphucula indlela yokuse benza nohlaziyo lolwakhiwo, izi buko lasethekwini liza kuphinda lithathe indawo yalo njenge lona zibuko lisebenza kakuhle eafrika.

src_text: through both operational improvements and structural reforms, durban port will reclaim its place as the bestperforming port in africa.
tgt_text: njengenxalenye yesicwangci so sethu sokwakha ngokutsha nokuvuselela koqoqosho, siza kuqhubeka nokusebenza singa dinwa ukwandisa utyalomali kumaseko nokuguqula ama shishini ethu eenethiwekhi.

src_text: as part of our reconstruction and recove ry plan, we will continue to work tirelessly to expand infrastructure investment and transform our network industries.
tgt_text: ukuba kukho into enye eshi ywe lutyelelo lwam ethekwini engqondweni yam, kukuba singa bemi bomzantsi afrika sinakho ukuphumelela kwiiprojekthi ezi baluleke nezinkulu kakhulu.

src_text: if my visit to durban left one thing in my mind, it is that we south africans are capable of succeeding in projects of vast importance and scale.
tgt_text: amabhongo ethu kumelwe ukuba ahambelane nobungaka nani bemicelimingeni yethu.

src_text: our ambitions should match the size of our challenges.

src_text: this unhappy anniversary took place in the same month that we celebrated the 25th anniversary of the adoption by the constitutional assembly of our new democratic constitution, which became the birth certificate of a real united nation.
tgt_text: esi sikhumbuzo singonwa bisiyo senzeka ngenyanga enye esasibhiyozela ngayo isikhumbuzo seminyaka engama25 sokwamkelwa sisigqeba somgaqosiseko omtsha wentando yesininzi, nesaba sisiqinisekiso soku zalwa sesizwe esimanyene ngokwenene.

src_text: now we have one law for one nation.
tgt_text: ngoku sinomthetho omnye wesizwe esinye.

src_text: together, we have chosen for ourselves a system of government that gives true meaning to the concept of a republic.
tgt_text: sisonke, sizikhethele inkqu bo yoburhulumente enike zela ngentsingiselo yokwe nyani kwingqiqo yeripha bliki.

src_text: we have said that in our democratic republic, everyone is equal before the law and has the right to equal protection and benefit of the law.
tgt_text: sithe kwiriphabliki yethu yentando yesininzi, wonke umntu uyalingana phambi komthetho kwaye unelunge lo lokhuseleko kunye no kuxhamla ngokulinganayo emthethweni.

src_text: south africa today is a country where the administration of justice is vested in independent courts and a judiciary that is subject only to the constitution.
tgt_text: umzantsi afrika namhlanje lilizwe apho ulawulo lwezo bulungisa lusezandleni zee nkundla ezizimeleyo kwaye icandelo leenkundla lixho mekeke kumgaqosiseko kuphela.

src_text: we live in a country where everyone has the right to approach the courts for the fulfilment of their rights.
tgt_text: siphila kwilizwe apho wonke umntu anelu ngelo lokuya ezinkundleni zamatyala ukuze kuzalise kiswe amalungelo akhe.

src_text: we live in a country where communities can stake a legal claim on land they were forcefully moved from, and where individuals or families are protected against arbitrary eviction from their homes.
tgt_text: siphila kwilizwe apho uluntu lunokufaka ibango elisemthethweni kumhlaba abasuswe ngenkani kuwo, nalapho abantu okanye iintsapho zikhuselwe eku khutshweni ngogonyamelo kumakhaya abo.

src_text: we live in a country where everyone is permitted to freely practise their culture and traditions.
tgt_text: siphila kwilizwe apho wo nke umntu evunyelwe ukuba enze ngokukhululekileyo inkcubeko kunye nezithethe zakhe.

src_text: it is a country where anyone can freely protest in support of social, political and other causes anywhere.
tgt_text: lilizwe apho nabani na anokuqhankqalaza ngo kukhululekileyo ekuxhaseni ezentlalo, ezopolitiko kunye nezinye izizathu naphina.

src_text: our constitutional dispensation is premised on accountable government, where the executive is answerable to the people and where parliament is representative of the people.
tgt_text: ixesha lethu lomgaqosiseko libhekiselele kurhulumente othathela kuye uxanduva, apho ibhunga labaphathiswa liphendula ebantwini nala pho ipalamente imele abantu.

src_text: it is a country where the law applies equally to any citizen.
tgt_text: lilizwe apho umthetho usebenza ngokulinganayo nakomphi na ummi.

src_text: we now have a government of the people, for the people and by the people.
tgt_text: ngoku sinorhulumente wabantu, owenzelwe abantu, nowenzi we ngabantu.

src_text: when the apartheid regime triumphantly paraded its racist constitution to the world 60 years ago, it had misplaced confidence that it would endure.
tgt_text: xa urhulumente wobandlu lulo equlunqa ngempu melelo umgaqosiseko wakhe wobuhlanga kwihla bathi kwiminyaka engama60 eyadlulayo, wabanethemba elikwindawo engeyiyo awa yenokuhlangabezana nalo.

src_text: in an unanswered letter to verwoerd a month before the republic was declared, nelson mandela affirmed the liberation movement’s rejection of the forcibly imposed white republic.
tgt_text: kwincwadi engaphendu lwanga eya kuverwoerd kwinyanga engaphambi kokubhengezwa kweripha bliki, unelson mandela waqinisekisa ukuba umbutho wenkululeko uzokukwala ukunyanzelwa kweriphabliki yabantu abamhlophe.

src_text: he said that no constitution or form of government decided without the participation of the african people would enjoy moral validity.
tgt_text: uthe awukho umgaqosiseko okanye uhlobo luka rhulumente ogqitywe nga phandle kokuthatha inxa xheba kwabantu baseafrika abanokonwabela ukupha thwa ngokufanelekileyo.

src_text: indeed no system that entrenches the systematic denial of people’s rights can be sustained.
tgt_text: ngokwenene ayikho inkqu bo eyomeleza ukwaliwa ngo kulandelelanayo kwamalu ngelo abantu anokugcinwa.

src_text: though it would be over three decades before the demands of the liberation movement were met, we eventually won our freedom.
tgt_text: nangona bekunokuba ngaphezulu kweminyaka engamashumi amathathu ngaphambi kokuhlangabe zana neemfuno zombutho wenkululeko, ekugqibe leni sayifumana inkululeko yethu.

src_text: in relegating the apartheid constitution to the dustbin of history, we committed ourselves to a new constitution and a new set of values.
tgt_text: ekuphoseni umgaqosiseko wobandlululo kumgqomo wembali, sazibophelela kumgaqosiseko omtsha nakwimilinganiselo emitsha yokuziphatha.

src_text: when i addressed the constitutional assembly 25 years ago, i said our constitution must become more than words on a page; it must become a reality in the lives of our people.
tgt_text: xa ndandithetha nendlu yomgaqosiseko kwiminya ka engama25 eyadlulayo, ndathi umgaqosiseko wethu mawube ngaphezulu kwamagama asephepheni; kufanele ukuba ube yinyani kubomi babantu bethu.

src_text: unless we do so, this progressive and revolutionary document will be rendered irrelevant and meaningless.
tgt_text: ngaphandle kokuba senze njalo, olu xwebhu lunenkqubelaphambili no luguqulayo luzakuthathwa njenge lingenamsebenzi nelingenantsingiselo.

src_text: we have long decided what kind of society we want to be.
tgt_text: sagqiba kudala ukuba sifuna ukuba luluntu olu njani.

src_text: it is a society rooted in human dignity, equality, freedom and nondiscrimination.
tgt_text: luluntu olumiliselwe kwisidima somntu, uku lingana, inkululeko kunye nokungabandlululi.

src_text: for a quarter of a century we have worked to build such a society.
tgt_text: kangangekota yeminyaka eyikhulu sisebenzele ukwa kha uluntu olunjalo.

src_text: we have made undeniable progress, but we still have many challenges and there is much work still to be done.
tgt_text: senze inkqubela engenakuphikwa, kodwa sisenemicelimngeni emininzi kwaye usemninzi umsebenzi ekusafuneka wenziwe.

src_text: as we mark the anniversary of the adoption of our democratic constitution, let us remember what a decisive break it was with the system underpinned by racism, exploitation, dispossession and oppression that had come before.
tgt_text: njengokuba sibhiyozela isikhumbuzo sokwamkelwa komgaqosiseko wethu wentando yesininzi, ma sikhumbule ukuba laliyi ntoni ikhefu eliqinisekileyo lenkqubo eyayixhaswa bu buhlanga, ukuxhatshazwa, ukuhluthwa kunye nengci nezelo eyayikhona nga phambili.

src_text: let us also remember that it is up to us to make the vision contained in our constitution a reality.
tgt_text: masikhumbule kananja lo ukuba kuxhomekeke kuthi ukwenza umbono oqulathwe kumgaqosiseko wethu ukuba ubeyinyani.

src_text: for it is only by ensuring that all south africans are able to freely and fully exercise their constitutional rights, that we will truly become a united people.
tgt_text: iinzame zomzantsi afrika zokufezekisa umbono womgaqosiseko vukuzenzele unnamed kwiminyaka enga ma60 eyadlulayo, ngomhla wama31 kucanzibe 1961, umzantsi afrika wobandlululo waba yiriphabliki, waphelisa ubudlelwane bawo kunye nobubukhosi basebritane.

src_text: the youth are our greatest asset vukuzenzele unnamed on june 16th 1976, the youth of soweto and other parts of the country rose up against the iniquity of bantu education.
tgt_text: abantu abatsha basesona siphiwo sethu sixabisekileyo vukuzenzele unnamed nge16 kweyesi limela 1976, ulu tsha lwasesowe to kunye nelakwezinye iindawo apha esizweni laphakama ngokuchasene nobugwenxa bemfundo yebantu education.

src_text: on that day and in the days that followed, many lost their lives.
tgt_text: ngolo suku nangeentsu ku ezalandelayo, abantu aba ninzi baphulukana nobomi babo.

src_text: they were killed by a callous regime that had little regard for black lives and thought nothing of opening fire on unarmed, uniformed schoolchildren.
tgt_text: babulawa ngurhulu mente ongenalusini owaye ngabukhathalelanga kwa phela ubomi babantu aba ntsundu, kwaye ongacingi nto ngokuthulula iimbhu bhulu kubantwana besikolo abangaxhobanga, benxibe iyunifomu.

src_text: these events hardened international opinion against the apartheid regime and gave further impetus to the liberation struggle.
tgt_text: ezi ziganeko zaluqinisa kakhulu uluvo lwamazwe aphesheya ngokuchasene nolawulo localucalulo, lwaze lanika amandla ngakumbi kumzabalazo wenkululeko.

src_text: young people have always been at the forefront of social protest, from the antiauthoritarian protests in latin america in the late 1950s, to the protests across africa in the late 1960s.
tgt_text: abantu abancinci bahla la behleli phambili kuqha nkqalazo lwentlalo, uku susela kuqhankqalazo lwe minyaka yoo1950 olwalu chasene nolawulo elatin america, ukuya kuthi ga kuqhankqalazo olwenzeka kwiafrika iphela kwimi nyaka yoo1960.

src_text: history faithfully records the contribution of the generation of 1976 to the international student movement and its stance against oppression and injustice.
tgt_text: imbali irekhoda ngoku thembekileyo igalelo lesi zukulwana sika1976 lo mbutho wabafundi wama zwe aphesheya kunye no kuma kwawo ngokuchasene nengcinezelo kunye nesenzo sentswelobulungisa.

src_text: this historic event 45 years ago continues to be commemorated across africa and the world.
tgt_text: esi siganeko seminyaka engama45 esadlulayo sisaqhubeka ukukhunjulwa eafrika nakwihlabathi liphela.

src_text: it is therefore disturbing that knowledge of june 16th is diminishing among young south africans.
tgt_text: kuyaphazamisa ke ukuba ulwazi lwe16 kweyesi limela luyancipha kulu tsha lwasemzantsi afrika.

src_text: this is particularly so among the socalled generation z, or young people born between 1997 and 2015. the 2019/2020 south african social attitudes survey published by the human sciences research council found that close to 40% of generation z has not heard of the historical events of june 16th.
tgt_text: ngakumbi kwisizukulwana esibizwa ngokuba yigenera tion z, okanye abo bantu ba tsha bazalwe phakathi ko mnyaka ka1997 noka2015.

src_text: a similar percentage has heard about it but knows very little or nothing about it.
tgt_text: uphando luka2019/2020 lomzantsi afrika lwezimo zoluntu olupapashwe li bhunga lophando lweenzu lulwazi zabantu lufumanise ukuba phantse ama40% egeneration z zange eva ngeziganeko zembali yomhla we16 kweyesilimela.

src_text: nevertheless, the survey also found that young people of this generation are open to learning about key historical events and believe in their continued importance.
tgt_text: ipe senti efana naleyo yona ikhe yeva malunga nezo ziganeko kodwa yazi kancinci kakhulu okanye ayazi nto ngayo.

src_text: we need to do more as a country to ensure that the message of 1976 is transmitted faithfully.
tgt_text: nangona kunjalo, uvava nyo lufumanise ukuba abantu abatsha kwesi sizukulwana banomdla ukuba bangafunda ngeziganeko ziphambili zembali kwaye bakholelwa ekuqhubekeni kokubaluleka kwazo.

src_text: this is a collective responsibility of government, schools, tertiary institutions, parents, families, musicians, artists, and all of society.
tgt_text: kufuneka senze okunga phezulu njengelizwe uku qinisekisa ukuba umyale zo ka1976 ugqithiswa ngo kwenyaniso.

src_text: the generation that was born after apartheid ended inherited a country with a democratic constitution and where fundamental freedoms are protected.
tgt_text: olu luxanduva lwabantu bonke kuqukwa urhulumente, izikolo, amaziko emfundo ephakamileyo, abazali, iintsapho, iimvumi, amagcisa, kunye noluntu lonke.

src_text: the opportunities young black people have today are both vastly different and greatly improved.
tgt_text: isizukulwana esazalwa emva kokuphela kocalucalulo sazuza njengelifa isizwe esinomgaqosiseko wentando yesininzi nalapho inkululeko ikhuselweyo.

src_text: keeping the story of june 16th alive is a reminder to today’s generation of the great sacrifices made to secure their freedom.
tgt_text: amathuba abantu aba ntsundu abanawo namhlanje ohluke kakhulu kwaye aphucuke ngeyona ndlela.

src_text: youth day is a reminder of the immense power and agency that young people have to create a better future for themselves.
tgt_text: ukugcina ibali ye16 kwe yesilimela iphila sisikhu mbuzo kwisizukulwana sa namhlanje sokuzincama okukhulu okwenziwa ukukhusela inkululeko yabo.

src_text: the struggles of young people in south africa today are many.
tgt_text: usuku lolutsha sisikhu mbuzo samandla amakhulu kunye nokungxamiseka kokuba abantu abatsha kufuneka bazenzele ikamva eliqaqambileyo.

src_text: young people have remained at the forefront of activism, whether in pursuit of free education or against social ills like genderbased violence.
tgt_text: kule mihla abantu abatsha emzantsi afrika bajongene nemizabalazo emininzi.

src_text: today the greatest struggle young people wage is against unemployment, which has worsened under the covid19 pandemic.
tgt_text: abantu abatsha ngabona baphambili ekufakeni isa ndla ingakumbi kwizinto zepolitiki, nokuba zizinto ezifana nokufuna imfu ndo yasimahla okanye ngo kuchasene nemikhwa emibi enje ngobundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini.

src_text: creating more opportunities for young people, and access to these opportunities, is government’s foremost priority.
tgt_text: namhlanje owona mzabalazo mkhulu oqhutywa lulutsha kukuchasana nentswelangqesho, ethe yanda ngakumbi phantsi kobhubhane wecovid19.

src_text: everything that we do as a government contributes towards improving the lives of young people.
tgt_text: eyona nto iphambili kurhulumente kukudalela abantu abatsha amathuba amaninzi kunye neendlela zokufikelela kuloo mathuba.

src_text: tackling youth unemployment requires accelerating economic growth, particularly in labourintensive sectors, and building the capability of the state to fulfil its developmental role.
tgt_text: yonke into esiyenzayo njengorhulumente inegalelo ekuphuculeni ubomi babantu abatsha.

src_text: we are also driving this agenda through targeted interventions.
tgt_text: ukulwisana nentswelangqesho kulutsha kufuna ukukhula koqoqosho okukhawulezileyo, ingakumbi kumacandelo afuna abasebenzi abaninzi, kunye nokwakha amandla kurhulumente ukuze afezekise indima yakhe yophuhliso.

src_text: these include the presidential employment stimulus, which has provided work opportunities and livelihoods support for many young people.
tgt_text: sikwaluqhuba olu luhlu lwezinto ezifuna ukwenziwa ngokuthi sibe nongenelelo esijolise kulo.

src_text: we have launched a range of additional measures to create opportunities, enhance skills development, support young entrepreneurs and enable the full participation of young people in the economy.
tgt_text: olu ngenelelo lubandakanya imvuselelo yengqesho kamongameli, esele ibonelele ngamathuba emisebenzi kunye nenkxaso yokuphila kubantu abatsha abaninzi.

src_text: this includes the establishment of a national pathway management network, sa youth, to make it easier for young people to view and access opportunities and receive active support to find pathways into the labour market.
tgt_text: sisungule uluhlu lwama nyathelo ongezelelweyo uku dala amathuba, ukukhulisa uphuhliso lwezakhono, ukuxhasa oosomashishini aba tsha kunye nokwenza ukuba ulutsha luthathe inxaxheba ngokupheleleyo kurhwebo lwezabasebenzi.

src_text: these are among the priorities of the presidential youth employment intervention, which was launched just weeks before we entered a national lockdown last year and which is now entering full implementation.
tgt_text: oku kubandakanya ukusekwa kwenational pa thway management ne twork, yolutsha lomzantsi afrika, ukwenzela kube lula kubantu abatsha ukuba babone kwaye bafumane amathuba nenkxaso esebe nzayo yokufumana iindlela zokungena kurhwebo lwezabasebenzi.

src_text: the presidential youth employment intervention was built on the understanding that addressing the youth unemployment crisis requires innovative thinking and strong partnerships across society.
tgt_text: ezi zezinye zezinto ezi phambili kumanyathelo okungenelela kwingqesho yolutsha kukamongameli, eyaqaliswa kwiiveki nje ezimbalwa phambi kokuba singene kuvaleleko lwesizwe kulo nyaka uphelileyo nozakuthi ngoku uzalisekiswe.

src_text: its ultimate objective is to find models that work, whether in skills development or active labour market policies, and to scale these rapidly to reach as many young people as possible.
tgt_text: amanyathelo okungene lela kwingqesho yolutsha kukamongameli asekwe phezu kwengqiqo yokuba ukusombulula ingxaki yentswelangqesho kulutsha kufuna ukucinga okutsha kunye nentsebenziswano eqinileyo kuluntu lonke.

src_text: most importantly, it recognises that young people must be at the centre of any effort to boost youth employment.
tgt_text: eyona njongo yayo ipha mbili kukufumana izinto ezi sebenzayo, nokuba kuphu hliso lwezakhono okanye kwi migaqonkqubo yorhwebo labasebenzi, kwaye kunyu swe oku ngokukhawulezi leyo ukuze kufikelele ku lutsha oluninzi kangangoko kunakho.

src_text: young people are our greatest asset, and our greatest weapon in this fight.
tgt_text: okona kubaluleke kakhulu, kukuyiqonda into yokuba abantu abatsha kufuneka babe sembindini wawo nawuphi na umzamo wokunyusa ingqesho yolutsha.

src_text: we salute the resilience of every young person playing their part to build and develop this country.
tgt_text: abantu abatsha basesona siphiwo sethu sixabisekileyo, kwaye basesona sixhobo sethu sikhulu kulo mlo.

src_text: they are the young people volunteering in our communities, building our country through the presidential employment stimulus, running their own businesses and studying to better themselves.
tgt_text: sothulela umnqwazi wonke umntu osemtsha odlala indima yakhe ekwakheni nasekuphuhliseni eli lizwe.

src_text: they are the young people who are forging their own path and bringing their families along with them.
tgt_text: ngabantu abatsha abavolontiya kwiindawo esihlala kuzo, besakha ilizwe lethu ngemvuselelo yengqesho kamongameli, beqhuba amashishini abo kwaye befundela nokuziphucula.

src_text: we salute young people who keep working to improve their lives.
tgt_text: ngabantu abatsha abazenzela eyabo indlela kwaye bathwale neentsapho zabo.

src_text: young people are doing their part; they need government, and indeed all of society, to do ours.
tgt_text: sibothulela umnqwazi abantu abatsha abaqhubeka nokusebenza ukuphucula ubomi babo.

src_text: our country is going through the most difficult of times, but we are working daily to expand the frontiers of hope.
tgt_text: abantu abatsha abenza eyabo indima; badinga inkxaso kurhulumente kunye noluntu luphela.

src_text: we are seeing the green shoots of growth in our economy, and are confident this will translate to better opportunities for all.
tgt_text: ilizwe lethu liphantsi kwelona xesha linzima, kodwa sisebenza mihla le ukwandisa ithemba.

src_text: our task now is to ensure that young people are ready and able to access these opportunities, and to create their own.
tgt_text: abantu abatsha basesona siphiwo sethu sixabisekileyo vukuzenzele unnamed nge16 kweyesi limela 1976, ulu tsha lwasesowe to kunye nelakwezinye iindawo apha esizweni laphakama ngokuchasene nobugwenxa bemfundo yebantu education.

src_text: soes must drive economic growth and transformation vukuzenzele unnamed for some years now, south africa’s stateowned enterprises (soes) have mostly been associated in the public eye with state capture, financial mismanagement and inefficiency.
tgt_text: iisoe kufuneka ziqhube ukukhula koqoqosho kunye nenguqu vukuzenzele unnamed sele kuyiminyaka ngoku, amashishi ni aphantsi korhu lumente omzantsi afrika (iisoe) enxulunyaniswa kakhulu namehlo abantu kunye nokubanjwa ngobho ngwana kukarhulumente, ukusetyenziswa gwenxa kwezimali nokungaqhubi kakuhle.

src_text: in addition to needing regular bailouts from government, some of the country’s biggest and most important stateowned companies have been struggling to meet their mandates.
tgt_text: ukongeza ekufuneni ukukhululwa rhoqo ngurhulumente, ezinye zeenkampani ezinkulu nokubalulekileyo eziphantsi kukarhulumente bezisokola ukufikelela kwizigunyaziso zazo.

src_text: these soes should be at the forefront of economic and social transformation.
tgt_text: ezi soe kufuneka zibe phambili kutshintsho lwezoqoqosho nezentlalo.

src_text: they are responsible for providing the infrastructure and the services on which the economy depends, whether it be in the generation of electricity, commuter transport, water provision, freight logistics or telecommunications.
tgt_text: zinoxanduva lokubonelela ngeziseko zoncedo kunye neenkonzo uqoqosho oluxhomekeke kuzo, nokuba kukwenziwa kombane, uthutho lwabakhweli, ubonelelo ngamanzi, ukuthuthwa kwempahla okanye unxibelelwano ngomnxeba.

src_text: our approach to state ownership is informed by the need for the effective functioning of key network industries, such as energy and ports, and by the need to ensure that the basic needs of all south africans, particularly the poor, can be met.
tgt_text: indlela yethu yokufumana ubunini bukarhulumente ixhotyiswe yimfuno yokusebenza kwamashishini aphambili othungelwano, afana nawamandla kunye namazibuko, kunye nesidingo sokuqinisekisa ukuba iimfuno ezisisiseko zabo bonke abemi bomzantsi afrika, ngakumbi abahluphekileyo, ziyafezekiswa.

src_text: we firmly believe that public ownership is necessary in critical sectors of the economy and that the country needs robust soes that are able to drive economic growth and transformation.
tgt_text: sikholelwa ngokungagungqiyo ukuba ubunini boluntu buyimfuneko kumacandelo abaluleke kakhulu kuqoqosho kwaye ilizwe lifuna iisoe ezomeleleyo ezikwaziyo ukuqhuba ukukhula kwezoqoqosho kunye neenguqu.

src_text: this is particularly the case in the delivery of public goods such as electricity and water, where soes are able to pursue a developmental mandate in the public interest as opposed to a purely commercial one.
tgt_text: oku kunjalo ikakhulu ekuhanjisweni kweenkonzo zoluntu ezifana nombane namanzi, apho iisoe zikwazi ukulandela igunya lophuhliso ngokomdla woluntu ngokuchaseneyo nentengiso esulungekileyo.

src_text: that is why we have made it a priority of this government to turn these companies around to root out corruption, improve their governance and enable them to play the role they should in driving economic growth and employment creation.
tgt_text: kungenxa yoko le nto sibeke phambili kulo rhulumente ukuba ajike ezi nkampani ukuze zisiphule neengcambu urhwaphilizo, ziphucule ulawulo lwazo kwaye zibenako ukudlala indima ekuqhubeni ukukhula koqoqosho kunye nokudala imisebenzi.

src_text: to this end, we have embarked upon a number of reforms to strengthen these soes so that they can produce the results that the country needs and expects.
tgt_text: ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, sithathe iinguqu ezininzi ukomeleza ezi soe ukuze zikwazi ukuvelisa iziphumo ilizwe elizifunayo nokulindelekileyo.

src_text: one of the most important reforms is in the energy sector.
tgt_text: olunye uhlaziyo olubalulekileyo kakhulu lukwicandelo lezamandla.

src_text: we have begun the process of restructuring eskom into three different soes, responsible for generation, transmission and distribution, respectively.
tgt_text: siqalisile ngenkqubo yokwakha ngokutsha ueskom abe ziisoe ezintathu, ezijongene nokuveliswa, ukuhanjiswa nokusasazwa ngokulandelelana kwazo.

src_text: this is because the previous structure of eskom was illsuited for a changing energy landscape.
tgt_text: kungenxa yokuba ulwakhiwo lwangaphambili lukaeskom lwalungakulungelanga ukutshintsha imbonakalo yamandla.

src_text: it had become inefficient and costly and was not sufficiently transparent.
tgt_text: lungasebenzi kakuhle, lubiza kakhulu kwaye lungabonakali ngokucacileyo.

src_text: the establishment of a transmission entity in particular will mean that eskom will be able to purchase power from a broader range of providers, both private and public.
tgt_text: ukusekwa kwecandelo lokuhanjiswa kombane kuya kuthetha ukuba ueskom uza kuba nakho ukuthenga amandla kuluhlu olubanzi lwababoneleli, abucala nakarhulumente.

src_text: this will improve transparency, increase competitiveness and promote the purchase of lowestcost electricity.
tgt_text: oku kuza kuphucula ukungafihli, kunyuse ukhuphiswano kukhuthaze ukuthengwa kombane onexabiso eliphantsi.

src_text: through the renewable energy independent power producers programme, there has been significant private investment in energy generation.
tgt_text: ngenkqubo yabavelisi abazimeleyo bamandla avuselelekayo, kubekho utyalomali lwabucala olubalulekileyo ekuvelisweni kwamandla.

src_text: with the proposal to raise the licencing exemption for embedded generation – where companies produce electricity for themselves and other commercial users – from 1mw to 100mw, we can expect even more private investment.
tgt_text: ngesindululo sokunyusa ukukhutshwa kwamaphephamvume kwiinkampani ezixhomekekileyo ngemveliso apho iinkampani zizivelisela umbane ngokwazo kunye nabanye abasebenzisi borhwebo ukusuka kwi1mw ukuya kwi100mw, sinokulindela utyalomali lwabucala ngakumbi.

src_text: this is vital at a time when the country is suffering from severe and sustained electricity shortages and where neither eskom nor the state is able to invest in new generation capacity.
tgt_text: oku kubalulekile ngexesha apho ilizwe lithwaxwa kukunqongophala okukhulu kombane ozinzileyo nalapho ueskom norhulumente bengenakho ukutyala imali kumthamo omtsha wokuvelisa.

src_text: importantly, these reforms will give eskom the space to address its financial and operational challenges.
tgt_text: okubalulekileyo, olu hlengahlengiso luya kunika ueskom isithuba sokujongana nemiceli mngeni yakhe yezemali kunye nokusebenza.

src_text: another critical reform is the establishment of the national ports authority as an independent subsidiary of transnet.
tgt_text: olunye uhlengahlengiso olubalulekileyo kukusekwa kwegunya lezibuko lesizwe njengenkampani ezimeleyo yetransnet.

src_text: this a crucial part of transnet’s broader strategy to revitalise our logistics infrastructure.
tgt_text: eli licandelo elibalulekileyo lesicwangciso esibanzi sikatransnet sokuvuselela iziseko zophuhliso.

src_text: transnet plans to invest r100 billion over the next five years in upgrading its infrastructure across the ports system.
tgt_text: abakwatransnet baceba ukutyala imali ezibhiliyoni zeerandi kule minyaka mihlanu izayo kuphuculo lweziseko zayo kuzo zonke iinkqubo zamazibuko.

src_text: this will make our ports more efficient and our exports more competitive, and benefit the entire economy.
tgt_text: oku kuyakwenza ukuba amazibuko ethu asebenze ngakumbi kwaye ukuthunyelwa kweempahla kwamanye amazwe kukhuphisane ngakumbi, kwaye kuncede uqoqosho luphela.

src_text: for the ordinary consumer, it will mean reduced prices in the long term for many of our goods.
tgt_text: kumthengi oqhelekileyo, oko kuya kuthetha ukwehla kwamaxabiso kwixesha elide kwizinto zethu ezininzi.

src_text: for our exporters, it will mean greater competitiveness in global markets.
tgt_text: kubathumeli mpahla ngaphandle, oko kuya kuthetha ukhuphiswano olukhulu kwiimarike zehlabathi.

src_text: as our exports grow, our economy will expand and create more jobs.
tgt_text: njengokuba imveliso yethu ethunyelwa kumazwe angaphandle ikhula, uqoqosho lwethu luza kwanda luze ludale imisebenzi emininzi.

src_text: more efficient ports will make the entire economy work better – and as port volumes increase, jobs will be created at the ports themselves.
tgt_text: amazibuko asebenza ngokukuko aya kwenza uqoqosho luphela lusebenze ngcono kwaye njengoko amanani asebenzisa izibuko esanda, imisebenzi iyakuvela kumazibuko ngokwawo.

src_text: establishing the national ports authority as a transnet subsidiary with its own board will, among other things, mean that revenues generated by the ports can be used to replace old equipment and upgrade and expand our ports, work which has been delayed for more than a decade.
tgt_text: ukuseka igunya lezibuko lesizwe njengenkxaso yetransnet nebhodi yayo, phakathi kwezinye izinto, kuya kuthetha ukuba inge niso eveliswe ngamazibuko inokusetyenziselwa ukubu yisela izixhobo ezindala ku nye nokuphucula nokwa ndisa amazibuko ethu, u msebenzi othe walibaziseka ngaphezulu kweminyaka elishumi.

src_text: among other things, these reforms will encourage greater private investment in the country’s economic infrastructure.
tgt_text: phakathi kwezinye izinto, ezi nguqu ziya kukhuthaza utyalo mali lwabucala olukhulu kwiziseko zophu hliso zelizwe.

src_text: some people have expressed concerns that this will diminish the importance or reduce the value of soes.
tgt_text: abanye abantu bavakalise inkxalabo yokuba oku kuya kunciphisa ukuba luleka okanye kunciphise ixa biso leesoe.

src_text: in fact, the contrary is true.
tgt_text: enyanisweni, oku kuzakuzikhulisa iisoe.

src_text: these reforms will ensure that while strategic infrastructure remains firmly in state hands, our soes will become more efficient and the industries they support will become more competitive.
tgt_text: olu hlengahlengiso luza kuqinisekisa ukuba ngeli lixa iziseko zophuhliso zihleli zisezandleni zikarhulumente, iisoe zethu ziya kusebenza ngakumbi kwaye nemizi mveliso ezixhasayo iya kukhuphisana ngaku mbi.

src_text: equally, these reforms are important to ensure that soes implement their broader developmental mandates to support all citizens and the economy.
tgt_text: ngokulinganayo, olu hle ngahlengiso lubalulekile uku qinisekisa ukuba iisoe ziphu meza uxanduva lwazo ngoku banzi lophuhliso ukuxhasa bonke abemi noqoqosho.

src_text: our policy remains that soes must play a crucial developmental role in supporting the growth of our economy.
tgt_text: umgaqonkqubo wethu uhlala usithi iisoe kufuneka zidlale indima ebalulekileyo kuphuhliso ekuxhaseni ukukhula koqoqosho lwethu.

src_text: our task is to place them on a sound footing, so that they can serve their ultimate shareholders – the south african people.
tgt_text: iisoe kufuneka ziqhube ukukhula koqoqosho kunye nenguqu vukuzenzele unnamed sele kuyiminyaka ngoku, amashishi ni aphantsi korhu lumente omzantsi afrika (iisoe) enxulunyaniswa kakhulu namehlo abantu kunye nokubanjwa ngobho ngwana kukarhulumente, ukusetyenziswa gwenxa kwezimali nokungaqhubi kakuhle.

src_text: support for businesses and workers vukuzenzele unnamed starting and building a business is a lot like raising a family.
tgt_text: uxhaso lwamashishini kunye nabasebenzi vukuzenzele unnamed ukuqala nokwakha ishishini kufana nokukhulisa umntwana.

src_text: it takes time, patience, con stant support and consistent nurturing from infancy to maturity.
tgt_text: kuthatha ixesha, umonde, inkxaso ethe gqolo kwakunye nokumkhulisa ngononophelo eseliyuku ade abemdala.

src_text: for many business owners, seeing a business that you grew from scratch struggling to survive, or even being forced to close its doors, is heartbreaking.
tgt_text: kosomashishini abaninzi iyophula kakhulu intliziyo into yokubona ishishini lakho owalisusa phantsi lijongene nemicelimngeni yokukhula, okanye xa lijongene nee ngxaki ezinyanzelisa ukuba livale iingcango zalo.

src_text: since the onset of the covid19 pandemic, this has sadly been the situation facing many businesses both large and small, not just in our country but around the world.
tgt_text: kususela oko kwaqala ubhubhane wecovid19, ibeyimeko ebuhlungu ejongene namashi shini amaninzi kuquka amancinane kunye namakhulu, kwaye le meko ingekho buhlungu kweli lizwe lethu qha kodwa kumhlaba wonke jikelele.

src_text: the pandemic and the meas ures we have had to take to contain the spread of the virus have had a detrimental impact on businesses.
