src_text: the government employees pension ombud (gepo) is an internal but independent office of the gepf.
tgt_text: le ofisi ibi zwa ngokuba yigovernment employees pension ombud (igepo) iyiofisi yanga phakathi egepf nangona ko dwa yona izimele ngokwayo.

src_text: the gepf is among the largest pension funds in the world, with over 1.2 million active members and more than 450 000 pensioners and beneficiaries.
tgt_text: igepf ingenye yeengxowamali ezinkulu zomhlala phantsi kwihlabathi, ina malungu angaphezu kwe1.2 esigidi kwakhona inamalu ngu asele esidla umhlalapha ntsi kwakunye nabaxhamli abangaphaya kuma450 000. le ngxowamali yasekwa kwaye ilawulwa ngoko mthetho womhlalaphantsi wabasebenzi bakarhulu mente.

src_text: the fund was founded and is regulated in terms of the government employees pension law.
tgt_text: igqwetha umakhado ramabulana obekwe njengo nozikhalazo (iombud).

src_text: advocate makhado ramabulana has been appointed as the ombud.
tgt_text: uthi le ofisi yasekwa nge njongo yokunceda abantu abangonwabanga ziinkonzo abazifumana kwigepf.

src_text: he says the office was established to assist people who are unhappy with the services of the gepf.
tgt_text: le ofisi izakuba luncedo olukhulu ngakumbi kwabo bantu bangakwaziyo ukuzihlawulela iindleko zo mthetho, kuba kaloku ngoku ngaphambi kokuba abantu bathabathe izikhalazo zabo bazise kwiofisi yomkhuseli woluntu okanye kwiinkundla zamatyala, ngoku bazaku kwazi ukufumana uncedo nongenelelo olusuka kuno zikhalazo.

src_text: it will be especially beneficial to people who cannot afford legal recourse.
tgt_text: unozikhalazo uza kunge nelela kwimiba ekhokelela ekulibazisekeni ngokunga fanelekanga kweentlawulo zabafakimabango.

src_text: before people take their disputes to the office of the public protector or to the courts, they can seek mediation from the ombud.
tgt_text: kodwa ke angalamla izikhalazo ezi vele kule minyaka mithathu igqithileyo kuphela.

src_text: the ombud will intervene in matters that lead to unreasonable delays in the processing of payments due to claimants.
tgt_text: eminye imiba ejongwe ngaphakathi kwegepo iba ndakanya: ukusilela kwamagosa u kwenza imisebenzi yawo ngokomthetho nemigaqo yengxowamali; ukwaphula isibophelelo ngaphandle kwesizathu esibambekayo; kwakunye nolwazi olungachaneka nga okanye olulahleki sayo olusuka kubasebenzi begepf.

src_text: it may only mediate in complaints that have arisen within the past three years.
tgt_text: phambi kokufaka isikhalazo kwigepo, umntu kufu neka athumele isikhalazo esibhaliweyo kwigepf, mhlawumbi kwiarhente yolawulo lomhlalaphantsi karhulumente (igpaa) okanye kumqeshi wakhe, aze abanike ithuba loku silungisa isikhalazo eso.

src_text: other issues within the gepo’s scope include: the failure of officials to perform their duties in terms of the fund’s law and rules; breaking a commitment without a justifiable reason; and incorrect or misleading information provided by the gepf employees.
tgt_text: uramabulana ucacise wathi, "kufuneka ubanike ithuba elingangee ntsuku ezingama30 ukuba balungise imiba oyikhalazelayo.

src_text: before lodging a complaint with the gepo, a person must send a written complaint to either the gepf, the government pensions administration agency (gpaa) or their employer, and give them a chance to settle the matter.
tgt_text: ukuba ngaba, emva kweentsuku ezingama30, imiba yakho ayikasonjululwa, ungasifaka ke isikhalazo kunozikha lazo".

src_text: "you must allow them 30 days to correct the issues that you identified.
tgt_text: unozikhalazo akazula mkela ityala ukuba sele kukho uphando olusemthethweni oluqhutywayo kwenye indawo.

src_text: if, after 30 days, your issues remain unresolved, you can submit a complaint to the ombud," explains ramabulana.
tgt_text: "kwiiveki ezimbini uku suka kumhla wokufunyanwa kwesikhalazo, igepo iza kuthathela ingqalelo [ityala] kwaye yazise ummangali ukuba izakukwazi na uku phanda ithathe isigqibo ngomba lowo.

src_text: the ombud cannot accept a case if there is already an official investigation underway elsewhere.
tgt_text: ukufaka izikhalazo zegepf kwenziwe kwalula vukuzenzele unnamed amalungu, abo aba dla umhlalapha ntsi kwakunye na baxhamli bengxowamali yomhlalaphantsi wabase benzi bakarhulumente (igepf) ngoku banga kwazi ukufuna uncedo xa bengonwabanga nge nkonzo noncedo abalu fumana kwigepf.

src_text: asidi fast tracks school infrastructure more matshediso nkululeko ralo primary school is a good example of how positive results can be achieved when communities and government work together.
tgt_text: iasidi ikhawulezisa inkqubela yeziseko zophuhliso lwezikolo more matshediso isikolo samabanga aphantsi inkululeko ralo primary school singumzekelo omhle we ndlela iziphumo ezintle ezinokufumaneka xa uluntu kunye norhulume nte besebenzisana.

src_text: the school, based in mthatha in the eastern cape, first started operating in a garage at the home of community member nkululeko ralo, who it is named after.
tgt_text: esi sikolo, sizinze emthatha empuma koloni, siqale ukusebenza kwigaraji yekhaya lelungu lasekuhlaleni unkululeko ralo, esithiywe ngaye.

src_text: over the years, the school moved a number of times as it expanded.
tgt_text: ekuhambeni kweminyaka, esi sikolo safuduka amatyeli amaninzi njengoko sasisanda.

src_text: however, learners and teachers never had the benefit of proper facilities until recently, when they walked through the doors of their new, stateoftheart school.
tgt_text: nangona kunjalo, abafundi kunye nootitshala abazange baxhamle kwizibonelelo ezifanelekileyo kude kube ngoku, xa bengene kwimi nyango yesikolo sabo esitsha, sodidi oluphezulu.

src_text: the school was completed as part of the accelerated schools infrastructure delivery initiative (asidi), which was launched by the department of basic education in 2011. the initiative aims to replace schools that compromise the safety of learners and staff, due to a lack of proper infrastructure, water, sanitation and electricity.
tgt_text: esi sikolo sagqitywa njengenxalenye yephulo elikhawulezayo lokunikezelwa kweziseko zophuhliso lwezikolo (iasidi), elasungulwa lisebe lemfundo esisiseko ngowama2011.

src_text: to date, asidi has built 266 schools, provided 886 schools with sanitation, 1 030 with water and 372 with electricity.
tgt_text: eli phulo lijolise ekuthatheni indawo yezikolo ezibeka esichengeni ukhuseleko lwabafundi kunye nabasebenzi, ngenxa yokunqongophala kweziseko zophuhliso ezifanelekileyo, amanzi, ucoceko kunye nombane.

src_text: the learners of nkululeko ralo primary school now have proper classrooms and access to a resource centre, science laboratory, multipur pose and a nutrition centre.
tgt_text: ukuza kufikelela ngoku, iasidi iye yakha izikolo ezingama266, yabone lela ngococeko kwizikolo ezingama886, yabonelela ngamanzi kwizikolo ezili 1 030 kunye nombane kwizikolo ezingama372.

src_text: a shared vision principal koleka gilman is passionate about improving education in mthatha.
tgt_text: abafundi besikolo samabanga aphantsi inkululeko ralo primary school ngoku banamagumbi okufundela afanelekileyo kunye nofikelelo kwiziko loncedo, ilebhoratri yezenzululwazi, iziko leenkonzo ezininzi kunye nezondlo.

src_text: her dream to start a school for her community began in 1988, and the following year, she began sharing her vision with the community.
tgt_text: umbono akwabelwana ngawo.

src_text: "our community was highly populated with a lot of children of schoolgoing age who had nowhere to go for education.
tgt_text: inqununu ukoleka gilman unemvakalelo enama ndla yokuphucula imfundo emthatha.

src_text: my vision was welcomed by community member nkululeko ralo, who offered his home garage to be used as a school," says gilman.
tgt_text: iphupha lakhe lokuqala isikolo soluntu lwakhe laqala ngowe1988, kwaye kunyaka olandelayo, waqalisa ukwabelana noluntu ngombono wakhe.

src_text: she adds that ralo went on to organise a container from telkom and it was used as an additional classroom.
tgt_text: "uluntu lwethu belugcwaliswe kakhulu ngabantwana abaninzi abakwiminyaka yokuhamba isikolo nabangenayo indawo yokufunda.

src_text: ralo also arranged with two members in his community to offer their garages as additional classrooms.
tgt_text: umbono wam wamkelwa lilungu lasekuhlaleni unkululeko ralo, owanikezela ngegaraji yasekhaya ukuba isetyenziswe njengesikolo," utsho ugilman.

src_text: ralo sadly passed away in 2004. in 1994, the school moved to the eli spilkin hall, which was built by local businessman eli spilkin.
tgt_text: wongeza ngelithi uralo uye walungisa ikhonteyina yakwatelkom kwaye yasetyenziswa njengegumbi lokufundela elongezelelweyo.

src_text: "in the same year, we received mobile toilets from the provincial department of education.
tgt_text: uralo naye wenze amalungiselelo namalungu amabini asekuhlaleni ukuba anikele ngeegaraji zawo njengamagumbi okufu ndela ongezelelweyo.

src_text: i then looked [for] and applied for a site where we would eventually build our school.
tgt_text: uralo ngelishwa wasweleka ngowama2004.

src_text: we received five hectares of land in 1998," says gilman.
tgt_text: ngowe1994, isikolo safudukela kwiholo ieli spilkin, elakhiwa ngusomashishini wasekuhlaleni ueli spilkin.

src_text: three temporary classrooms were donated to the school by a nonprofit organisation called kats and spaks, and the community built five mud classrooms.
tgt_text: "kwangalo nyaka, safumana izindlu zangasese ezingomahamba nendlwana ezivela kwisebe lezemfundo lephondo.

src_text: throughout the years, gilman continued to advocate for the school to be improved and eventually, five classrooms were received from the eastern cape premier’s office.
tgt_text: ndiye ndakhangela ndaza ndafaka isicelo sesiza apho ekugqibeleni sasiza kwakha isikolo sethu.

src_text: in 2014, things took a positive turn when the department of basic education, through asidi, issued a tender to build nkululeko ralo primary school.
tgt_text: safumana umhlaba ozihektare ezi ntlanu ngowe1998," utsho ugilman.

src_text: "construction started in 2018 and the school was completed in 2021, thanks to asidi," says gilman.
tgt_text: amagumbi okufundela ethutyana amathathu anikezelwa kwesi sikolo ngumbutho ongenzi nzuzo obizwa ngokuba yikats and spaks, kwaye uluntu lwakha amagumbi okufundela odaka amahlanu.

src_text: inspiring teaching and learning basic education deputy minister reginah mhaule says the department wants to ensure that the physical infrastructure of every school inspires learners to attend school and learn, and educators to teach.
tgt_text: kuyo yonke le minyaka, ugilman waqhubeka ekhuthaza ukuba isikolo siphuculwe kwaye ekugqibeleni, kwafunyanwa amagumbi okufundela amahlanu avela kwiofisi yenkulumbuso yempuma koloni.

src_text: "the building of this school is government’s way of restoring dignity to rural and underprivileged schoolgoing children and their teachers," she adds.
tgt_text: ngowama2014, izinto zatshintsha zabangcono xa isebe lemfundo esisiseko, ngokusebenzisa iasidi, lakhupha ithenda yokwakha isikolo samabanga aphantsi inkululeko ralo primary school.

src_text: a member of the school governing body, nomuntu dlengane, says the new school will motivate tea chers and learners to reach their full potential.
tgt_text: "ukwakhiwa kwaqala ngowama2018 kwaye isikolo sagqitywa ngowama2021, siyabulela kwiasidi," utsho ugilman.

src_text: "our learners’ attitudes and selfconfidence have already improved due to the new infrastructure.
tgt_text: ukukhuthaza ukufundisa nokufunda usekela mphathiswa wemfundo esisiseko ureginah mhaule uthi isebe lifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba iziseko zophuhliso zezakhiwo zesikolo ngasinye zikhuthaza abafundi ukuba baye esikolweni kwaye bafunde, nootitshala bafundise.

src_text: this will also help us maintain social distancing in our classrooms so that we can eliminate the spread of the coronavirus disease," says dlengane.
tgt_text: "ukwakhiwa kwesi sikolo yindlela karhulumente yokubuyisela isidima kubantwana abahlelele kileyo abahamba isikolo basemaphandleni nakootitshala babo," wongeze njalo.

src_text: the school has 489 learners, 14 teachers, and two administration clerks.
tgt_text: ilungu lebhodi elawula isikolo, unomuntu dlengane, uthi esi sikolo sitsha siza kukhuthaza ootitshala kunye nabafundi ukuba baphumelele ngokupheleleyo.

src_text: it caters for grades r to 7 and is a nonfee paying school.
tgt_text: iasidi ikhawulezisa inkqubela yeziseko zophuhliso lwezikolo more matshediso isikolo samabanga aphantsi inkululeko ralo primary school singumzekelo omhle we ndlela iziphumo ezintle ezinokufumaneka xa uluntu kunye norhulume nte besebenzisana.

src_text: nsfas funding deadline looms sphelele ngubane students and youth from disadvantaged and workingclass backgrounds are encouraged to apply for funding from the national student financial aid scheme (nsfas).
tgt_text: umhla wokugqibela wenkxasomali yensfas sphelele ngubane abafundi kunye nolutsha oluphuma kumakhaya ahlelelekileyo bayakhuthazwa ukuba bafake izicelo ze nkxasomali kwisikimu soncedo lwezezimali sabafundi sesizwe (insfas).

src_text: according to the department of higher education and training, nsfas funding is available to youth who have already completed their schooling or are already studying at any level in a higher education institution.
tgt_text: ngokwesebe lemfundo ephakamileyo kunye noqeqesho, inkxasomali yensfas iyafumaneka kulutsha olusele lugqibile ukufunda esikolweni okanye olusele lusenza izifundo kulo naliphi na iziko lemfundo ephakamileyo.

src_text: they can apply for funding from nsfas to study at a public university or a technical and vocational education and training (tvet) college, but must do so before the closing date on 7 january 2022. applicants must be: south african citizens or permanent residents who want to register or are already studying at a public university or tvet college; south african social security agency grant recipients; from households with a combined household income not exceeding r350 000 per year.
tgt_text: bangafaka isicelo senkxasomali kwinsfas ukuze bafunde kwiyunivesithi yoluntu okanye kwikho leji yemfundo yobugcisa noqeqesho (itvet), kodwa bakwenze oko ngaphambi komhla wokuvala wesi7 kweyomqungu, wama2022.

src_text: a brighter future nhlakanipho mkhize (26) is a qualified electrician, thanks to nsfas funding, which paid for his studies at umfolozi tvet college in kwazulunatal.
tgt_text: abafakizicelo kufuneka: babe ngabemmi bomzantsi afrika okanye babengabahlali abasisigxina abafuna ukubhalisa okanye abasele befunda kwiyunivesithi yoluntu okanye kwikholeji yetvet; babengabaxhamli bezibonelelo zearhente yezibonelelo zezentlalo nomhlalaphantsi yasemzantsi afrika; baphume kumakhaya anomvuzo wekhaya odityanisiweyo ongagqithiyo kumar350 000 ngonyaka.

src_text: mkhize, from richards bay, obtained a national certificate (vocational) electrical infrastructure construction in 2017. in addition to campusbased learning, he also had to complete workplace training and pass a trade test.
tgt_text: ikamva eliqaqambileyo unhlakanipho mkhize (26) ligcisa lombane, siyabulela kwinkxasomali yensfas, ehlawulele izifundo zakhe kwikholeji iumfolozi tvet college kwazulunatal.

src_text: early on in his studies, mkhize had the opportunity to put what he learnt into practice, ensuring that he gained confidence in the basic skills he was developing.
tgt_text: umkhize, waserichards bay, ufumene isatifikethi sesizwe (somsebenzi) so kwakha iziseko zophuhliso lombane ngowama2017.

src_text: "as a firstyear student, i was already attending to electricity problems in my community.
tgt_text: ukongeza kwimfundo yasekholeji, kuye kwafuneka ukuba agqibezele uqeqesho lwasemsebenzini kwaye aphumelele uvavanyo lokwenza umsebenzi.

src_text: umfolozi tvet college provided us with both theory and practice.
tgt_text: ekuqaleni kwezifundo zakhe, umkhize wafumana ithuba lokusebenzisa oko akufundileyo, eqinisekisa ukuba ufumana ukuzithe mba kwizakhono ezisisiseko awayeziphuhlisa.

src_text: "the advantage tvet students have is not just exposure, but also a compulsory workplacebased learning component to certify that they are competent before receiving their qualification," he says.
tgt_text: "njengomfundi owenza unyaka wokuqala, ndandisele ndilungisa iingxaki zombane kwindawo endihlala kuyo.

src_text: like many south african youth who come from underprivileged backgrounds, mkhize knew he wanted to pursue a career in engineering, but no one in his family could afford college fees.
tgt_text: iumfolozi tvet college isinike zombini ithiyori kunye nokusebenza.

src_text: "when i became aware of the nsfas funding, i knew it would lead to where i wanted to go – being an engineer," he says.
tgt_text: "inzuzo abanayo abafundi betvet ayikokubona nje ukuba wenziwa njani umsebenzi kuphela, kodwa ikwayinto enyanzelekileyo yokufunda esekelwe emsebenzini ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuba banobuchule ngaphambi kokuba bafumane iziqinisekiso zabo," utshilo.

src_text: mkhize’s threeyear nsfas funding paid for his books, tuition and transport, and he received a personal care allowance.
tgt_text: umhla wokugqibela wenkxasomali yensfas sphelele ngubane abafundi kunye nolutsha oluphuma kumakhaya ahlelelekileyo bayakhuthazwa ukuba bafake izicelo ze nkxasomali kwisikimu soncedo lwezezimali sabafundi sesizwe (insfas).

src_text: work together to strengthen democracy vukuzenzele unnamed as south africa entered the new year, we were confronted by two pro found events that remind ed us, in different ways, of what brings us together as a people.
tgt_text: masisebenzisane ukomeleza ulawulo lwentando yesininzi vukuzenzele unnamed njengokuba umzantsi afrika ungena kunyaka omtsha, ujongene neziganeko ezibini ezinzulu ezisikhumbuza ngeendlela ezahlukeneyo, into esidibanisayo.

src_text: on the first day of 2022, the nation gathered in spirit to bid farewell to arch bishop desmond tutu at st george’s cathedral in cape town.
tgt_text: ngosuku lokuqala luka2022, isizwe sahlangana ukuthi ndlelantle kubhishophu omkhulu udesmond tutu est george’s cathedral, eka pa. ibilixesha elibuhlungu kakhulu sikhumbula ubomi kunye negalelo leqabane elithandekayo, nowaye sisazela, ngeendlela ezininzi, zokuziphatha sisisizwe.

src_text: it was a moment of great sadness as we recalled the life and contribution of a beloved compatriot who was, in many ways, the moral conscience of our nation.
tgt_text: kwaxeshanye, umngcwabo wakhe ibungumbhiyozo wezinto ebezimele.

src_text: at the same time, his funeral was a celebration of the values he stood for.
tgt_text: ibingumbhiyozo womanyano kunye nehlobo abantu bethu abohlukene ngalo, kwaye ibisisikhumbuzo sokuzincama okwenziwa ngabantu ukufezekisa le ntando yesininzi yethu.

src_text: it was a celebration of the great unity and diversity of our people, and a reminder of the sacrifices made by so many to achieve our democracy.
tgt_text: ngosuku lwesibini luka2022, ilizwe labukela lunxunguphele umlilo omkhulu owawutshisa ipalamente yethu, kumgama nje olikhulu leemitha ukusuka apho sasidibanele khona kusuku olungaphambili sinika imbeko yethu yokugqibela kubhishophu omkhulu ututu.

src_text: on the second day of 2022, the country watched on in horror as a huge fire engulfed our parliament, just a hundred metres from where we had gathered the day before to pay our last respects to archbishop tutu.
tgt_text: sixolile ke noko kuba akukho mntu wabhubhayo kwaye akukho mntu wonzakalayo kulo mlilo.

src_text: we are relieved that there was no loss of life and that noone was injured in the fire.
tgt_text: sibulela kakhulu kubacimimlilo abathe balwa lo mlilo baze bawucima ekugqibeleni.

src_text: we are extremely gra teful to the firefighters who battled the blaze and finally extinguished it.
tgt_text: uphando ngonobangela walo mlilo luyaqhuba.

src_text: the investigations into the cause of the fire are now underway.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba olu phando lwenziwa ngokugqibeleleyo kwaye luyaqukunjelwa ngaphandle kolibaziseko.

src_text: we need to ensure that these investigations are thorough and concluded without delay.
tgt_text: ilizwe kufuneka lazile ukuba kwenzeke ntoni.

src_text: the country needs to know what happened.
tgt_text: amalungiselelo enziwe ukuqinisekisa ukuba imisebenzi yepalamente iyaqhuba nokuba izakhiwo azinakusetyenziswa.

src_text: arrangements are being made to ensure that the work of parliament can continue even if the buildings cannot be used.
tgt_text: kubalulekile ukuba ipalamente iqhubeke ithathe ingqalelo kwaye ipasise imithetho eza kuguqula uluntu kwaye iqhubeke ukubeka iliso nokuqinisekisa uxanduva njengoko urhulumente esebenzela ukuphumeza isigunyaziso asifumene ebantwini.

src_text: it is vital that parliament continues to consider and pass laws that will transform society and continues to provide oversight and ensure accountability as government works to implement the mandate it received from the people.
tgt_text: ngaphandle kokuba kufutshane kwest george’s cathedral kunye nepalamente, into edibanisa le misitho mibini kukuba umsitho ngamnye usikhumbuza ngeyonanto isidibanisayo njengabemi bomzantsi afrika: intando yesininzi yethu.

src_text: apart from the close proximity of st george’s cathedral and parliament, what connects these two events is that each reminds us of what brings us together as south africans: our democracy.
tgt_text: simzilele udesmond tutu kuba ebengutata osibonisa indlela malunga nentando yesininzi yethu.

src_text: we mourn desmond tutu because he was the spiritual father of our democracy.
tgt_text: sikhathazekile ngokonakala kwezakhiwo zethu zasepalamente kuba zizisihlalo sentando yesininzi yethu.

src_text: we despair at the devas tation of our parliamentary buildings because they are the seat of our democracy.
tgt_text: ziyindawo apho umgaqosiseko wethu omtsha wentando yesininzi wamkelwa khona kwisithuba nje seminyaka engama25 eyadlulayo, nalapho amakhulukhulu emithetho yethu yenguqu iye yapasiswa khona.

src_text: they are the place where our new democratic constitution was adopted just over 25 years ago, and where hundreds of trans formative laws have been passed.
tgt_text: sisenongasoloko siyiqaphela loo nto, kodwa umlilo wasepalamente ubonise indlela abaziva ngayo abemi bomzantsi afrika ngentando yesininzi yabo.

src_text: we may not always recognise it, but the fire at parliament demonstrated how strongly south africans feel about their democracy.
tgt_text: kukwasisikhumbuzo sokuba kubaluleke kangakanani na ukuba sisebenzele ukomeleza nokukhusela le ntando yesininzi.

src_text: it is a reminder also of how important it is that we work to strengthen and defend that democracy.
tgt_text: ngelixa izakhiwo zepalamente zonakaliswe ngapha kweqondo lokusebenziseka kwakhona, iziko lepalamente liyaqhuba nomsebenzi walowokunceda abantu.

src_text: while the parliamentary buildings have been damaged beyond use, the institution of parliament continues its work in the service of the people.
tgt_text: esi sisikhumbuzo esibalulekileyo sokuba amaziko ethu entando yesininzi awazozakhiwo, kodwa angumsebenzi owenziwayo kunye nethemba abantu abanalo ngakuwo.

src_text: this is an important reminder that our democratic institutions are not defined by the buildings that house them, but by the work they do and by the confidence that the people have in them.
tgt_text: oku kuyinyaniso kuwo onke amaziko ethu entando yesininzi.

src_text: this is true of all the institutions of our democracy.
tgt_text: kanye xa ucinywa umlilo epalamente, ibambela lejaji eyintloko uraymondzondo ungeniseinxalenye yokuqala yengxelo yekomishini yophando ngokuthathwa kombuso.

src_text: just as the fire in parliament was finally being extinguished, acting chief justice raymond zondo submitted the first part of the report of the commission of inquiry into state capture.
tgt_text: le nxalenye yengxelo inika iinkcukacha ngendlela amaziko oluntu amaninzi athe angenwa ngayo, aphangwa kwaye onakaliswa kakhulu.

src_text: this part of the report details how several public institutions were infiltrated, looted and severely damaged.
tgt_text: oku kuquka amashishini karhulumente afana neziko lomoya lomzantsi afrika, inkqubo yonxibelelwano lolwazi lukarhulumente kunye nenkonzo yerhafu yomzantsi afrika.

src_text: these include stateowned enterprises like south african airways, the government communication and information system and the south african revenue service.
tgt_text: le nxalenye yale ngxelo izoba umfanekiso okhathazayo kakhulu, wendlela apho amaziko abalulekileyo entando yesininzi athi afakwa engozini kwaye ajongelwa phantsi ngenjongo yolwaphulomthetho.

src_text: this part of the report paints a deeply disturbing picture of how key instituti ons of our democracy were compromised and undermined with criminal intent.
tgt_text: akubiwanga nje izixa zemali kuphela, kodwa la maziko awakwazanga kuzalisekisa ngokufanelekileyo imisebenzi ayemiselwe yona.

src_text: not only were significant amounts of money stolen, but these institutions were not able to properly fulfil the functions for which they were established.
tgt_text: iziphumo kunye nezindululo zekomishini kazondo ziza kunceda ilizwe ukuba liwakhe ngokutsha la maziko kwaye libambe abo banoxanduva lokuphendula.

src_text: the findings and recommendations of the zondo commission will help the country to rebuild these institutions and to hold those responsible to account.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba siyazisebenzisa ukuze sikhusele la maziko nakwixesha elizayo angaphinde athinjwe.

src_text: we must ensure that we use them to safeguard these institutions into the future so that they may never be captured again.
tgt_text: kufuneka sizikhusele kuzo zonke iinzame zokuthothisa intando yesininzi yethu esiyizuze nzima – nokuba ezi nzame zikwihlobo lorhwaphilizo kumashishini karhulumente, ukubhukuqa iiarhente zethu zogcinomthetho, ukonakaliswa kweziseko ezingundoqo zoqoqosho, okanye ukuhlaselwa kwenkululeko kunye nobulungisa beenkundla zethu zamatyala.

src_text: we must safeguard against any and all efforts to diminish our hardwon democracy – whether these efforts take the form of corruption in stateowned enterprises, the subversion of our law enforcement agencies, the sabotage of our economic infrastructure, or attacks on the independence and integrity of our judiciary.
tgt_text: kufuneka sikhusele umgaqosiseko wethu, urhulumente wethu wentando yesininzi kunye nenkqubo yonyulo kuye nabani na ofuna ukwenza buthathaka intando yesininzi yethu; avimbe abantu bomzantsi afrika inkululeko yabo abayizuze nzima.

src_text: we need to protect our constitution, our democratic state and the electoral process from anyone who wants to weaken our democracy and deny the south african people of their hardwon freedom.
tgt_text: mininzi imingeni ekufuneka siqwebisene nayo njengoko sisebenzela ukwakha ngokutsha kwaye si.

src_text: there are many challenges that we must confront as we work to rebuild and recover from the effects of the covid19 pandemic.
tgt_text: kunye nakumnqweno wethu wokwakha isizwe esimanyeneyo, esikhululekileyo nesilinganayo.

src_text: as we do so, let us draw strength and encouragement from our deep dedication to our democracy and our common desire to build a nation that is united, free and equal.
tgt_text: masisebenzisane ukomeleza ulawulo lwentando yesininzi vukuzenzele unnamed njengokuba umzantsi afrika ungena kunyaka omtsha, ujongene neziganeko ezibini ezinzulu ezisikhumbuza ngeendlela ezahlukeneyo, into esidibanisayo.

src_text: covid19 corruption perpetrators brought to book vukuzenzele unnamed individuals and companies who were involved in corruption relating to the gov ernment’s procurement of coronavirus disease (covid19) goods and services are being held accountable for their actions.
tgt_text: abenzi borhwaphilizo lwecovid19 baziswe ngaphambili vukuzenzele unnamed abantu kunye neenkampani ezibandakanyeka kurhwaphilizo olunxu lumene nokuthengwa kweempahla neenkonzo zentsholongwana yecorona (icovid19) zikarhu lumente bayaphenduliswa ngezenzo zabo.

src_text: the special investigation unit’s (siu) final report on its probe into allegations relating to any misuse of covid19 funds, across all spheres of government and the private sector was recently authorised for release to the public by president cyril ramaphosa.
tgt_text: ingxelo yeyunithi yophando ekhethekileyo (isiu) emalunga nophando lwayo lwezityholo ezinxulumene nokusetyenziswa gwenxa kwemali yecovid19, kuwo onke amanqwanqwa karhu lumente kunye namacandelo abucala.

src_text: the report is an important step in the fight against corruption and maladministration in the public and private sectors, he said.
tgt_text: kutsha nje umongameli ucyril ramaphosa ugunyazise ukuba ikhululelwe uluntu.

src_text: in july 2020, president ramaphosa authorised the investigation by the siu.
tgt_text: le ngxelo linyathelo elibalulekileyo lokulwa u rhwaphilizo kunye nolawulo olugwenxa kumacandelo karhulumente nawabucala, utshilo umongameli.

src_text: at the time, he gave his commitment that if the siu found evidence that a criminal offence had been committed, it would be obliged to refer the evidence to the national prosecuting authority (npa).
tgt_text: kweyekhala ngowama2020, umongameli ramaphosa wagunyazisa uphando lwesiu.

src_text: the siu was also aut horised to institute civil proceedings for the recovery of any damages or losses incurred by the state.
tgt_text: ngelo xesha ke waye wazibophelela ngelithi ukuba ngaba isiu ifumene ubungqina bokuba kwenziwe ityala lolwaphulomthetho, iya kunyanzeleka ukuba idlulisele ubungqina kwigunyabantu lezotshutshiso lesizwe (inpa).

src_text: report findings the siu investigated 5 467 contracts awarded to 3 066 service providers, worth a total of r14.3 billion.
tgt_text: kwakhona isiu yaphinda yagunyaziswa ukuba ithathe amanyathelo ezomthetho ukuze kubuyiselwe nawuphi na umonakalo okanye ilahleko eyenziwe ngurhu lumente.

src_text: the investigation into 4 549 contracts have been finalised, and 2 803 of these were found to be irregular.
tgt_text: ingxelo yeziphumo isiu iphande iikhontrakthi ezingama5 467 ezinikwe ababonelelinkonzo aba ngama3 066, ezixabisa ir14.3 yeebhiliyoni zizonke.

src_text: this amounts to 62% of the finalised investigations.
tgt_text: uphando kwiikhontrakthi ezingama4 549 sele luqukunjelwe, kwaye ezingama 2 803 kuzo zafunyanwa zingekho mgaqweni.

src_text: "this investigation targeted individuals and institutions who believed they could exploit a moment of national vulnerability to enrich themselves and those with whom they colluded to abuse public resources," the president said.
tgt_text: oku kufikelela kwi62% yophando olugqityiweyo.

src_text: he added it was unacceptable that so many contracts associated with saving lives and protecting livelihoods were irregular, unlawful or fraudulent.
tgt_text: umongameli uthe, "olu phando lujolise kubantu kunye namaziko akholelwa ukuba angasebenzisa ixeshana lokuba semngciphekweni kwesizwe ukuze bazityebise kunye nabo bathe basebenzisana nabo ukusebenzisa kakubi izixhobo zoluntu."

src_text: "this investigation demonstrates our determination to root out corruption and to deal with perpetrators," said president ramaphosa.
tgt_text: wongeza ngelithi akwamkelekanga kwaphela ukuba iikhontrakthi ezininzi ezinxulunyaniswa nokusindisa ubomi kunye nokukhusela iindlela zokuziphilisa kwabantu zazingekho mgangathweni, zingekho mthethweni okanye zinobuqhophololo.

src_text: the final report details matters that the siu has referred to the npa, departments and entities in the public sector and other parties.
tgt_text: "olu phando lubonakalisa ukuzimisela kwethu ekuncothuleni neengcambu urhwaphilizo kwanokujongana nabenzi bobubi," utshilo umongameli ramaphosa.

src_text: the npa will finalise the process of bringing wrongdoers to book and addressing weaknesses identified by the siu investigation, the president explained.
tgt_text: ingxelo yokugqibela inika iinkcukacha ngemiba esele isiu iyigqithisele kwinpa, amasebe namaqumrhu kwicandelo likarhulumente nakwamanye amaqela.

src_text: action taken since the start of the investigation, the siu, working with other agencies, has made the following progress: 45 matters, with a combined value of r2.1 billion, have been enrolled with the special tribunal on corruption, fraud and illicit money flows.
tgt_text: umongameli ucacise wathi, inpa iza kuqukumbela inkqubo yokuzisa abenzi bobubi entolongweni kunye nokujongana nobuthakathaka obuqatshelwe luphando lwesiu.

src_text: the special tribunal has a statutory mandate to recover public funds stolen through corruption, fraud and illicit money flows, and take civil action against perpetrators; 224 cases have been referred for disciplinary action against officials in government departments or entities; 386 cases have been referred to the npa, and three have been referred for executive action; 330 cases have been referred for administrative action, which includes blacklisting (not being able to do work for gov ernment).
tgt_text: inyathelo elithatyathiweyo oko luqalile uphando, isiu, isebenzisana nezinye iiarhente, yenze le nkqubela ilandelayo: imiba engama45, enexabiso elidityanisiweyo ler2.1 yeebhiliyoni, iye yabhaliswa kwinkundla eyodwa yorhwaphilizo, ubuqhophololo kunye nokuhamba kweemali ngokungekho mthethweni.

src_text: according to the report, a total of r551.5 million (value of cash and assets) is to be recovered, while r34.2 million has been recovered to date.
tgt_text: inkundla ekhethekileyo inegunya elisemthethweni lokubuyisela iimali zoluntu ezibiwe ngorhwaphilizo, ubuqhetseba kunye nokuhamba kwemali ngokungekho mthethweni, kwaye ithathele amanyathelo omthetho kubaphulimthetho; amatyala angama224 athunyelwe ukuze kuthathwe amanyathelo oluleko ngakumagosa kumasebe okanye amaqumrhu karhulumente; amatyala angama386 athunyelwe kwinpa, kwaze amatha thu agqithiswa ukuze umongameli athathwe amanyathelo; amatyala angama330 agqithiselwe kumanyathelo olawulo, aquka ukufakwa kuluhlu lwabantu bangesokuze baphinde benze umsebenzi kurhulumente.

src_text: the investigation prevented a r114.2 million loss, and set contracts aside valued at r170.4 million.
tgt_text: ngokwengxelo, yir551.5 yezigidi zeerandi (ixabiso lemali nempahla) eza kubuyiswa, ngelixa ir34.2 yezigidi sele ibuyisiwe ukuza kuthi ga ngoku.

src_text: the siu expects these matters to be completed between march and april 2022, before the submission of a supplementary report to the president at the end of june.
tgt_text: olu phando luthintele ilahleko yer114.2 yezigidi zeerandi, laze labekela bucala izivumelwano ezixabisa ir170.4 yezigidi.

src_text: the report does not include details of ongoing investigations into allega tions received by the siu after the deadline set for the final report.
tgt_text: isiu ilindele ukuba le miba igqitywe phakathi kwenyanga yenkwindla nekatshazimpuzi kowama2022, phambi kokuba kungeniswe ingxelo eyongezelelweyo kumongameli ekupheleni kwenyanga yesilimela.

src_text: these include investigations into 476 service providers, linked to 964 contracts, valued at more than r961.6 million.
tgt_text: le ngxelo ayizibandakanyi iinkcukacha zophando oluqhubekayo kwizityholo ezifunyenwe yisiu emva kwexesha elibekiweyo lengxelo yokugqibela.

src_text: the outcomes of these investigations, the presidency said, will also be provided in the june report.
tgt_text: oku kuquka uphando kubanikezeli beenkonzo abangama476, abanxulunyaniswa neekhontrakthi ezingama964, ezixabisa ngaphezu kwezigidi ezingamar961.6.

src_text: the president thanked the siu for the work done in the past 18 months, and also whistleblowers and other witnesses who provided information to investigators.
tgt_text: abenzi borhwaphilizo lwecovid19 baziswe ngaphambili vukuzenzele unnamed abantu kunye neenkampani ezibandakanyeka kurhwaphilizo olunxu lumene nokuthengwa kweempahla neenkonzo zentsholongwana yecorona (icovid19) zikarhu lumente bayaphenduliswa ngezenzo zabo.

src_text: cach connects students with learning opportunities silusapho nyanda young people who have not yet secured spots at higher education institutions can turn to the central application clearing house (cach) system for help.
tgt_text: icach idibanisa abafundi namathuba okufunda silusapho nyanda abantu abatsha abangekazifumani iindawo zokufunda kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo bangakwazi ukufaka izicelo kwinkqubo yecentral application clearing house (icach) ukuze bafumane uncedo.

src_text: cach is an online government service managed by the department of higher education and training (dhet).
tgt_text: icach yinkonzo karhulumente efunyanwa kwiintanethi elawulwa lisebe lemfundo ephakamileyo noqeqesho (idhet).

src_text: the service helps those who need access to university, technical and vocational education and training (tvet) colleges and skills development opportunities.
tgt_text: le nkonzo inceda abo bafuna ukufikelela kwiiyunivesithi, iikholeji zemfundo yobugcisa noqeqesho (itvet) kwakunye nokufikelela kumathuba ophuhliso lwezakhono.

src_text: "cach services have been available from 24 january 2022, and will close on 31 march, to assist those who need to enter tertiary education but face challenges with getting space," says minister of higher education and training dr blade nzimande.
tgt_text: "iinkonzo zecach sele ziqalile ukufumaneka ukususela ngomhla wama24 kweyomqungu 2022, kwaye ziza kuvalwa ngomhla wama31 kweyokwindla, ngelokunceda abo bafuna ukungena kumaziko emfundo enomsila kodwa bajongane nemiceli mngeni yokufumana indawo," utshilo umphathiswa wemfundo ephakamileyo noqeqesho ugqirha ublade nzimande.

src_text: cach can help those who applied for admission to a university or a college on time in 2021, but were not offered a place in a programme of their choice.
tgt_text: icach ingakwazi ukunceda abo abangakhange banikwe ndawo kwizifundo ebebezikhethile, nangona bebefake izicelo zabo zokwamkelwa eyunivesithi okanye ekholejini kwangethuba kunyaka ophelileyo ka2021.

src_text: the dhet explained that this usually happens when the applicant does not meet the necessary requirements or the institution has reached its limit on the number of students it can enrol.
tgt_text: idhet icacise yathi oku kudla ngokwenzeka xa umfakisicelo engazifezekisi iimfuno ezibalulekileyo zokufaka isicelo okanye xa iziko lifikelele kumda walo othile wenani labafundi elinokubabhalisa.

src_text: cach can also help those who applied to a higher learning institution and were accepted, but now want to change their courses.
tgt_text: kwakhona icach ingakwazi nokunceda nabo babefake izicelo kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo baza bamkelwa, kodwa ngoku bafuna ukutshintsha izifundo zabo.

src_text: cach will refer individuals to career development services and where possible, provide an opportunity for them to be considered for spaces still available at universities, tvet colleges or sector education and training authority (seta) learnerships, without having to travel to any institution.
tgt_text: icach iza kuthumela abantu kwiinkonzo zophuhliso lwamakhono omsebenzi, ukanti xa kunokwenzeka ingabanika nezithuba ezisafumanekayo kwiiyunivesithi nakwiikholeji zetvet okanye uqeqeshelomsebenzi kwicandelo lemfundo noqeqesho (iseta), nga phandle kokuba umfakisicelo ade axhamleke aye ngeenyawo kulo naliphi na iziko.

src_text: all public universities, tvet colleges and setas can access the cach database to search for individuals who meet the criteria for available spaces.
tgt_text: zonke iiyunivesithi zikarhulumente, iikholeji zetvet kwakunye neeseta zizakukwazi ukufikelela kwiziko ledatabase yecach zikhangela abantu abahlangabezana nemilinganiselo yezithuba ezisafumanekayo.

src_text: "institutions select individuals from the cach database and make direct contact with those they have selected," says dhet spokesperson ishmael mnisi.
tgt_text: "amaziko akhetha abantu kwiziko ledatabase yecach ze aqhagamshelane nabo ngqo abo bathe babakhetha," sitshilo isithethi sedhet uishmael mnisi.

src_text: applicants who sign up for cach must submit their details, including their preferred fields of study.
tgt_text: abafakizicelo ababhalise kwicach kufuneka bangenise iinkcukacha zabo, kuquka nezifundo abazifunayo.

src_text: applicants have options to accept or reject study offers on the cach system.
tgt_text: kananjalo abafakizicelo bangakwazi ukwamkela okanye ukukhaba izifundo abazinikwayo kwinkqubo yecach.

src_text: institutions of higher learning will only be able to access applicants’ information from cach once applicants have signed up and uploaded their grade 12 results.
tgt_text: bakuba abenzisicelo bebhalisile baza bafaka iziphumo zabo zebanga le12.

src_text: mnisi says cach also helps prospective students who are undecided about career choices by referring them to dhet’s khetha career development service.
tgt_text: icach idibanisa abafundi namathuba okufunda silusapho nyanda abantu abatsha abangekazifumani iindawo zokufunda kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo bangakwazi ukufaka izicelo kwinkqubo yecentral application clearing house (icach) ukuze bafumane uncedo.

src_text: sona 2022: bettering lives and livelihoods vukuzenzele unnamed government is committed to putting people first, and has given itself 100 days to finalise a plan to involve all sectors of society in growing south africa’s economy, creating jobs and combating hunger.
tgt_text: isona ka2022: ukwenza ubomi neendlela zokuziphilisa ngcono vukuzenzele unnamed urhulumente uzibophelele ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu baba yeyona nto ibalulekileyo, kwaye uzinike iintsuki ezili100 ukugqibezela isicwangciso esibandakanya onke amacandelo asekuhlaleni ukukhulisa uqoqosho lomzantsi afrika, ukudala imisebenzi nokulwa indlala.

src_text: this was emphasised by president cyril ramaphosa in his 2022 state of the nation address.
tgt_text: oku kuye kwagxininiswa ngumongameli cyril ramaphosa kwintetho yakhe engobume besizwe ka2022.

src_text: "this work will build on the foundation of the economic reconstruction and recovery plan, which remains our common programme to rebuild the economy," he said.
tgt_text: "lo msebenzi uza kukwakha isiseko sesicwangciso sokwakhiwa ngokutsha nokuvuselelwa koqoqosho, nto leyo eseyinkqubo yethu sonke yokwakha kwakhona uqoqosho," utshilo.

src_text: the president said government’s priorities are overcoming the coronavirus disease (covid19) pandemic, building infrastructure, increasing local production, creating jobs and addressing the energy crisis.
tgt_text: umongameli uthe izinto eziphambili kurhulumente kukoyisa ubhubhane wesifo sentsholongwane yecorona (icovid19), ukwakha amaseko, ukonyusa iimveliso zeli, ukudala imisebenzi nokulungisa ingxaki yamandla ombane.

src_text: "if there is one thing we all agree on, it is that the present situation – of deep poverty, unemployment and inequality – is unacceptable and unsustainable."
tgt_text: "ukuba kukho into enye esivumelana ngayo sonke, kukuba le meko ikhoyo ngoku – yentlupheko enzulu, intswelangqesho nokungalingani – ayamkelekanga kwaye ayinakho ukuhlala inje."

src_text: creating jobs last year, the unemployment rate reached its highest recorded level of 34.9% in the third quarter, following the financial devastation caused by covid19.
tgt_text: ukudala imisebenzi kulo nyaka uphelileyo, izinga lentswelangqesho liye lafikelela kwelona nqanaba liphezulu elakhe labonwa lama34.9% kwikota yesithathu, emveni kwentshabalalo ebangelwe yicovid19.

src_text: "we all know that government does not create jobs.
tgt_text: "sonke siyazi ukuba urhulumente akadali misebenzi.

src_text: business creates jobs.
tgt_text: ngamashishini adala imisebenzi.

src_text: the key task of government is to create the conditions that will enable the private sector – both big and small – to emerge, to grow, to access new markets, to create new products, and to hire more employees," he said.
tgt_text: owona msebenzi karhulumente ubalulekileyo kukudala iimeko eziza kwenza ukuba icandelo labucala – elincinci nelikhulu – livele, likhule, likwazi ukungena kwiimarike ezintsha, livelise iimveliso ezintsha, nokuba liqeshe abantu abongezelelekileyo," utshilo.

src_text: around 80% of employed people work in the private sector.
tgt_text: malunga ne80% yabantu abaqeshiweyo basebenza kwicandelo labucala.

src_text: the president said government will introduce a new loan guarantee scheme to help small businesses recover.
tgt_text: umongameli uthe urhulumente uza kukwazisa inkqubo entsha yokuqinisekisa imalimboleko ukunceda amashishini amancinci ukuba achache kwakhona.

src_text: the presidential employment stimulus programme, which has already supported over 850 000 employment opportunities, will be stepped up.
tgt_text: inkqubo yoburhulumente yovuselelo lwengqesho, esele ixhase ngaphaya kwamathuba engqesho angama850 000, iza konyuswa.

src_text: most of the beneficiaries were young people; over 60% were women.
tgt_text: uninzi lwabaxhamli ibingabantu abancinci; ngaphaya kwe60% ngamanina.

src_text: the employment stimulus will enable the department of home affairs to recruit 10 000 unemployed youth for the digitisation of paper records, and the social employment fund will create another 50 000 work opportunities.
tgt_text: uvuselelo lwengqesho luza kwenza ukuba isebe lemicimbi yekhaya lifune abantu abatsha abangama10 000 abangaqeshwanga ukuba basebenze ukwenza iingxelo esisemaphepheni zibe dijithali, ingxowamali yentswelangqesho yoluntu iza kudala amanye amathuba omsebenzi angama50 000. isebe lemfundo ephakamileyo noqeqesho liza kufaka abantu abangama10 000 abangaphangeliyo abaphumelele imfundo yobugcisa nemisebenzi yezandla kunye nezithwalandwe zoqeqesho kwiindawo zokusebenza ukususela kwekatshazimpuzi 2022. iqonga lesayouth.

src_text: the department of higher education and training will place 10 000 unemployed technical and vocational education and training graduates in workplaces from april 2022. the sayouth.
tgt_text: mobi elinceda ulutsha olukhangela imisebenzi lukwazi ukufikelela kumathuba ngoku linolutsha olungaphaya kwezigidi eziyi2.3 olubhalisiweyo.

src_text: mobi platform, which helps young work seekers to access opportunities and support, now has over 2.3 million youth registered.
tgt_text: kwaba, ngaphaya kwama600 000 sele befakwe emisebenzini.

src_text: of these, over 600 000 have been placed into employment opportunities.

src_text: "a revitalised national youth service will recruit its first cohort of 50 000 young people during the next year [2023], creating opportunities for young people to contribute to their communities, develop their skills and grow their employability."
tgt_text: isibonelelo sesrd siyaqhubeka isibonelelo sesiqabu senkxwaleko (isrd) secovid19, esele sincede ngaphaya kwezigidi ezili10 zabantu abangaphangeliyo, sandisiwe ngomnye unyaka – de kube sekupheleni kweyokwindla 2023. ngaphaya koko, urhulumente nabo asebenza nabo baza kukhangela iindlela zokuqhubeka nokuxhasa abantu abaphantsi koxinzelelo lwenkxwaleko ngendlela engazi kuxabisa ilizwe kakhulu kwixesha elide elizayo.

src_text: srd grant continuesthe covid19 social relief of distress (srd) grant, which has helped over 10 million unemployed people, has been extended for another year – to the end of march 2023. in addition, government and its partners will look at ways to continue to support people in financial distress in a manner that is affordable to the country over the long term.
tgt_text: ukufikelela kumhlaba urhulumente uyaqhubeka nohlaziyo lomhlaba kwaye ulindele ukuba umthetho oyilwayo wokoxhuthwa komhlaba upasiswe kulo nyaka.

src_text: access to land government is moving ahead with land reform and anticipates the approval of the expropriation bill this year.
tgt_text: ukusekwa kwearhente yohlaziyo nophuhliso lolimo nomhlaba nako kuza kugqitywa kulo nyaka.

src_text: the establishment of the agriculture and land reform development agency will also be finalised this year.
tgt_text: "isebe lemisebenzi yoluntu namaseko liza kugqiba ukutshintshelwa kweehektare ezingama14 000 zomhlaba karhulumente uye kwiarhente yophuhliso lwezindlu," utshilo umongameli.

src_text: "the department of public works and infrastructure will finalise the transfer of 14 000 hectares of state land to the housing development agency," the president said.
tgt_text: wongeze ngelithi kukho umhlaba owaneleyo olimekayo ukuxhasa izigidi zabalimi abakwizinga elincinci beenkukhu, imfuyo, iziqhamo nemifuno.

src_text: he added that there is enough arable land to support millions of thriving smallscale farmers in poultry, livestock, fruit and vegetables.
tgt_text: sele kukho ngaphaya kwabalimi abangama100 000 abafumene iivawutsha zeembewu ukwandisa iimveliso zabo kwaye le nkqubo iza kongezwa ukuba ifikelele kubalimi abongezelelekileyo.

src_text: already, over 100 000 farmers have received input vouchers to expand their production and the programme will be expanded to reach more farmers.
tgt_text: urhwaphilizo nolwaphulomthetho ukususela ekusekeni ikomishoni yophando ejonge ukubanjwa kwelizwe, ukuya ekuphandeni izivumelwano zokuthengwa kwezinto ezoyamene necovid19, umongameli ramaphosa uguqulula yonke into xa kufikelelwa ekupheliseni urhwaphilizo.

src_text: end of state of disaster in sight for sa vukuzenzele unnamed president cyril ramaphosa recently announced in his 2022 state of the nation address (sona) that government plans to scrap the national state of disaster as the coun try enters a new phase in the management of the coronavirus disease (covid19) pandemic.
tgt_text: ukuphela kwemeko yentlekele kusondele emzantsi afrika vukuzenzele unnamed umongameli cyril ramaphosa usandula ukubhengeza kwintetho yakhe engobume besizwe (isona) ka2022 ukuba urhulumente uceba ukuphelisa imeko yentlekele yesizwe njengokuba ilizwe lingena kwisigaba esitsha solawulo lobhubhane wesifo sentsholongwane yecorona (icovid19).

src_text: "it is our intention to end the national state of disaster as soon as we have finalised other measures under the national health act and other legislation to contain the pandemic," said the president.
tgt_text: "yinjongo yethu uku phelisa imeko yentlekele yesizwe ngokukhawuleza sakube sigqibe amanye amanyathelo phantsi komthetho wempilo wesizwe neminye imithetho ukulawula lo bhubhane," utshilo umongameli.

src_text: on 15 march 2020, president ramaphosa declared the national state of disaster in terms of the disaster management act and announced a range of measures to contain the covid19 outbreak.
tgt_text: ngomhla we15 kweyokwindla 2020, umongameli ramaphosa wabhengeza imeko yentlekele yesizwe ngokwemimiselo yomthetho wolawulo lwentlekele waze wazisa uluhlu lwamanyathelo okunqanda ukwanda koqhambuko lwecovid19.

src_text: president ramaphosa said nearly all restrictions on economic and social activity have already been lifted, which is largely thanks to the vaccination rollout programme.
tgt_text: umongameli ramaphosa uthe phantse zonke izithintelo ezikwiintshukumo zoqoqosho nezasekuhlaleni sele zisusiwe, kwaye uninzi lwazo ngenxa yokuqhutywa kwenkqubo yokugonya.

src_text: he reminded citizens that vaccines are the best defence against illness, death and covid19, which has claimed close to 100 000 lives locally.
tgt_text: ukhumbuze abemi beli ukuba amachiza okugonya ayeyona ndlela ihamba phambili yokuzikhusela ngasekuguleni, ekufeni nakwicovid19, esele ithathe ubomi babantu abaphantse bafikelele kuma100 000 kweli.

src_text: "i've always said from a personal point of view, had i have not been vaccinated, in december when i contracted covid19, i probably will not be standing here," he reflected.
tgt_text: "oko ndatsho ukuba ngokubona kwam, ukuba bendingagonyanga, ngeyomnga ukufumana kwam icovid19, mhlawumbi ngendingemanga apha ngoku," utshilo ecinga emva.

src_text: the president took the time to urge south africans to take the lifesaving jab and continue to observe basic health measures and remain vigilant.
tgt_text: umongameli uthabathe ithuba ukubongoza abemi bomzantsi afrika ukuba bafumane isitofu esisindisa ubomi nokuba baqhubeke nokulandela amanyathelo ezempilo asisiseko nokuba bahlale bethe qwa.

src_text: "we will be able to get on with our lives, even with the virus in our midst," he said, adding that the pandemic has exacerbated the divide between those who are employed and those who are jobless.
tgt_text: "siza kukwazi ukuqhubeka nobomi bethu, nokuba le ntsholongwane isephakathi kwethu," utshilo, esongeza ngelithi lo bhubhane wenze mandundu iyantlukwano phakathi kwabo baqeshiweyo nabo bangenamisebenzi.

src_text: they told me what i have heard in many other communities across the country: that the perpetrators of such acts are known, not least because they flaunt the proceeds of their crimes.

src_text: but their deeds will eventually catch up with them, whoever they are, and whatever position they may hold.

src_text: they will learn that crime does not pay.
tgt_text: baza kufunda ukuba ulwaphulomthetho alubhatali.

src_text: in this regard, one of our most effective weapons in the fight against corruption and state capture is the special tribunal of the special investigating unit (siu), which i established in 2019. it adjudicates on matters that the siu institutes for civil litigation after it has concluded its investigations.
tgt_text: ngokubhekiselele koku, esinye sezona zixhobo zethu zisebenzayo eku lweni urhwaphilizo kunye nokubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso yinkundla ekhethekileyo yecandelo lophando elikhethekileyo (isiu), endaliseka ngowama2019.

src_text: the special tribunal was set up to speed up litigation.
tgt_text: igweba kwimiba ethi isiu iyisungulele ama tyala oluntu emva kokuba iluqukumbele uphando lwayo.

src_text: this approach has made it possible for public funds and state assets lost to corrupt acts to be recovered faster, avoiding delays in the high courts, where the siu has to wait its turn together with other litigants.
tgt_text: inkundla ekhethekileyo yamiselwa ukuba kukhawuleziswe ukuxoxwa kwamatyala.

src_text: the siu can request preservation orders and the freezing of assets to prevent further losses to the state.
tgt_text: le ndlela yenze ukuba imali karhulumente kunye neempahla zikarhulumente ezithe zalahleka kwizenzo zorhwaphilizo zibuyiselwe ngokukhawuleza, kuthi ntelwe ukulibaziseka kwii nkundla eziphakamileyo, apho isiu bekunyanzeleke ukuba ilinde ithuba layo kunye nabanye abamangali.

src_text: this is important when considering that per petrators who are under suspicion often go to great lengths to move around, hide or dispose of proceeds of corruption.
tgt_text: isiu inokucela imiyalelo yogcino kunye nokuthintelwa kokusetyenziswa kwempahla ukuthintela ilahleko eyongezelelweyo kurhulumente.

src_text: there can be no doubt the special tribunal has been a game changer.
tgt_text: oku kubalulekile xa kuqwalaselwa ukuba abenzi bobubi abarhanelwayo badla ngokwenza inzame ezi nkulu zokuhambisa, bafihle okanye balahle iinzuzo zorhwaphilizo.

src_text: since its establishment, the tribunal has recovered around r8.6 billion from unlawful contracts.
tgt_text: akukho mathandabuzo ukuba inkundla ekhethekileyo iye yaguqula izinto.

src_text: for any fight against corruption to be deemed effective, it is not sufficient that perpetrators are pro secuted.
tgt_text: ukususela ekusekweni kwayo, inkundla yama tyala iye yafumana malunga ner8.6 yeebhiliyoni zeerandi kwiikhontrakthi ezingekho mthethweni.

src_text: the proceeds of their crimes must be recovered.
tgt_text: ukuze nawuphi na umlo ochasene norhwaphilizo ubonakale unempumelelo, akwanelanga ukuba abenzi bobubi batshutshiswe.

src_text: this money belongs to citizens and should be used to meet their needs.
tgt_text: iinzuzo zolwaphulomthe tho lwabo kufuneka zibu yiselwe.

src_text: the special tribunal recently ordered two construction companies to return the profits they earned from r40 million in contracts to erect the beit bridge border fence.
tgt_text: le mali yeyabemmi kwaye kufuneka isetyenziselwe ukuhlangabezana neemfuno zabo.

src_text: this followed an investigation by the siu that uncovered a number of irregularities, including a prepayment to the companies by the department of public works and infrastructure.
tgt_text: inkundla ekhethekileyo kutsha nje iyalele iinkampani ezimbini zokwakha ukuba zibuyise iingeniso eziyifumene kumar40 ezigidi zeekontrakthi zokwakha ucingo lomda webeit bridge.

src_text: over the past few weeks alone, the tribunal has reviewed and set aside more than r100 million worth of irregular and unlawful contracts arising from covidrelated pro curement.
tgt_text: oku kula ndela uphando olwenziwa yisiu oluthe lwafumanisa izinto ezininzi ezitenxileyo, eziquka ukuhlawulwa kwangaphambili kwiinkampani lisebe lemisebenzi karhulumente neziseko ezingundoqo.

src_text: the special tribunal has also been successful in getting back money from senior executives in stateowned enterprises who conducted irregular business activities.
tgt_text: kwezi veki zimbalwa zidlulileyo zizodwa, inkundla yamatyala iye yaphonononga kwaye yabekela bucala ngaphezulu kwer100 lezigidi zeekhontrakthi ezingafanelekanga nezingekho mthethweni ezivela kwiinkqubo zokufumana abanikizinkonzo ezinxulumene necovid19.

src_text: for example, last year a former transnet executive was ordered to pay r26 million he received as a shareholder of a firm of consulting engineers contracted to transnet while he was a fulltime employee.
tgt_text: inkundla ekhethekileyo iye yabanempumelelo ekufumaneni imali kubaphathi abaphezulu abakumashishini karhulumente abaqhube imisebenzi engafanelekanga yoshishino.

src_text: the siu has in a number of cases approached the tribunal to delay the payment of pension benefits, pending the outcome of its investigations, to public servants implicated in financial irregularities or fruitless and wasteful expenditure.
tgt_text: umzekelo, kulo nyaka uphelileyo owayesakuba sisigqeba sakwatransnet wayalelwa ukuba ahlawule amar26 ezigidi zeerandi awazifumanayo njengo mninizabelo kwishishini leenjineli zabacebisi ngokuthi abengumcebisi wakwatransnet ngethuba wayengumsebenzi wesi gxina.

src_text: the cases before the special tribunal show that much work still needs to be done to strengthen governance and management across all arms of the state.
tgt_text: isiu iye kwinkundla yamatyala ngenxa yamatyala amaninzi ukulibazisa ukuhlawulwa kwezibonelelo zomhlalaphantsi, kusalindwe iziphumo zo phando lwayo, kubasebenzi bakarhulumente abachaphazeleka kwizitenxo zemali okanye kwiinkcitho ezingenanzuzo neziyilahleko.

src_text: they point to serious lapses on the part of accounting officers and failures to adhere to laws and regulations governing procurement i have said before that winning the war on cor ruption will be difficult, and that it will take time to unravel the vast webs of patronage that had become entrenched.
tgt_text: amatyala aphambi kwenkundla ekhethekileyo abonisa ukuba usemninzi umsebenzi ekusafuneka wenziwe ukuqinisa ula wulo lukarhulumente kunye nolawulo kuwo onke amasebe karhulumente.

src_text: i have also maintained that we must fight private sector corruption with equal vigour, because for every public sector employee willing to be bribed, there is a business person willing to pay a bribe.
tgt_text: bachaza ukusilela okumandla kwicala lamagosa anika ingxelo kunye nokusilela ekuthobeleni imithetho nemigaqo elawula iinkqubo zokufumana abanikizinkonzo.

src_text: these corrupt relationships have eroded the capacity of the state to deliver on its mandate.
tgt_text: ndakhe ndatsho ngaphambili ukuba ukuphumelela umlo worhwaphilizo kuza kuba nzima, kwaye kuza kutha tha ixesha ukucombulula intaphane yamagunya alawula ukuqeshwa kwabantu esele imiliselwe.

src_text: they have set back the state’s efforts to provide decent healthcare, to deliver clean water, and to ensure a consistent supply of power to communities and businesses.
tgt_text: ndikwayigcinile into yokuba kufuneka silwe urhwaphilizo lwecandelo labucala ngamandla alinganayo, kuba kuye wonke umsebenzi wecandelo likarhulumente ozimiseleyo ukunyotywa, kukho usomashishini ozimiseleyo ukunyoba.

src_text: but, as the special tribunal has demonstrated, we are steadily turning the tide.
tgt_text: obu budlelwane borhwaphilizo buye baphazamisa amandla karhulumente okuphumeza igunya lakhe.

src_text: not only are perpetrators being arrested and taken to court; they are also having to forfeit the proceeds of their crimes.
tgt_text: baye babuyisela umva iinzame zombuso zokunikezela ngokhathalelo lwezempilo olundilisekileyo, ukuhambisa amanzi acocekileyo, kunye nokuqinisekisa ngonikezelo lwamandla ombane olungaguqukiyo kuluntu nakumashishini.

src_text: there is still a long way to go, and there is a huge amount of stolen public funds that still need to be recovered.
tgt_text: kodwa, njengoko inkundla ekhethekileyo ibonisile, sithe chu siguqula imeko.

src_text: but the siu and the special tribunal have made a good start, and i am confident of many more successes in the months and years ahead.

src_text: food at school ensures children don’t go hungry vukuzenzele unnamed over nine million children receive a nutritious meal at school thanks to government’s national school nutrition programme (nsnp), which was introduced in 1994. the programme aims to improve children’s ability to learn, by reducing malnutrition and hunger and improving school attendance, especially at disadvantaged schools.
tgt_text: inkqubo yesondlo esikolweni iqinisekisa ukuba abantwana abalambi vukuzenzele unnamed bangaphezu kwezigidi ezilithoba abantwana abafumana ukutya okunesondlo ezikolweni ngenxa karhulumente ngenkqubo yesizwe yesondlo ezikolweni (insnp), eyaqaliswa ngo1994.

src_text: "the programme is critical for furthering learners’ constitutional rights to basic nutrition and basic education," explains deputy minister of basic education dr reginah mhaule.
tgt_text: le nkqubo ijolise ekuphuculeni uhlobo abantwana abafunda ngalo, ngokuthi inciphise ukungondleki, indlala kunye nehlobo abahamba ngalo isikolo, ingakumbi kwizikolo ezihlelelekileyo.

src_text: as a result of the nsnp, more children are attending school on time and more regularly, and their concentration in class has improved.
tgt_text: le nkqubo ibalulekile ekuqhubeleni phambili amalungelo abafundi akumgaqosiseko esondlo esisiseko kunye nemfundo esisiseko," ucacise watsho usekela mphathiswa wemfundo esisiseko ugq reginah mhaule.

src_text: according to the department of basic education (dbe), learners are taught good eating and lifestyle habits.
tgt_text: ngenxa yensnp, abantwana abaninzi bafika esikolweni ngexesha kwaye baya rhoqo, futhi ukuzikisa ingqondo kwabo eklasini kuye kwaphucuka.

src_text: schools are also encouraged to set up their own food gardens to supplement the nsnp menu.
tgt_text: ngokwesebe lemfundo esisiseko (idbe), abafundi bafundiswa indlela efanelekileyo yokutya kunye neyokuphila.

src_text: learners, teachers and parents are taught grow their own food.
tgt_text: izikolo zikwakhuthazwa ukuba zizenzele ezazo izitiya ukongeza ekutyeni kwensnp.

tgt_text: abafundi, ootitshala kunye nabazali bafundiswa ukuzilimela okwabo ukutya.

src_text: the awards celebrate schools’ nutrition programmes by looking at their hygiene and safety practices, nutritious meals, food gardens and nutrition education.

src_text: "i am extremely grateful that the school won the award," says seyanokeng sejake, the thabang pri mary principal for the past 24 years.

src_text: thabang primary school has been running its nutrition programme since 1994. today, it ensures that its 1 065 learners receive a healthy breakfast daily from a local business.
tgt_text: "ndinombulelo omkhulu ngokuba isikolo siphumelele le mbasa," utshilo useyanokeng sejake, oyinqununu yasethabang primary school ukusukela kwiminyaka engama24 eyadlulayo.

src_text: the food is cooked by unemployed members of the community, who are appointed by the school governing body (sgb).
tgt_text: esi sikolo saqalisa ukuqhuba inkqubo yaso yesondlo ukususela ngo1994.

src_text: "our six employed voluntary food handlers (vfh) make the food provided by the department of basic education through the allocation of funds to the school," says sejake.

src_text: thabang primary school took top honours at the awards due to the hard work and commitment of its sgb, management team and functional nsnp com mittee, says sejake.

src_text: flood relief for kzn and e cape allison cooper government will help residents of kwazulunatal and the eastern cape rebuild their lives and homes after floods recently left a trail of death and destruction in the two provinces.
tgt_text: inkxaso yezikhukula kwazulunatal nasempuma koloni allison cooper urhulumente uza kunceda abahlali bakwazulunatal nabasempuma koloni ukuba bakhe ubomi namakhaya abo ngokutsha emva kwezikhukula kutsha nje ezishiye umzila wokufa nentshabalalo kula maphondo mabini.

src_text: president cyril ramaphosa said national treasury will make money available for relief efforts to help those affected by the floods.

src_text: "the minister of finance has said that r1 billion is immediately available," he said.

src_text: government is working with the solidarity fund, private sector and nongovernmental and communitybased organisations to support victims.

src_text: the solidarity fund will set up a separate bank account for the flood disaster for south african and foreign donors to contribute to relief efforts.
tgt_text: ingxowamali yomanyano iza kuseka iakhawunti yebhanki eyahlukileyo yokujongana nentlekele yezikhukula ukwenzela abaxhasi basemzantsi afrika nabangaphandle ukuba bafake isandla kwiinzame zenkxaso.

src_text: government will also provide vouchers to help households rebuild partially damaged houses, the president said.

src_text: "a comprehensive assessment of the economic cost of these floods still has to be made, but it is clear that it will run into billions of rands for the rebuilding of infrastructure and loss of production."
tgt_text: "kusafuneka kwenziwe uhlolo olubanzi lweendleko zoqoqosho zezi zikhukula, kodwa kuyacaca ukuba ziza kufikelela kwiibhiliyoni zeerandi ukuze kwakhiwe ngokutsha iziseko zophuhliso kunye nelahleko yemveliso.

src_text: he added that the money set aside for the flood victims must reach those who need it the most.
tgt_text: "uqhube wathi imali ebekelwe amaxhoba ezikhukula kufuneka ifikelele kwabo bayidinga kakhulu.

src_text: "it will be critical, as we undertake this work, that all the re sources we mobilise are used for their intended purposes and reach the intended recipients.
tgt_text: "kuya kubaluleka kakhulu, njengokuba sisenza lo msebenzi, ukuba zonke izixhobo esiziqokelelayo zisetyenziselwe iinjongo ekujoliswe kuzo kwaye zifikelele kwabo bafanele ukuzifumana.

src_text: there can be no room for corruption, mismanagement or fraud of any sort," the president stressed.

src_text: threephased response president ramaphosa said government will respond to the disaster in three phases.
tgt_text: inkxaso yezigaba ezintathu umongameli ramaphosa uthe urhulumente uza kusabela kule ntlekele ngokwezigaba ezintathu.

src_text: it will first focus on immediate humanitarian relief, ensuring that everyone affected is safe and their basic needs are met.

src_text: "second, we will focus on stabilisation and recovery, rehousing people who have lost homes and restoring the provision of services.
tgt_text: "okwesibini, siza kugxila ekuzinziseni nasekuvuselelweni kwemeko yesiqhelo, ukubuyisela abantu abaphulukene namakhaya kwiindawo zabo nokubuyisela ukunikezelwa kweenkonzo.

src_text: "third, we will focus on reconstruction and rebuilding," he said.

src_text: the reconstruction and building phase will include the construction of houses in suitable areas.

tgt_text: "umsebenzi ongxamisekileyo kukuhlalisa abo bantu bathe ababinamakhaya ngenxa yezikhukula kwaye ayaqhubeka namalungiselelo okubonelela ngezindlu zethutyana," utshilo umongameli ramaphosa.

src_text: "i have authorised the sandf to bring in more personnel, water storage and purification supplies and engineering teams to assist with electricity and water restoration," he said government departments at national and provincial levels; municipalities; nongovernmental organisations and businesses have been distributing basic relief materials such as food, blankets, mattresses, clothing, chronic medication, toiletries and cooking utensils.

src_text: these industries – which include electricity, water, transport and telecommunications – are the arteries through which the oxygen of the economy runs.

src_text: inefficiency and the high cost of network services are an impediment to doing business in the country.

src_text: to address and overcome these challenges, we set up operation vulindlela in october 2020 as an initiative of the presidency and national treasury to accelerate structural reforms in these network industries.

src_text: while the responsible government departments and entities drive these reforms, operation vulindlela monitors and identifies challenges and blockages.
tgt_text: ngelixa amasebe karhulumente kunye namaqumrhu anoxanduva eqhuba olu hlaziyo, ioperation vuli ndlela ibeke esweni kwaye yachonga imingeni kunye nemiqobo.

src_text: across government, our focus is on reforms that are fundamental and transformative; that reshape the way our economy works.
